en: Amendments to the press and publications law restricting online expression in Jordan were passed by parliament today .
amh: በዮርዳኖስ የፕሬስ እና ሕትመት ሕግ በበይነመረብ (Internet) ላይ ሐሳብን የመግለጽ መብትን እንዲያደግድ ተደርጎ ትላንት እንዲሻሻል ተደረገ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Yesterday, the Jordanian press and publishing law was amended to ban the right to express opinion on the Internet.</s>

en: Simultaneously a demonstration was held by activists and journalists in front of the parliament as a majority of MP's voted for the bill.
amh: በተመሳሳይ ሰዓት ሕጉን ከሚያፀድቁበት ፓርላማ ፊት ለፊት ጋዜጠኞች እና የነፃ ሐሳብ አራማጆች ሰላማዊ ሰልፍ ወጥተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> At the same time, journalists and freedom of expression advocates staged a peaceful protest in front of the parliament where the bill was passed.</s>

en: An improvised coffin plastered with the words Freedom of the Internet was carried by activists signalling the anticipated death of the Internet in Jordan.
amh: እንደመሪ ቃል የበይነመረብ ነፃነት የሚል ባነር የያዙት በነፃ ሐሳብን የመግለጽ መብት አራማጆች በዮርዳኖስ የበይነመረብን ሞት አዝማሚያ ጠቁመዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> activists for the right to free expression held a banner with the motto "internet freedom" as their banner, pointing out the trend of internet death in Jordan.</s>

en: Participants wore black to the funeral-themed demonstration.
amh: የበይነመረብ ቀብር ለተባለለት ለዚህ አዋጅ ሰልፈኞቹ ጥቁር ልብስ ለብሰው ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> The protesters dressed in black for the law, which was called the Internet's funeral, were wearing black.</s>

en: The approved law must still receive ratification from the upper house of parliament as well as approval by King Abdullah II, who retains supreme authority and whose signature is the seal of approval to all legislative matters.
amh: የፀደቀው ሕግ አሁንም በሥራ ላይ ለመዋል፣ የላዕላይ ፓርላማውን ፈቃድ እና ሕጎች ሁሉ በዮርዳኖስ በተግባር ላይ ከመዋላቸው በፊ የሚያስፈልጋቸው የዳግማዊ ንጉሥ አብዱላህን ፊርማን ይጠብቃል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The approved law still needs the consent of the upper house of parliament and the signature of King Abdulla II, as all laws in Jordan must be put into effect before they can be enforced.</s>

en: Member of Parliament, Jamil Nimri, who voted against the bill, in addition to the head of the journalists syndicate, attended the protest and claimed that such laws serve only to restrict freedoms and muffle the voices of the people.
amh: ጀሚል ኒመሪ የተባሉ፣ አዋጁን የተቃወሙ የፓርላማ አባል፣ አዋጁን ከመቃወምም ባሻገር ሰልፉ ላይም ተሳትፈዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Jamie Nimiri, a member of the parliament who opposed the bill, participated in the protests.</s>

en: It requires the owners of websites to register with the government and obtain a license, just like any other publication.”
amh: እንደርሳቸው አባባል እንዲህ ዓይነት አዋጆች ነፃነትን በመገደብ የሕዝቦችን ድምጽ ብቻ ለማፈን ይጠቅማሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> According to him, such laws are used only to suppress the voice of the people by restricting freedom.</s>

en: Owners of websites will also be made responsible for the content of comments published by readers on their sites.
amh: የድረአምባዎች ባለቤቶች አንባቢዎቸው ድረአምባዎቻቸው ላይ ለሚለጥፏቸው አስተያየቶች ሳይቀር ኃላፊነቱን ይወስዳሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The owners of blogs are not responsible for the comments their readers post on their blogs.</s>

en: Outrage over the proposed law has been simmering for a while and netizens had already staged an online campaign to draw attention to the new law and its repercussions.
amh: በረቂቅ አዋጁ ላይ ከፍተኛ ተቃውሞ የተነሳበት ሲሆን፣ ወዲያውም በመረብዜጎች (netizens) ሚያስከትለው ጦስ ዙሪያ ትኩረትን ለመሳብ በሚል የመስመር ላይ እንቅስቃሴን አስጀምሯል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The draft law sparked a lot of criticism, and soon afterwards, netizens began an online campaign to draw attention to its potential harmfulness.</s>

en: On Twitter, netizens expressed their dismay at such a bill.
amh: በትዊተር ላይ፣ የመረብ ዜጎች ብስጭታቸውን በጽሑፍ ገልጸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> On Twitter, citizens of the Internet expressed their anger in writing.</s>

en: The beginning of the Internet freedom funeral in front of the Jordanian Parliament.
amh: የበይነመረብ ነፃነት ቀብር አጀማመር በዮርዳኖስ ፓርላማ ፊት ለፊት፡፡
mt0: <pad> The funeral of Internet Freedom in Jordan's parliament</s>

en: Photograph shared by Mohamed Al Qaq on Twitter
amh: ፎቶግራፉ የተገኘው ከሞሐመድ አል ቃድ ትዊተር ላይ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The photo was taken from Muhammad al-Qade's Twitter account.</s>

en: Mohamed Al Qaq tweets : @‬moalQaq: The funeral of the internet freedom has started‫
amh: ሞሐመድ አልቃድ በትዊቱ @moalQaq: የበይነመረብ ነፃነት ቀብር ተጀምሯል
mt0: <pad> Muhammad Al-Qade tweeted @moalQaq: The funeral of Internet freedom has begun.</s>

en: He shares this photograph, right, from the protest.
amh: ይህንን ፎቶግራፍ ያጋራው ከሰልፉ ቦታ ሆኖ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> He shared this photo from the protest site.</s>

en: Nizar Samarri adds: ‪@‬NizarSam: The house of representative have passed the amendments to the press and publications law just a while ago… what a shame
amh: ኒዛር ሳማሪም በበኩሉ: ‪@NizarSam: የተወካዮች ምክር ቤት የሕግ ማሻሻያውን ከጥቂት ደቂቃዎች በፊት አሳለፈ… አሳፋሪ ነው
mt0: <pad> Nizar Sami said: @NizarSam: The House of Representatives just passed the bill... Shameful.</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: And @godotbasha asks:
amh: @godotbasha ደግሞ:
mt0: <pad> @godotbasha</s>

en: @godotbasha: So if I draw parallels between Jordan and police states vis a vis ‪#censorship‬ law I can be subjected to persecution? ‪#freenetjo‬
amh: @godotbasha: እና አሁን በዮርዳኖስ እና በአገሪቷ ፖሊስ መካከል ንፅፅር ‪#ከሳንሱር ጉዳይጋ ባስቀምጥ በወንጀል እጠየቃለሁ ማለት ነው?
mt0: <pad> @godotbasha: And now, when I put the conflict between Jordan and the country's police with the #censorship issue, will I be prosecuted for crime?</s>

en: Hisham Al Balawneh tweets: @Jor2Day: I am not convinced at all that the goal behind the press and publications law is to organise, but is rather to shut the people up and move Jordan backwards
amh: ‪#freenetjo ሐሺም አል ባላውነህም በትዊቱ፡ @Jor2Day: ከፕሬስ እና ፐብሊኬሽኑ ሕግ በስተጀርባ ያለው ጉዳይ ስርዓት የማስያዝ ነው ብዬ አላምንም፤ ይልቁንም ሕዝቡን ዝም ለማሰኘትና ዮርዳኖስን ኋላ ለማስቀረት ነው
mt0: <pad> Hashem Al-Bannany tweeted: @Jor2Day: I don't think the purpose of the law on press and public publishing is to bring order; rather it is to keep the people quiet and keep Jordan behind.</s>

en: And Hanin Abu Shamat states:
amh: ሐኒን አቡ ሻማትም፡

amh: ‪@HaninSh: ከ#FreeNetJO ድራማ በስተጀርባ ምን አለ?
mt0: <pad> What's behind the #FreeNetJO drama?</s>

en: The Senate (Upper House) has to approve it first...
amh: ሴኔቱ (ላዕላይ ምክርቤቱ) እኮ መጀመሪያ ሊያፀደቀው ይገባል….
mt0: <pad> The Senate (the upper house) must first pass it.</s>

mt0: <pad> I trust our senators, not our useless congressmen.</s>

amh: የሻህዘይዶ ምላሽ፤
mt0: <pad> The reply of Shaikhzadeh is: "I don't know."</s>

en: @Shahzeydo: With one regressive law Jordanian bureaucracy puts a leash on Jordan's knowledge economy.
amh: @Shahzeydo: ኋላ በሚቆጩበት ሕግ የዮርዳኖሳውያን አስተዳደር የዮርዳኖስን የዕውቀት ምጣኔ ኃብት ላይ ማዕቀብ ጣለበት፡፡
mt0: <pad> @Shahzeydo: In a law that the Jordanian government later regretted, the Jordanian government imposed restrictions on the Jordanian knowledge economy.</s>

en: Brilliant' Govt logic in a recession. #FreeNetJo‬
amh: አጀብ' የመንግስት አመክንዮ እየወደቀ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The government's logic is falling apart.</s>

en: And Majd Yousef continues: @Mayousef: They have killed freedom in our country and accused it of being dishonourable so that they would exonerate themselves
amh: ማጅ ዮሴፍም ቀጥሎ: @Mayousef: ነፃነትን በአገራችን ገደሏት እና መልሰው እኛኑ በክብረቢስነት እየከሰሱ ገጽታቸውን ይገነባሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> They killed freedom in our country and then they build their image by accusing us of being unworthy.</s>

en: Fadi Zaghmout comments: @ArabObserver: A black day in Jordan's history
amh: ፋዲ ዛገሞት አስተያየት ሲሰጥ: @ArabObserver: በዮርዳኖስ ታሪክ ውስጥ አንዱ ጥቁር ቀን
mt0: <pad> @ArabObserver: One of the darkest days in Jordan's history.</s>

en: While Mohamad Shawash warns:
amh: ሞሐመድ ሻዋሽም ሲያስጠነቅቅ:
mt0: <pad> Muhammad Shawa also warned.</s>

en: Bashar Zeedan links the new attack on the freedom of the Internet to the Jordanian Spring.
amh: ባሽር ዚዳን አዲሱን የነፃነት ጥቃት ከዮርዳኖሳውያን የበይነመረብ ፀደይ ጋር ያያይዘዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Bashar Zidan has linked the new freedom attack to the Jordanian internet spring.</s>

en: He says: @BasharZeedan: The government has been suppressing, censoring, lifting and suppressing since the start of the #Jordanian_Spring… they've misunderstood the issue
amh: @BasharZeedan: መንግስት ከ#ዮርዳኖሳውያን_ ፀደይ ጀምሮ እስካሁን እየጨቆነ፣ ቅድመምርመራ እያደረገ እና እያፈነ ቆይቷል… ጉዳዩ አልገባቸውም
mt0: <pad> @BasharZeedan: The government has been suppressing, pre-emptively investigating and suppressing since the #Jordanian_Spring... they don't understand the matter.</s>

en: And Omar Qudah adds: @OmarQudah: He who thinks he can fence space like he fences a roundabout or a farm, is crazy!
amh: እናም ኦማር ቁዳህ ሲጨምርበት: @OmarQudah: የእርሻ ቦታን እንደሚያጥር፣ ነፃነትን አጥራለሁ ብሎ የሚያስብ ሰው እብድ ነው!
mt0: <pad> And Omar Qudah added: @OmarQudah: Whoever thinks he can take away the land of his farm, take away his freedom is a fool!</s>

en: Omar Kamel sees the Parliament's decision as a signal to boycott the elections: @BshMosawer: The parliament of 'fangs'… I hope to see the day you suffer!
amh: ኦማር ካመል ምርጫውን ለማስተጓጎል እንደተወሰደ የእርምጃ ደወል ይመለከተዋል፡ @BshMosawer: 'የገጣጦች' ፓርላማ… መከራችሁን የምታዩበትን ቀን እናፍቃለሁ!
mt0: <pad> Omar Khamil addresses the call for action to disrupt the election: @BshMosawer: 'The Parliament of the Assassins... I look forward to the day you will see your suffering.'</s>

en: This is the reason number 1000 following thousands of other reasons to boycott the elections!
amh: ይሄንኛው ሌሎች ምክንያቶችን የሚከተለው ምርጫውን ለማስተጓጎል ያላችሁ 1000ኛው ምክንያት ነው!
mt0: <pad> This is your 1000th reason to block the election, followed by other reasons.</s>

en: Activists launched a petition on Avaaz.com under the title Save the internet, which called on King Abdullah II, the minister of information and members of parliament to repeal the amendments to the press and publications law.
amh: com ላይ በይነመረብን አድን በሚል ዳግማዊ ንጉሥ አብዱላህ፣ የመረጃ ሚኒስትር እና የፓርላማ አባላት በፕሬስ እና ሕትመት ሕጉ ማሻሻይ ላይ ድጋሚ እንዲያስቡ የሚጠይቅ ፊርማ ማሰባሰብ ተጀምሯል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The petition "Save the Internet" has begun a petition calling on King Abdullah II, the Information Minister and members of the parliament to reconsider the amendments to the press and publishing law.</s>

en: Human Rights Watch also published a report on the latest bill passed by the parliament and the restrictions that are to be imposed on Jordanian websites, titled Jordan: Moves to Censor Online Expression.
amh: ሒዩማን ራይትስ ዋች በበኩሉ፣ በዮርዳኖሳውያን ድረአምባዎች ላይ ዕቀባ ለመጣል የፓርላማውን ይሁንታ ባገኘው አዋጅ ዙሪ ያ ዮርዳኖስ፤ በመስመር ላይ ሐሳብን የመግለፅ መብትን ቀድሞ ወደመመርመር እየሄደች ነው  የሚል ሪፖርት አውጥቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Human Rights Watch has released a report on the parliamentary bill that would ban Jordanian websites, which Human Rights Watch says is taking steps to curb online freedom of expression.</s>

en: The Union Women and Child Development Ministry in India is considering a draft bill which, if passed by parliament, would make it legally compulsory for husbands to pay out a portion of their monthly income to their homemaker wives, for doing household chores.
amh: የህንድ የሴቶችና ሕፃናት ሕብረት ዕድገት ሚኒስቴር ያወጣው ረቂቅ አዋጅ በፓርላማው ከፀደቀ፣ ሚስቶች በቤት ውስጥ ለሚሰሩት ሥራ ባሎች ውጪ ሰርተው ከሚያገኙት ውስጥ የተወሰነ መጠን ለሚስቶቻቸው እንዲከፍሉ የሚያስገድድ ይሆናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Indian Women and Child Development Ministry has drafted a bill that, if passed by the parliament, will require men to pay their wives for domestic work their husbands do outside of the house.</s>

en: As per the Ministry's proposal, a model is being framed which will allow for valuation of the work done by homemakers in economic terms and then recognition of this contribution to the economy by compensating homemakers for their labour.
amh: በሚኒስቴሩ ዕቅድ መሰረት፣ ሚስቶች በቤት ውስጥ የሚሰሩት ስራ ዋጋ የሚለካበት ሞዴል የተዘጋጀ ሲሆን፣ በዚሁ መሰረት የቤት ውስጥ ሥራ የሚሰሩትን ሰዎችና ሥራቸው ለኢኮኖሚው ያለውን ተዋፅዖ ዕውቅና መስጠት ይቻላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Under the ministry's plan, a model to assess the value of women's domestic work has been developed, which will allow people who do domestic work and their contribution to the economy to be recognised.</s>

en: The proposed law is expected to refer to homemakers as home engineers.
amh: ረቂቅ አዋጁ የቤት ውስጥ ሥራ ፈፃሚዎችን የጓዳ መሐንዲሶች በማለት ጠቅሷቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The draft bill referred to domestic workers as garden engineers.</s>

en: Minister Krishna Tirath has said that this amount, which could be anywhere between 10-20% of the husband's monthly salary, should not be looked upon as salary for housework; rather it could be referred to as an honorarium or something similar.
amh: ሚንስትር ክሪሽና ቲርታህ የክፍያው መጠን ከባሎች ወርሃዊ ገቢ ላይ ከ10-20በመቶ ሊደርስ እንደሚችል፣ ነገር ግን ሚስቶች ለቤት ውስጥ ሥራ የሚከፈላቸው መጠን ተደርጎ መወሰድ የለበትም ብለዋል፤ ይልቁንም እንደማበረታቻ ወይም ተመሳሳይ ነገር መቆጠር አለበት፡፡
mt0: <pad> The minister, Krishana Tirtha, said the amount of payment could be 10-20% of men's monthly income, but it should not be seen as a payment for women's domestic work; rather, it should be seen as an incentive or something similar.</s>

en: While the Minister sees this as a step forward in women's empowerment, the proposal is being debated hotly, both offline as well as online.
amh: ሚኒስትሩ ይህንን ሴቶችን በማጠናከር ረገድ አንድ እርምጃ ወደፊት የመራመድ ያክል ይቆጥሩታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The minister viewed this as a step forward in the strengthening of women.</s>

en: A woman washing clothes.
amh: አንዲት ሴት ልብስ እያጠበች፡፡
mt0: <pad> A woman is washing clothes.</s>

en: Image by Neil Moralee CC BY-NC-ND 2.0
amh: ፎቶ በኒል ሞራሌ CC BY-NC-ND 2.
mt0: <pad> Photo by Daniel Morale CC BY-NC-ND</s>

en: Some feel that measuring the value of unpaid work at home is conceptually correct and well worth trying, though making it mandatory for husbands to pay out a fixed percentage of their salaries in lieu of this work may be the wrong way forward.
amh: አንዳንዶች በቤት ውስጥ ክፍያ የማይፈፀምበትን ሥራ መለካት በፅንሰሐሳብ ደረጃ ትክክል እንደሆነ እና መሞከሩትም ተገቢ እንደሆነ  ተሰምቷቸዋል፤ ነገር ግን ባሎችን የተወሰነ መጠን ያለው ገንዘብ በየወሩ ለሚስቶቻቸው እንዲከፍሉ ማስገደዱ ግን የተሳሳተ አቀራረብ ነው ይላሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Some people feel that measuring unpaid domestic work is a concept-wise right and worthwhile; but forcing men to pay their wives a certain amount of money every month is a wrong approach, they say.</s>

en: Others wonder how it will be possible to put a 'price tag' on all the work that goes on within a home and how such a law would be implemented - given the various questions that are sure to come up in it's wake.
amh: ሌሎች ደግሞ በጉጉት የሚጠይቁት እያንዳንዱን የቤት ውስጥ ሥራ እንዴት ‹የዋጋ መጠን› መስጠት እና ሕጉንም እንዴት ማስፈፀም እንደሚቻል ነው - ተግባር ላይ ሲውል በርግጠኝነት ሊመጡ የሚችሉትን የተለያዩ ጥያቄዎች እያነሱ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Others are eager to learn how to "value" every home job and how to implement the law - bringing up a wide variety of questions that will certainly come up in practice.</s>

en: And questions are indeed being asked.
amh: ጥያቄዎቹ በርግጥም አሁንም ተነስተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The questions are certainly still being raised.</s>

en: For example, LordRaj asks:
amh: ለምሳሌ፣ ሎርድራጅ እንዲህ ይጠይቃል፡
mt0: <pad> For example, Lord Drake would ask:</s>

en: Are you suggesting an Employee / Employer relationship for the married couple?
amh: በባለትዳሮች መካከል የተቀጣሪና/ቀጣሪ ግንኙነት ለመመስረት እየመከራችሁ ነው?
mt0: <pad> Are you advising couples to form a co-worker/employee relationship?</s>

en: Who is going to decide on the working hours and job description?
amh: የሥራውን ሰዓት እና ዝርዝር የሚወስነው ማነው?
mt0: <pad> Who decides the working hours and schedule?</s>

en: In Ground Report, which is an open news platform, D. Chaitanya outlines some further questions related to this issue that people (both men and women) appear to be hotly debating.
amh: መሬት ላይ በወረደ ሪፖርት ዲ ቻይታንያ ከጉዳዩ ጋር በተያያዘ ሰዎች (ወንዶችና ሴቶች) በጋለ ሁኔታ እየተከራከሩ ያሉበትን ተጨማሪ ጥያቄዎችን ዝርዝር ያስቀምጣሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Lowered Report by De Chaitiana lists additional questions that people involved (both men and women) are openly arguing about.</s>

en: For example:
amh: ለምሳሌ፡
mt0: <pad> For example, you don't know</s>

en: If in the place of wife, house-maid is discharging every day house-hold work, then how should the house-maid be treated?
amh: በሚስቲቱ ቦታ፣ የቤት ሠራተኛዋ ሁሉንም የቤት ሥራ የመሥራት ኃላፊነት ካለባት፣ የቤት ሠራተኛይቱ እንዴት ነው የምትታየው?
mt0: <pad> In the place of a mistress, what is the attitude towards a maid who has all the responsibility for doing all the housework?</s>

en: Should not the house-maid be treated on par with the wife?
amh: የቤት ሠራተኛይቱ ሚስቲቱ ማግኘት የነበረባትን ጥቅም ማግኘት የለባትም?
mt0: <pad> Do the servants not have the same rights as the wife?</s>

en: (In such cases) who are legitimately entitled for that 10 or 20% of amount?
amh: (በዚህ ሁኔታ) ከ10 ወይም 20 በመቶ መጠን ያለውን ክፍያ ለመቀበል መብት ያለው ማነው?
mt0: <pad> Who is entitled to receive 10% or 20% of the revenue?</s>

en: If 10 or 20% salary is deposited on wife’s name, what about the maintenance money to wife, if she deserts the husband and files a maintenance case on husband?
amh: 10 ወይም 20 በመቶ የሚሆነው የባልየው ደሞዝ መጠን በሚስቲቱ ስም መቀመጥ ካለበት፣ የአስቤዛውንስ ወጪ ማን ይሸፍናል?
mt0: <pad> If 10 or 20 percent of the husband's salary is deposited in the wife's name, who will cover the cost of a divorce?</s>

en: Will this law create new financial skirmishes between wives and husbands?
amh: ይህ ሕግ በሚስቶችና ባሎች መካከል አዲስ የገንዘብ ጦርነት አያጭርም?
mt0: <pad> Is this law going to spark a new war of money between men and women?</s>

en: Like 498-A of Penal Code, Maintenance laws, domestic violence laws, will this law also be misused by some wives?
amh: ልክ እንደ ወንጀለኛ መቅጫ ሕጉ 498-A፣ የአስቤዛ ሕግ፣ የቤት ውስጥ ጥቃት ሕግ፣ ይሄ ሕግ በአንዳንድ ሚስቶች አላግባብ መጠቀሚያ አይሆን ይሆን?
mt0: <pad> Just like the Criminal Code 498-A, the Victim's Law, the Family Violence Act, this law is not abused by some women?</s>

en: Blogger Surya Murali too is wondering how the government proposes to implement a law such as this.
amh: ጦማሪዋ ሱርያ ሙራሊም ይህንን ሕግ መንግስት እንዴት እንደሚተገብረው በአግራሞት ትታዘባለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> The blogger Suriya Murali is astonished at how the government is implementing this law.</s>

en: She says on her blog:
amh: በጦማሯም እንዲ ትላለች:
mt0: <pad> She says so in her blog.</s>

en: I am all for the empowerment of women, and also their financial independence... (but) my biggest question to these lawmakers is that how are they planning to implement the proposal?
amh: ሴቶችን ማጎልበትን እደግፋለሁ፣ የገንዘብ ነፃነት እንዲኖራቸውም ጭምር… (ነገር ግን) ፍራቻዬ፣ እነዚህ ሕግ አውጪዎች ረቂቁን እንዴት ነው የሚተገብሩት?
mt0: <pad> I support women's empowerment, financial independence... (but) my fear is, how will these legislators implement the draft?</s>

en: If they go about doing it the way such that a husband shares a percentage of his income with his wife for her work, I don’t see how it makes the economic situation of the house any better or how it makes the woman independent and empowered.
amh: ባልየው የገቢውን የተወሰነ ሽራፊ ለሚስቱ የሚያካፍል ከሆነ እንዴት የቤት ውስጥ ኢኮኖሚውን ሁኔታ እንደሚያሻሽለው እና ሴቷንም በገንዘብ ነፃነት እንዴት እንደሚያጠናክራት አይታየኝም፡፡
mt0: <pad> I can't see how a man could improve the family economy and strengthen the woman's financial independence if he shared some of his income with his wife.</s>

en: The gross income remaining the same, the household economy is not changed.
amh: ድምር ገቢው ዞሮ ዞሮ አንድ ስለሚሆን በቤትውስጥ ኢኮኖሚው ላይ ለውጥ አይኖርም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Since the total income is always one, there will be no change in the domestic economy.</s>

en: Most responsible husbands, in my belief, would share the running costs of the household with their wives anyway… if that isn’t the case, then this sort of a scheme is not going to improve the husband-wife equation of those households.
amh: ብዙዎቹ ኃላፊነት የሚሰማቸው ባሎች፣ የቤት ውስጥ ወጪዎችን ከሚስቶቻቸው ጋር አሁንም ቢሆን ይካፈላሉ…. ጉዳዩ የተለየ ከሆነ ደግሞ፣ ይህ ዓይነቱ መፍትሄ የባል-ሚስት የቤት ውስጥ ቀመርን አያስተካክለውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many responsible men still share the domestic costs with their wives.... In other words, this solution doesn't even fix the marital budget.</s>

en: At iDiva, Archana Jayakumar asks:
amh: አርቻ ጃያኩማር በአይዲቫ ላይ ሲጠይቅ፡
mt0: <pad> Arsha Jayakumar asked about Aditya on the show.</s>

en: How does all of this not make her anything but a glorified servant?
amh: ይህ ከተከበረች የቤት ሠራተኝነት ሌላ ምንም የማያደርጋት እንዴት ነው?
mt0: <pad> How can this very respectable housekeeper do nothing but clean the house?</s>

en: Sunita at Supari.org agrees and calls this proposed Bill as family breaking move by the government.
amh: org ላይ ከረቂቁ ጋር በመስማማትሰበር የመንግስት ቤተሰብ ነክ እርምጃ እንደሆነ ይጠቅሳል፡፡
mt0: <pad> org by agreeing with the draft, which would refer to the separation as a government family action.</s>

en: Under the guise of 'development and welfare' of women, all you have been doing is promoting a bias against men.
amh: በሴቶች ዕድገት እና ደህንነት ጉዳይ፣ የተያያዛችሁት ነገር ቢሆን ወንዶች ላይ መዝመት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the matter of women's development and safety, what you are involved in is pushing men.</s>

en: Men's rights groups tend to agree.
amh: የወንዶች መብት ቡድንም በዚህ ይስማማል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Men's Rights Group agrees with this.</s>

en: Vicky Nanjappa points out:
amh: ቪኪ ናንጃፓ ይህን ይጠቁማል፡
mt0: <pad> Wikipedia says this.</s>

en: A proposal to part with a portion of the husband’s salary and hand it over to the wife has been strongly opposed by Men’s rights groups...The ‘Save Family Foundation’ has written a letter to Krishna Tirath, Union Minister for Women and Child Development, seeking immediate withdrawal of the proposal.
amh: የባሎችን ገቢ ቆርጦ ለሚስቶች ለመስጠት የቀረበውን ረቂቅ አዋጅ የወንዶች መብት ቡድን በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ይቃወመዋል… ‘የቤተሰብ አድን ፋውንዴሽን’ ለሚኒስትር ክሪሽና ቲራት (የሴቶችና ሕፃናት ሕብረት ዕድገት ሚኒስቴር) ደብዳቤ ረቂቅ አዋጁ ከወዲሁ እንዲሰረዝ ደብዳቤ ጽፏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The men's rights group is strongly opposing the proposed bill to cut off men's income and give it to women... The Family Salvation Foundation has written a letter to Ms. Krishana Tiwari (Ministry of Women and Child Development) requesting that the bill be repealed immediately.</s>

en: The foundation, representing around 40 different men’s organizations across the country, has termed this proposal as one-sided.
amh: ፋውንዴሽኑ፣ በአገሪቱ ውስጥ የሚገኙ፣ ከ40 በላይ የወንዶችን ድርጅቶች በመወከል፣ ረቂቁን የአንድ ወገን ሐሳብ ሲል ፈርጆታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Foundation, representing over 40 men's organizations throughout the country, described the theory as one-sided.</s>

en: With such incentives, it is not surprising that many wives would rather just sit idle, and get free doles from their husbands, with the kind blessings of the Indian judicial system.
amh: በእንደዚህ ያለ ማበረታቻ፣ በርካታ ሚስቶች በቤት ውስጥ ሥራ ፈትተው መቀመጣቸው እና ከባሎቻቸው የነፃ አሻንጉሊት መቀበላቸው የሚያስገርም ነገር አይሆንም፤ በዚህ ዓይነቱ የሕንድ የሕግ ስርዓት ቡራኬ፡፡
mt0: <pad> With such encouragement, it is not surprising that many women stay at home and receive free dolls from their husbands; with the blessings of this Indian legal system;</s>

en: And all this under the guise of women empowerment
amh: እናም ይሄ ሁሉ የሚደረገው ደግሞ ሴቶችን በማጎልበት ስም ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> And all this is done in the name of empowering women.</s>

en: However, others are more positive to this proposal for various reasons.
amh: ቢሆንም ግን ሌሎች ስለረቂቁ አዎንታዊ ምልከታ አላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> However, others have a positive view of the tiny.</s>

en: For example, in a discussion in the Defence Forum India, Yusuf appears pleased.
amh: ለምሳሌ፣ የሕንድ የመከራከሪያ መድረክ ላይ በተካሔደ ውይይት ዩሱፍ ተደስቶ ታይቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> For example, Usouf seemed pleased with the discussion on Indian Debate Forum.</s>

en: Actually this news is music to my ears.
amh: በርግጥ ይህ ዜና ለጆሮዬ ሙዚቃ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Really, this news is music to my ears.</s>

en: Gives me more ways to save tax. :-)
amh: የገቢ ግብርን ለመቀነስ ብዙ መንገዶችን ይሰጠኛል
mt0: <pad> It gives you many ways to reduce your taxes.</s>

en: Blogger Surya Murali goes on to offer, what she feels is a more practical solution to the issue, something that will truly benefit the women without getting her into the employer-employee hierarchy within the family.
amh: ጦማሪዋ ሱራይ ሙራሊ የምትመክረው፣ ሴቷን በቤተሰብ ውስጥ ‹‹ከቀጣሪ-ተቀጣሪ›› ተዋረድ የሚያላቅቁ እና በርግጥም የሚያጠናክሩ ሌሎች የተሻሉ ተግባራዊ መፍትሄዎች እንዲቀርቡ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The blogger Suray Murali recommends that other better practical solutions be offered to free women from the "employer-employee" hierarchy and actually strengthen them.</s>

en: Let the government work out a method in which they evaluate the households economically and they give the housewives / homemakers an allowance.
amh: መንግስት ሴቶች በቤት ውስጥ የሚያበረክቱትን የኢኮኖሚ ተዋፅዖ አስልቶ ለቤት እመቤቶች/ የቤት ሠራተኞች አበል ይፍቀድላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The government should consider the economic contribution women make to the home and provide a allowance for housewives/domestic workers.</s>

en: This totally skips the husband as a middleman and is a direct deal between the people who want the housewives to be empowered and the housewives.
amh: ይህ ባሎችን ለሚስቶች መጠናከር ቀጥተኛ ተጠሪ እንዲሆኑ ከማድረግ ያድናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This prevents men from being directly responsible for strengthening women.</s>

en: In my opinion, this would not only help the women be independent, it will also improve the general quality of life in households which otherwise manage with meager means.
amh: በኔ አስተያየት፣ ይህ ሴቷን ከጥገኝነት ማላቀቅ ብቻ ሳይሆን የቤት ውስጥ ኢኮኖሚ ሁኔታንም ከስስት ኑሮ ያላቅቀዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In my opinion, this not only frees the woman from dependency but also frees the family's economic situation from the marriage lifestyle.</s>

en: Thus, both targets of economic upliftment and female empowerment would be achieved.
amh: ከዚያ፣ ሁለቱም ኢኮኖሚውን የማሳደግ እና ሴቶችን የማጠናከር ሕልም ግቡን ይመታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Then, both the dream of enhancing economic growth and empowering women will hit its target.</s>

en: InfoQueenBee agrees and adds:
amh: ኢንፎኩዊንቢ በመስማማት የምትጨምረው፡
mt0: <pad> You can add a subscription to InfoQin by agreeing to the terms of this agreement.</s>

en: While we wait to see what happens to the Minister's proposal, it appears that the debate surrounding the question of the husband being forced to pay his house engineer an 'honorarium' for household work, is far from over.
amh: ሕጉን ለቤት እመቤቲቱ ‹ደሞዝ› መስጠት ከማድረግ ይልቅ ለሚስቲቱ እና ልጆቹ የሕይወት፣ ሕክምና እና ኢንቨስትመንት ኢንሹራንሶች እንዲገቡላቸው ቢደነግግ መልካም ነው፡፡ የሚኒስትሩ ዕቅድ ምን እንደሚደርስ እስከምናይ ድረስ፣ ባልየው ‹‹ለጓዳዋ መሐንዲስ›› የሚያስብላት የማበረታቻ ክፍያ ጉዳይ ላይ የሚነሳው የጦፈ ክርክር ማቆሚያ አይኖረውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> The law should be changed to provide life, health and investment insurance for the woman and her children instead of paying the woman a salary. Until we see what happens to the minister's plan, the heated argument over the wife's "bonus" payment to her husband will not stop until we see what happens to the minister's plan.</s>

en: Over the past few years it has become apparent that, if one has a loud enough voice and a big enough audience — not to mention a good sense of humor — social media can serve as a great platform for change.
amh: ባለፉት ጥቂት ዓመታት አመታት ውስጥ ግልጽ ሆኗል ፤ በበቂ ሁኔታ የሚጮህ ድምጽ እና ብዙ አድማጭ ያለው አንድ ሰው ካለ (ጥሩ አሽሙርን ለመጥቀስ አይደለም) ማኀበራዊ ሚዲያ ለለውጥ እንደትልቅ አማራጭ ሊያገለግል ይችላል፤ ለውጡ አብዛኛውን ጊዜ ፖለቲካዊ ወይም ማኀበራዊ ሲሆን ታዋቂው ጦማሪ የዶሱ ሂዘር አርምስትሮንግ እንዳረጋገጠው ደግሞ ትልልቅ ኩባንያዎች ቅሬታዎን እንዲሰሙ የማደረግም አቅም አለው፡፡
mt0: <pad> It's been clear for the past few years; if you have enough shouting and a large audience (not to be sarcastic), social media can be a great tool for change; the change is often political or social, and it can even make big companies hear your voice, as popular blogger Dustin Hoffman has proven.</s>

en: And while that often means political or social change, it can also mean — as famous blogger Heather Armstrong, aka Dooce, has proven — the ability to get a major company to listen to your complaints.
amh: ባለፈው ረቡዕ በግብጽ አየር መንገድ አገልግሎት ተስፋ የቆረጠችው እንግሊዝ-ግብጻዊቷ ጸሐፊ ኤሚ ሞዋፊ ትኬት ለመቁረጥ በአየር መንገዱ ያገጠማትን ፈተና ለሌሎች ለማካፈል ወደ ትዊተር ወሰደችው፡፡
mt0: <pad> English-Egyptian writer Amy Mowbray, who turned down the EgyptAir service last Thursday, took to Twitter to share her frustration at the airport when she tried to book a ticket.</s>

en: Adding a hashtag, Mowafi encouraged followers to tweet their own complaints about the airline: To all those who've been tortured by @flyegyptair please join me in my plight to get them to answer and explain themselves #DearEgyptAir
amh: ከዚህ በፊት በ@flyegyptair ለተጎሳቀላችሁ በሙሉ ራሳቸው መልስ እንዲሰጡን እና እንዲያስረዱ ቅሬታዬን በመደገፍ እርዱኝ ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Help me by supporting my complaint and asking them to answer and explain to all the victims of @flyegyptair before.</s>

en: On 13 July, 2012, Ethiopia's federal court sentenced a prominent Ethiopian blogger Eskinder Nega and 23 other opposition activists to 18 years in jail for allegedly participating in terrorist activities.
amh: ሐምሌ 6/2004 የኢትዮጵያ ፌዴራል ፍርድ ቤት ጦማሪው እስክንድር ነጋን ጨምሮ ሌሎችንም 23 የተቃውሞ ተግባር የፈፀሙ ሰዎችን ለ18 ዓመታት እና ሌላ መጠን ያለው የእስር ፍርድ ከአሸባሪነትጋ በተያያዘ በይኖባቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> 6 July 2004 The Ethiopian Federal Court sentenced 23 protesters, including the blogger Asokander Nyang, to 18 years and other lengths of jail for terrorism.</s>

en: Eskinder Nega is a journalist, who turned to blogging to find a breathing space online for his dissenting views, has been in a prison for a year now.
amh: እስክንድር ነጋ የተቃውሞ ሐሳቦቹን መተንፈሻ ለማግኘት የመስመር ላይ ጦማሪ የሆነ ጋዜጠኛ ሲሆን መጨረሻ ጊዜ ከታሰረ አንድ ዓመት ሞላው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Askinder Nangu is a journalist who became an online blogger to vent his opposition ideas. He has been in jail for a year since he was last arrested.</s>

en: 14 September, 2012 marks the first anniversary of his arrest.
amh: መስከረም 4/2005 የታሰረበት አንደኛ ዓመት ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> It was the first year of his prison sentence on September 4/2005.</s>

en: The Ethiopian online community remembers him on Facebook:
amh: የኢትዮጵያ የኢንተርኔት ተጠቃሚ ማኅበረሰብ በፌስቡክ ላይ አስታውሶታል፡
mt0: <pad> The Ethiopian internet community has reminded it on Facebook.</s>

en: Mesfin Negash writes:
amh: መስፍን ነጋሽ እንዲህ ጻፈ:-
mt0: <pad> According to Mesfin Nigash: "I don't know what you mean by saying I don't know."</s>

en: One year since journalist Eskinder Nega arrested in front of his son.
amh: እስክንድር ነጋ በልጁ ፊት ወደእስር ቤት ከተወሰደ አንድ ዓመት ሞላው፡፡
mt0: <pad> It's been a year since Askender Naing was arrested in front of his son.</s>

en: We mark the day demanding the release of Journalists and other prisoners of conscience in Ethiopia.
amh: ቀኑን ጋዜጠኞች እና ሌሎችም የሕሊና እስረኞች እንዲፈቱ እየጠየቅን እናስበዋለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We spent the day demanding the release of journalists and other political prisoners.</s>

en: Light a candle wherever you may be today.
amh: ዛሬ በያላችሁበት ሻማ አብሩ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Candles are burning everywhere today.</s>

en: We want Eskinder and others FREE!
amh: እስክንድር ነጋ እና ሌሎችም ነፃ እንዲወጡ እንፈልጋለን!
mt0: <pad> We want Askinder Nega and others to be freed!</s>

en: Ethiopian jailed blogger and journalist Eskinder Nega.
amh: የታሰረው ኢትዮጵያዊ ጋዜጠኛ እና ጦማሪ እስክንድር ነጋ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Ethiopian journalist and blogger Asokander Nigh is being held.</s>

en: Photo courtesy of FreeEskinderNega.com
amh: ፎቶ FreeEskinderNega.
mt0: <pad> Photo by FreeEskinderNega.</s>

en: Jawar Mohammed shares Qale'ab Tadesse Che Jr.’s note which was written by Serkalem Fasil, the wife of Eskidner Nega, and demands that the Ethiopian government free all political prisoners:
amh: ጃዋር ሞሐመድ በእስክንድር ነጋ ባለቤት ሰርካለም ፋሲል የኢትዮጵያ መንግስት እስክንድርን እና ሌሎችም የፖለቲከኛ እስረኞችን እንዲፈታ በቃለአብ ታደሰ የሰፈረ ማስታወሻ አጋርቷል፡
mt0: <pad> Mohammed Jawar has shared a note by the wife of Asokander Nganga, Serkalem Fasil, written by Kwekab Tadesse, urging the Ethiopian government to free Asokander and other political prisoners.</s>

en: It is one year today since Eskinder Nega was thrown to jail , he was then falsely charged with terrorism and sentenced to 18 years imprisonment.
amh: ኋላ ላይ በሐሰት ተመስክሮበት 18 ዓመት የተፈረደበት እስክንድር ነጋ ወደ እስር ቤት ከተወረወረ ዛሬ ድፍን አንድ ዓመት ሞላው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The 18 years sentence on the former leader of the opposition, Askender Naye, has been a year since he was thrown into jail.</s>

en: According to the note below by his wife and fellow journalist Serkalem Fasil, when he was a rrested, Eskinder was bringing their 6 year old child from school. The police stopped him on his way and would not even let him bring the kid home.
amh: ከዚህ በታች በእስክንድር ነጋ ባለቤት እና የሙያ አጋር ሰርካለም ፋሲል በሰፈረው ማስታወሻ መሰረት፣ ሲያዝ የ6 ዓመቱን ልጁን ከትምህርት ቤት እያመጣ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> According to the post below by Asikndar's wife and co-worker Sarkalam Fasil, Saiqa was picking up her six-year-old son from school.</s>

en: They violently split the boy from his father.
amh: በጉልበት ከልጁ ነጥለው ወሰዱት፡፡
mt0: <pad> He forced himself away from the child.</s>

en: What was strange was that they ( police) kept video tapping and taking pictures as the boy was crawling on the ground and crying watching his father who was being thrown around and hand cuffed.
amh: የሚያስገርመው ነገር ታዲያ፣ ይሄ ሲሆን እና ልጅ የአባቱን በካቴና መጠርነፍ እና መንገላታት በማየት እየጮኸ መሬት ላይ የሚንከባለለውን ልጅ አሳሪዎቹ በቪዲዮ ለመቅረፅ መሞከራቸው ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The strange thing is that the prisoners tried to film the child crying and rolling on the ground as his father was tied up and beaten.</s>

en: None of them tried to comfort the terrified baby.
amh: ማንም የደነገጠውን ልጅ ለማባበል አልሞከረም፡፡
mt0: <pad> No one tried to comfort the frightened child.</s>

en: Since then all the young child could to talk is police.
amh: ከዚያን ጊዜ ወዲህ፣ ይሄ ትንሽ ልጅ ሁሌ የሚያወራው ስለፖሊስ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> From then on, this little boy has been talking about the police all the time.</s>

en: He repeats how the police took his father.He is scared that they would come any time.
amh: ፖሊሶቹ እንዴት አባቱን እንደወሰዱበት ይናገራል፡፡ በማንኛውም ሰዓት የሚመጡበት ይመስለዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> He tells how the police took his father. He thinks they'll come anytime.</s>

en: He is terrified of them.
amh: በጣም እየፈራቸው ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> He's very afraid of them.</s>

en: Serkalem asks, now tell me who is the terrorist?
amh: ሰርካለም እንዲህ ስትል ትጠይቃለች፣ አሁን አሸባሪው ማን እንደሆነ ንገሩኝ?
mt0: <pad> Sarkalam asks, "Now tell me who the terrorist is."</s>

en: She says she is worried more about the psychological impact this had on her young son than incarceration of Eskendir, because unlike the child, the father was prepared and knew this was coming.
amh: ይህ አንድቀን እንደሚመጣ እያሰበ ከነበረው እስክንድር ይልቅ፣ ክስተቱ መምጣቱን የማያውቀው ልጅ ላይ ምን ዓይነት የስነልቡና ችግር ሊያስከትልበት እንደሚችል ስጋቷን ትናገራለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> Since Inspectora had no idea this day would come, she spoke of her fears about the impact the event could have on a child who didn't know it would have.</s>

en: Free Eskinder Nega and the rest of the over 30,000 political prisoners languishing in the various Ethiopian jails.
amh: እስክንድር ነጋን እና ሌሎችም ከ30,000 በላይ በኢትዮጵያ እስርቤቶች የተዘነጉ የፖለቲካ እስረኞችን ፍቱ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Free Asokander Naing and other over 30,000 political prisoners in the Ethiopian jails.</s>

en: Meanwhile, Facebook users created a Facebook group which says iCare with all members of the group making their Facebook profile pictures with an Ethiopian flag with a note on it which reads I care!:
amh: ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ፣ የፌስቡክ ተጠቃሚዎች iCare (እኔ ያገባኛል) የሚል እና ሁሉም አባላቱ የፕሮፋይል ምስላቸውን በአንድ ማስታወሻ የሚቀይሩበት፣ በኢትዮጵያ ባንዲራ ምስል የተቀለመ የፌስቡክ ቡድን፡
mt0: <pad> While this is going on, Facebook users have created a group called iCare (I Care) where all members change their profile pictures with a note, and where they also celebrate the Ethiopian flag.</s>

en: Nebiyu Hailu one of the members of the group writes:
amh: አንዱ የቡድኑ አባል ነብዩ ኃይሉ እንዲህ አለ:-
mt0: <pad> One of the members of the team, Nabiu Hsieh said: "We are very pleased with the results of the investigation.</s>

en: Every single day shows me that Meles Zenawi was monster, evil, cruel dictator.
amh: እያንዳንዷን ቀን የመለስ ዜናዊን ጭራቅ፣ እርኩስ፣ ክፉ አምባገነንነት ያስታውሰኛል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Every day I remember the cruel, evil, and ugly dictatorship of Meles Zenawi.</s>

en: Thanks God I’ll never see Meles again.
amh: ፈጣሪ ይመስገን መለስን ዳግም አላየውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Thank God I never saw Melik again.</s>

en: But this good-for-nothing Epdrf guys must free up Eskinder Nega, Andualem Arage & other political prisoners.
amh: ነገር ግን እነዚህ ለምንም የማይበጁ ‹ኢሕአዴግ›ኦች እስክንድር ነጋ፣ አንዱዓለም አራጌን እ ሁሉንም የፖለቲካ እስረኞች መፍታት አለባቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> But these useless "EhAdeGs" should release Asokander Nganga, Adenualem Aragor and all political prisoners.</s>

en: I really care! we need freedom.
amh: ይህ የምር ይመለከተኛል! ነፃነት ያስፈልገናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This really concerns me! We need freedom!</s>

en: After all we live in a big prison.
amh: በመሰረቱ ሁላችንም በትልቅ እስር ቤት ውስጥ እየኖርን ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In fact, we're all living in a big jail.</s>

en: Zone Nine, a blog which is a host of nine young Ethiopian bloggers, reports the online event and demands the release of all political prisoners :
amh: ዞን ዘጠኝ የተባለ የዘጠኝ ጦማሪዎች የጋራ ጦማር ኩነቱን ሪፖርት ሲያደርግ የፖለቲካ እስረኞች እንዲፈቱ ያለውን ፍላጎት ገልጧል፡
mt0: <pad> The Zone Nine blog, a group of nine bloggers, reported the incident and expressed its wish for political prisoners to be freed.</s>

en: The one year anniversary of the incarceration of Eskinder Nega is being marked by Ethiopians on Facebook! Ethiopians are changing their profile pictures with an Ethiopian flag with a message on it!
amh: ኢትዮጵያውያን የፌስቡክ ተጠቃሚዎች የረጅም ጊዜ ጦማሪውና የነፃነት ተሟጋቹ እስክንድር ነጋ ወደ እስር ቤት የገባበትን አንደኛ ዓመት የፕሮፋይል ፎቶዋቸውን (በዚህ ምስል) በመቀየር እያስታወሱት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ethiopian Facebook users are marking the first anniversary of the prison entry of long-time blogger and freedom fighter Asokander Nyang by changing their profile pictures (this picture) to mark the first year of his prison entry.</s>

en: As a group of bloggers who firmly believe in free press and free discussion we demand to the Ethiopian government to free Eskinder Nega and all political prisoners!
amh: ዞን ዘጠኝ እንደ የሕዝብ ውይይት እና የነፃነት ደጋፊነቷ እስክንድር ነጋንና ሁሉንም የሕሊና እስረኞች መንግስት እንዲፈታ ትጠይቃለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> Zone Nine, as a supporter of public debate and freedom, urges the government to free Askender Naing and all political prisoners.</s>

en: The Ethiopian government has increased its online censorship activities since September 2011.
amh: የኢትዮጵያ መንግስት ከመስከረም 2004 ጀምሮ የመስመር ላይ ተግባራት ማጥለሉን አጠናክሮ ቀጥሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Ethiopian government has intensified its online censorship since September 2004</s>

en: Among those jailed are two Swedish journalists who are serving an 11 year prison term for allegedly supporting an ethnic Somali rebel group.
amh: ከነዚህ ተከሳሾች ውስጥ፣ ከሶማሊ አማጺ ቡድን ጋር ተባብራችኋል በሚል 11 ዓመት የተፈረደባቸው ሁለቱ ስዊድናዊ ጋዜጠኞች ይገኙበታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> These accused include two Swedish journalists who were jailed for 11 years for collaborating with the Somali rebel group.</s>

en: Eskinder Nega is the winner of Pen America's PEN/Barbara Goldsmith Freedom to Write Award for his endeavor for freedom of expression in an extremely inhospitable media landscape.
amh: እስክንድር ነጋ ሐሳብን በነፃ ለመግለፅ መብት በአደገኛ የመገናኛ ብዙሐን ድባብ ውስጥ ባደረገው ተጋድሎ የአሜሪካ ባርባራ ጎልድ ስሚዝ (ፔን)የመጻፍ ነፃነት ሽልማት አሸናፊ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Asokander Nganga is the winner of the American Barbara Goldsmith (PEN) Freedom of Expression Award for his fight for the right to free expression in a dangerous media environment.</s>

en: As the tension between China and Japan over the disputed Diaoyu Islands (also known as the Senkaku Islands) has elevated, large scale anti-Japan protests have taken place all over China in more than 80 cities over the weekend.
amh: በቻይና እና በጃፓን መካከል የዲያኦዩ (ወይም በሌላ ስሙ ሰንካኩ) ደሴት ባለቤትነት ይገባኛል ሲያይል፣ በቻይና ባለፈው ሳምንት መጨረሻ ላይ ከ80 በላይ በሚሆኑ ከተሞች መጠነ ሰፊ ፀረ-ጃፓን ሰልፎች ተካሂደዋልል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Last week in China, amid a dispute over the Diaoyū (or Sinkaku) island between China and Japan, there were small anti-Japanese rallies in over 80 cities last week.</s>

en: Some of the demonstrations turned violent, protesters started attacking Japanese style restaurants, shopping malls and shops; some even tried to set fire to Japanese vehicles.
amh: አንዳንዶቹ ሰልፎች ወደብጥብጥ ተሸጋግረዋል፤ ነውጠኞቹ በጃፓን ስታይል የተሰሩ ምግብ ቤቶችን፣ የመገበያያ አዳራሾችን እና ሱቆችን አጥቅተዋል፣ እንዲያውም አንዳንዶቹ የጃፓን መኪናዎችን ለማቃጠል ሞክረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Some protests turned into disorder; the rioters destroyed Japanese-style restaurants, shopping centers and shops, and even some of them tried to burn Japanese cars.</s>

en: Yet, in a country where online activities are closely monitored and public security forces are extremely effective, many wondered what made these nationwide protests possible.
amh: የመስመር ላይ እንቅስቃሴዎች የቅርብ ክትትል በሚደረግበት እና የመንግስት ደህንነት ኃይሎች በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ በሚተገበርበት አገር፣ ብዙዎች ይህን ያህል አመጽ እንዴት ሊከሰት እንደቻለ ተገርመዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In a country where online activity is closely monitored and government security forces are highly deployed, many people were surprised that such violence could happen.</s>

en: Free More News's video shows how protesters in Changsha attacked and mobbed a Japanese shopping center in September 15, 2012:
amh: መስከረም 5/2005 በሻንግሻ ከተማ አማጻዎቹ የጃፓን ሱቆችን እንዴት እንደዘረፉ እና እንዳጠቁ ለመመልከት የሚከተለውን ቪዲዮ ማየት ይቻላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> You can watch the video below to see how the protesters robbed and destroyed Japanese stores in Sangcha on September 5th, 2005.</s>

en: Coordination of protests

mt0: <pad> The violence of the protests</s>

en: Many netizens pointed out that the protests were coordinated via QQ groups, which are more private than other social media platforms such as Weibo.
amh: ብዙ የመረብ ዜጎች (netizens) አመጾቹ የተቀነባበሩት QQ በተባሉ ቡድኖች ሲሆን ዌቦ በተባለ እና ማሕበራዊ አውታር ሳይሆን ‹‹የግል›› መረጃ መለዋወጫ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many Internet citizens believe the protests were organized by QQ groups, a Webo-based and social network not a "social" network.</s>

en: From Sina Weibo, Mars explains :
amh: ሲና ዌቦ ይላል ማርስ :
mt0: <pad> Mars says Sina Webo.</s>

en: Protesters set fire to a car in Xian.

en: Weibo is not a popular platform.

mt0: <pad> Web is not a popular "platform."</s>

en: The anti-Japan propaganda is spreading via QQ groups and QQ space like a virus.
amh: የፀረ-ጃፓኑ ፕሮፓጋንዳ በQQ ቡድኖች እና በQQ ማስተላለፊያ አማካይነት እንደቫይረስ ነው የሚሰራጨው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Anti-Japanese propaganda is spreading like a virus through QQ groups and QQ transfers.</s>

en: The violent protesters are stirred up by these platforms.
amh: አማጺዎቹ የተቆሰቆሱት በዚህ ‹ፕላትፎርም› ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The rebels were inspired by this "platform."</s>

en: Also on Weibo, user Economist finds out that government civil servants were active in mobilizing the protests:
amh: ዌቦን በተጨማሪም፣ ተጠቃሚው የሆነ ኢከኖሚስት እንዳረጋገጠው የመንግስት ሰራተኞችም አመጹን ለማቀጣጠል እየተጠቀሙበት ይገኛል፡
mt0: <pad> Also, the user The Economicist confirmed that government employees are also using it to spark up the protests.</s>

en: I asked him about the background of the senders.
amh: አንድ ጓደኛዬ እና እኔ፣ ሁለታችንም ከተለያዩ ድሮ ኮሌጅ አብረውን ከተማሩ ሰዎች በተመሳሳይ የምግብ ሰዓት በQQ የአመጽ ጥሪ ጥሪ ደረሰን፡፡
mt0: <pad> My friend and I, both from different colleges, got involved in the QQ protest call at the same time.</s>

en: He said one is working for the land revenue bureau, one is working for a research center in a military corporation.
amh: መልዕክቱን ስለላኩት ልጆች ስጠይቀው፣ አንዱ ገቢዎች ቢሮ፣ ሌላኛው ደግሞ በሚሊቴሪ ኮርፖሬሽን የምርምር ማዕከል ውስጥ ነው የሚሰሩት
mt0: <pad> When I asked the children who sent the message, one of them worked in the Income Tax Office, the other in the Military Corporation Research Center.</s>

en: zy in boston raises a technical question:
amh: ዚ ቦስተን ሆኖ ወሳኝ ጥያቄ አንስቷል ፡
mt0: <pad> The Boston asked a crucial question.</s>

en: How come there are so many anti-Japan protesters in Shenzhen?
amh: እንዴት እነዚህ ሁሉ ፀረ-ጃፓን አማጺዎች በሼንዢን ሊኖሩ ቻሉ?
mt0: <pad> How can all these anti-Japanese rebels live in Shanghai?</s>

en: What about the three layers of monitoring existing in QQ?
amh: በQQ ውስጥ ያለው ሦስት ድርብ የቁጥጥር መረብስ የት ገባ?
mt0: <pad> Where did the triple-checked network in QQ go?</s>

en: Are all these functions suspended because of patriotism?
amh: ለአገር ጥቅም ሲባሉ እነዚህ ሁሉ ገደቦች ተነሱ?
mt0: <pad> Why were all these restrictions lifted for the country's good?</s>

en: Indeed over the past two days, even though words like Rally (游行) have not been searchable on social media platforms, the term Anti-Japan protest has not been banned.
amh: በርግጥም ባለፉት ሁለት ቀናት፣ እንደ ንቅናቄ/ትግል (游行) ያሉ ቃላት በማሕበራዊ አውታሮች ‹ፕላትፎርም› ላይ ተፈልገው የማይገኙ ቢሆንም ፀረ-ጃፓን አመጽ የሚለው ሐረግ ግን አልታገደም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Although the word "riot" has been banned from social media platforms for the past two days, the term anti-Japanese protests has not been banned.</s>

en: Words like Diaoyu Islands, Protect Diaoyu, Protest, and Crushing even appear in the hot topic search list.
amh: እንደ ዲያኦዩ ደሴት፣ ዲያኦዩን ተከላከል፣ አመጽ እና ግጭት የመሳሰሉት ቃላት ግን በመፈለጊያው የጦፈ ዝርዝር ላይ ይገኛሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> However, words like Diao Island, Diao's Defence, Rebellion and Clash are on the long list of search terms.</s>

en: Below is the screen capture of the Anti-Japan Protest (反日示威) search result:
amh: ከታች የሚታየው ፀረ-ጃፓን አመጽ (反日示威) ለሚለው ፍለጋ የተገኘው ውጤት ነው፡
mt0: <pad> The results below are the search for anti-Japanese protests.</s>

en: Behind the scenes?
amh: ከትዕይንቱ በስተጀርባ?
mt0: <pad> behind the scenes</s>

en: Hu Zimei raises a series of questions and wonders who exactly is behind the scenes:
amh: ሁ ዚሜ አግራሞት የሚያጭሩ ተከታታይ ጥያቄዎችን ‹ከትዕይንቱ በስተጀርባ ማን አለ› በማለት ያነሳል፡
mt0: <pad> The hypnotic sequence of questions "Who is behind the scenes" by Hu Zǐme arouses an agitation of wonder.</s>

en: Something is wrong.
amh: የሆነ ችግር አለ፡፡
mt0: <pad> something is wrong</s>
<pad> 1ኛ</s>

en: 40-50 cities are protesting at the same time; 2.
amh: ከ40-50 ከተሞች በአንድ ግዜ እያመጹ ነው፤ 2ኛ.
mt0: <pad> 40-50 cities are being attacked at once; 2nd.</s>

en: The total number of participants are not too many but the protests are rather destructive. Most of them are young men, they work together to launch attacks at some very specific targets; 3.
amh: ተሳታፊዎቹ በጣም ብዙ አይደሉም ነገር ግን ጥፋታቸው የጎላ ነው፤ ብዙዎቹ ታዳጊ ወንዶች ሲሆኑ አንድ ዒላማ ለማጥቃት በአንድነት ነው የሚዘምቱበት፤ 3ኛ.
mt0: <pad> The participants are not very many but they are dangerous; most of them are young men who go together to attack a target; 3rd. Most of them are teenagers who go together to attack a target;</s>

en: The riot police are not prepared; 4.
amh: አድማ በታኞች አልተዘጋጁም፤ 4ኛ.
mt0: <pad> The protesters were not prepared; 4th.</s>

en: The state-controlled media and opinion leaders consider the violent protests as radical expression of patriotism; 5.
amh: በመንግስት ይዞታ ያለው እና የአገሪቱ አስተያየት መሪ ተደርጎ የሚወሰደው መገናኛ ብዙሐን ክስተቱን እንደ ምክንያታዊ የአገር ጥቅም ጥያቄ ወስዶታል፤ 5ኛ.
mt0: <pad> The government-owned and country's opinion leader media took the event as a rational national interest question; 5th.</s>

en: All micro-blogs that show the violent scenes are deleted.
amh: ጥፋት አዘል አመጾችን የሚያሳዩ ጥቃቅን ጦማሮች ሳይቀሩ ተወግደዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Even small posters showing the destructive protests were removed.</s>

en: I wonder if this is organized violence that has nothing to do with people?
amh: ይህ የተቀነባበረ አመጽ ከሕዝቡ ጋር ምንም ግንኙነት ላይኖረው ይችል ይሆን እያልኩ እያሰብኩ ነው?
mt0: <pad> I'm wondering if this organized protest couldn't have any connection to the people.</s>

en: Some bloggers believe that the protest is related to the upcoming 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.
amh: አንዳንድ ጦማሪዎች አመጹ ከመጪው የ18ኛው የቻይና ኮሙኒስት ፓርቲ ብሔራዊ ኮንግረስ ጋር ግንኙነት ሊኖረው እንደሚችል ጠርጥረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Some bloggers speculate that the protests may have something to do with the upcoming 18th Chinese Communist Party National Conference.</s>

en: Some news reports have already pointed out that the numbers in the Politburo Standing Committee (top leadership of the Communist Party of China) will be reduced from 9 to 7 seats and the secretary of the Political and Legislative Committee will be dismissed from the core leadership.
amh: ሌሎች የዜና ወኪሎች ቀድሞውንም የፖሊት ቢሮ ቋሚ ኮሚቴ (የቻይና ኮሙኒስት ፓርቲ አመራር) አባላት ቁጥር ከ9 መቀመጫዎች ወደ 7 እንደሚቀንስና የፖለቲካ እና የሕግ ጉዳዮች ኮሚቴው ከዋና አመራርነት እንደሚወገድ ዘግበዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Other news agencies have previously reported that the number of members of the Politbureau Permanent Committee (the Chinese Communist Party's leadership) will be reduced from nine to seven and that the Committee on Political and Legal Affairs will be removed from the top leadership.</s>

en: The Committee is designed to oversee public security, law execution and judiciary in China and has been responsible for stability maintenance in the past few years.
amh: ኮሚቴው የተዋቀረው የሕዝብ ደህንነት፣ የሕግ አፈፃፀም እና ፍትሐዊነት በቻይና ያለበትን ሁኔታ ለመመልከት ሲሆን፣ ባለፉት ጥቂት ዓመታት ሰላምና መረጋጋትን የማስፈን ኃላፊነት ነበረበት፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Committee was established to review the state of public security, law enforcement and justice in China, which has been responsible for maintaining peace and order in recent years.</s>

en: Such an arrangement is believed to be related to the scandal of the former Chongqing party Secretary Bo Xilai, who is closely connected with the Head of the Public Security Bureau and the current Secretary of the Political and Legislative Committee, Zhou Yongkang.
amh: ይህ ዓይነቱ ተግባር የቀድሞው ቾንግቂንግ ፓርቲ ዋና ጸሐፊ እና ከሕዝብ ደህንነት ጋር የቅርብ ግንኙነት ያላቸው ቦ ዢላይ እና የአሁኑ የፖለቲካ እና የሕግ ጉዳዮች ኮሚቴ ጸሐፊ ዦው ዮንገካንግ ስህተት ተደርጎ ነው የሚቆጠረው፡፡
mt0: <pad> This kind of behavior is considered a mistake by the former Chungking Party chief secretary and closely linked to public security Bo Xilai and the current Political and Legal Affairs Committee Secretary Chou Yong-gang.</s>

en: Below are some of the speculations found on Weibo :
amh: ዜቦ ላይ የተገኙ ትንታነዎች ከታች ተቀምጠዋል ፡
mt0: <pad> The bones found on Zebo are arranged below.</s>

en: Tang Song history: The propaganda authorities and the Political and Legislative Committee are working together under some commands.
amh: - የፕሮፓጋንዳ ባለስልጣናት እና የፖለቲካ እና የሕግ ጉዳዮች ኮሚቴ በሆነ ትዕዛዝ አብረው እየሰሩ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The propaganda officials and the Committee on Political and Legal Affairs are working together under a specific order.</s>

en: This is what they want, an excuse for them to take action.
amh: እነርሱ የሚፈልጉት ለአደረጉት ነገር ይቅርታ እንዲጠየቁ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> They want them to apologize for what they did.</s>

en: Then they can re-enter the scene.
amh: ከዚያ፣ ቲያትሩን ድጋሚ ያስኬዱታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Then, they'll put the theater back on.</s>

en: This is their intention.
amh: ይኸው ነው ሕልማቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> That's their dream.</s>

en: They are the directors and you are the voluntary actors.
amh: እነርሱ አዛጋጆቹ ናቸው እናንተ ደግሞ ፈቃደኛ ተዋናዮች፡፡
mt0: <pad> They are the directors and you are the volunteer actors.</s>

en: Please think who are the victim and who gain from this?
amh: እባካችሁ ተጠቂዎቹ እነማን እንደሆኑና እነማን እንደሚጠቀሙ አስቡ?
mt0: <pad> Please think about who are the users and who uses it.</s>

en: History has be recurring through out all the dynasties.
amh: ታሪክ በየዘመናቱ ራሱን እየደገመ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> History repeats itself over and over again.</s>

en: Do we have to go through this again?
amh: አሁንም ደግመን ልናልፍበት ይገባናል?
mt0: <pad> Do we have to go through it again?</s>

en: RVP: Why there is no violent act in Taiwan and Hong Kong?
amh: - ለምንድን ነው በታይዋን እና ሆንግ ኮንግ አመጻዊ ድርጊት የሌለው?
mt0: <pad> Why is there no protests in Taiwan and Hong Kong?</s>

en: Only one reason, the Communists are self-directing the whole act.
amh: አንድ ምክንያት ብቻ ነው ያለው፣ ኮሙኒስቶቹ ሁሉንም ድርጊት በራስመር ትወና እየተጫወቱት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> One reason only, the communists are playing all the actions in a line-up play.</s>

en: Cry out loud: Can't you see?
amh: - አይታያችሁም?
mt0: <pad> Don't you see us?</s>

en: They are making use of the anti-Japan protest to express their anger at the government.
amh: የፀረ-ጀፓኑን አመጽ ሕዝቡ በመንግስታችን ላይ ያለውን ቁጭት እንዲወጣበት እያደረጉ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The anti-Japanese protests are making people vent their anger at our government.</s>

en: The Maoist Left is probably behind this.
amh: የማኦዎች ግራ ክንፍ ምናልባትም ከበስተጀርባ ይኖራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The left wing of the Maui may have been behind.</s>

en: The central authority is caught in the middle of internal and external tension.
amh: ማዕከላዊው ባለስልጣን በውስጣዊውም ውጪያውውም ውጥረት መሃል ተገኝቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The central authority has been found between internal and external tension.</s>

en: Rational voices
amh: ምክንያታዊ ድምጾች
mt0: <pad> Reasonable voices</s>

en: While angry patriots are in the street protesting, cooler heads do prevail online as the Tea Leaf Nation pointed out .
amh: የተበሳጩ አገርወዳዶች በየጎዳናው ሲያምጹ፣ ቲ ሊፍ ኔሽን እንደጠቆመው ፣ ደህነኞቹ አሳቢዎች በመስመር ላይ ጥያቄያቸውን እያቀረቡ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> As angry patriots march down the streets, T-Life Nation notes, the more sober thinkers are asking questions online.</s>

en: Below are some of my picks from the more rational voices:
amh: ከታች ያሉት ምክንያታዊ ከሚባሉት ውስጥ የመረጥኩላችሁ ጥቂቶቹ ናቸው፡
mt0: <pad> The ones I selected from the rational ones are the few of you.</s>

en: WeMarketing: I know a bit more about China in this violent protest.
amh: - በዚህ አመጽ አዘል አመጽ ስለቻይና ጥቂት አውቃለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I know very little about China during this protest-filled protest.</s>

en: We are now in 2012, but history still keeps recurring.
amh: አሁን በ2012 ላይ ነን፣ ታሪክ ግን እራሱን ይደጋግማል፡፡
mt0: <pad> We are now in 2012, but history repeats itself.</s>

en: This is in the name of anti-Japan, next time in the name of anti-capitalists, or anti-foreigners.
amh: አሁን በፀረ-ጃፓን ስም ነው፣ ቀጥሎ በፀረ-ካፒታሊስ፣ ወይም በፀረ-የውጭ ዜጎች፡፡
mt0: <pad> Now it's anti-Japan, then anti-capitalist, or anti-foreigners.</s>

en: If you are among the group of people being targeted at, you can't protect your property and your own safety.
amh: ዒላማ ውስጥ ከገቡ ቡድኖች መካከል ከሆናችሁ፣ ንብረታችሁን እና የገዛ ራሳችሁን ማዳን አትችሉም፡፡
mt0: <pad> If you are one of the targeted groups, you can't protect your property and yourself.</s>

en: Boxer rebellion, Red Guards, patriotic thugs, one generation after other.
amh: ቡጢኛ አማጺዎች፣ ቀያይ ዘበኞች፣ አርበኛ አጋሰሶች፣ እያለ አንዱ ትውልድ ሌላኛውን ይተካል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The bandits, the red guards, the warriors, as one generation replaced the other.</s>

en: hut in the city: In history, both the Boxer and the Red Guard are used as weapons and then turned into scapegoats.
amh: - በታሪክ፣ ቡጢኛው እና ቀይ ዘበኛው እንደመሳሪያ ካገለገሉ በኋላ እንደጠፉ ፍየሎች ተቆጠሩ፡፡
mt0: <pad> In history, the buck and the red knight were considered as beasts of prey after being used as tools.</s>

en: Don't join the angry youth.
amh: የተናደዳችሁ ወጣቶች ሆይ አትቀላቀሏቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> angry young people, don't join them.</s>

en: Who will gain from these violent acts?
amh: ከነዚህ አመጾች ማን ያተርፋል?
mt0: <pad> Who will survive these protests?</s>

en: Please just use your brain.
amh: - ጃፓኖቹ ብልሖች ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Japanese people are smart.</s>

en: They make use of a 7 kilometre square piece of land to stir up the crazies all over China's 960 million square meters of territories.
amh: 7 ኪሎሜትር ስኩዌር መሬት በመጠቀም 960 ሚሊዮን ስኩዌር ሜትር የአሸባሪዎች መሬት ላይ የሰፈሩትን ሁሉ ያሳብዳሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> 7 km2 of land will expose all the terrorists on 960 million sq. m. of terrorist land.</s>

en: Some of us still feel that they are heroes.
amh: አንዳንዶቻችን አሁንም ጀግኖች እንደሆኑ ሁሉ ይሰማናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Some of us still feel like heroes.</s>

en: My mother asked what would happened if the war started?
amh: እናቴ ጦርነቱ ቢጀመር ምን ሊከሰት እንደሚችል ትጠይቀኛለች?
mt0: <pad> My mother always asks me what could happen if the war starts.</s>

en: I said I am not afraid of war but I am afraid of the Cultural Revolution.
amh: እኔ ስለጦርነት አልፈራም፣ የምፈራው ስለባሕል አብዮቱ ነው አልኳት፡፡
mt0: <pad> I don't fear war, I fear cultural revolution, I told her.</s>

en: As the violence has elevated, riot police have adopted stronger measures.
amh: አመጹ እንደተጧጧፈ፣ አድማ በታኝ ፖሊሶች ጠንካራ እርምጃ ወሰዱ፡፡
mt0: <pad> As the protests intensified, anti-riot police took strong action.</s>

en: However, as the anniversary of the Muken Incident is approaching on September 18, the anti-Japanese sentiment may continue to grow in the next few days.
amh: ምንም እንኳን፣ ሙከን ክስተት ክብረበዓል መስከረም 8/2005 ቢሆንም ፀረ-ጃፓን እንደተሟሟቀ ጥቂት ቀናት ሊቀጥል ይችላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Although the anniversary of the explosion event is September 8/2005, anti-Japanese sentiment may remain heated for a few days.</s>

en: An Iranian official, Abdolsamad Khoramabadi, said this was due to a request by the public to oppose an anti-Islam film on YouTube that many see as blasphemous (Google owns YouTube).
amh: ኢራናዊው ባለስልጣን አብዶልሰመድ ኮራማባዲ እንደተናሩት እገዳው የተላለፈበተት ምክንያት ህዝቡ ብዙዎች እንደ ስድብ ቃል የሚያዩት በዩቱዩብ የሚገኘውን ጸረ እስላም ፊልም እንዲቃወሙ ነው (ዩቲዩብ የጎግል ንብረት ነው)፡፡
mt0: <pad> The ban was imposed to protest a film on YouTube that many people see as an insult to Islam (YouTube is owned by Google).</s>

en: Khoramabadi is a key member of a Commission to Determine Instances of Criminal Content”.
amh: ኮራማባዲ የወንጀል ይዘት ያላቸው ቅጽበቶች ድንጋጌ ኮሚሽን” ቁልፍ አባል ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Karamanlis is a key member of the "Crime-Plagued Expressions Regulation Commission."</s>

en: Meanwhile some speculate that the true reason for blocking Google has more to do with promoting the so called Iranian national Internet which was supposed to become operational on 22 September, but has so far not appeared.
amh: ይህ በእንዲህ እንዳለ እንዳንዶች የጎግል መታገድ እውነተኛው ምክንያት ከመስከረም 22 ጀምሮ ስራ ይጀመራል ተብሎ የሚጠበቀውን እስካሁን ግን ብቅ ያላለውን የኢራናውያን ብሔራዊ በየነ መረብ የበለጠ ለማስተዋወቅ ነው ሲሉ ከወዲሁ ግምታቸውን አስቀምጠዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> While some speculate that the real reason for Google's ban is to promote the Iranian National Internet Network, which is due to start on September 22, but has yet to be launched.</s>

en: Cartoon by Mana Neyestani.
amh: ካርቶን በማና ናይስታኔ ምንጭ፡
mt0: <pad> Cartoon by Mana Neystane source</s>

en: Source: Internet Freedom Project on Facebook
amh: የበየነ መረብ ነጻነት ፕሮጀክት በፌስቡክ
mt0: <pad> The Internet Freedom Project on Facebook</s>

en: Global Voices contacted several Iranians in different cities including Tehran, Shiraz and Qom. Almost all say they have no access to Gmail.
amh: የአለም ድምጸች ቴህራን፣ ሺራዝ እንዲሁም ቆምን ጨምሮ በተለያዩ ከተሞች የሚኖሩ በርካታ ኢራናውያንን አነጋግሯል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The World Voices has interviewed many Iranians living in different cities, including Tehran, Shariza and Qom.</s>

en: A number of them are also unable to access Google search.
amh: ሁሉም ማለት ይቻላል ጂሜልን መጠቀም እንዳልቻሉ ተናግረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Everyone said they couldn't use Gmail.</s>

en: Arash Abadpour, a Canada-based Iranian blogger and computer scientist explained the situation to Global Voices as following:
amh: በርካታ ቁጥር ያላቸው ደግሞ ጎግል ፈልግን መጠቀም እንዳልቻሉ ጨምረው ተናግረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many more said they couldn't use Google Search.</s>

en: Cutting off access to Google Search essentially pushes a significantly larger population towards looking for ways to be able to get around the filtering regime.
amh: መቀመጫውን በካናዳ ያደረገው ኢራናዊ ጦማሪ እና የኮምፒዩተር ተመራማሪ አራሽ አባደፑር ለአለም ድምጾች ሁኔታውን እንደሚከተለው አብራርቷል፤
mt0: <pad> Canadian-based Iranian blogger and computer expert Arash Abedpur describes the situation to the World Voices as follows:</s>

en: A result of this process is not necessarily a better or more free Internet, but, nevertheless, the current course of action is not going to help the Iranian establishment either.
amh: የሂደቱም ውጤት የግድ በየነ መረብ የተሻለ” ፣ የበለጠ ነጻ” እንዲሆን ላይሆን ይችላል፡፡ ግና ግና አሁን እየተካሄደ ያለው ተግባር ኢራናውያን በሁለት እግራቸው እንዲቆሙ የሚረዳቸው አይደለም፡፡
mt0: <pad> The result of the process may not necessarily make the Internet "better," "more open." But what is now being done is not helping Iranians stand on their two feet.</s>

en: They are pushing people towards a more vigilant approach to the Internet.
amh: እነርሱ ህዝቡን እየገፉት ያሉት የበለጠ ጥንቃቄ ወደሚያሻው የበየነ መረብ አገልግሎት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> They're pushing people towards a more secure internet service that requires more care.</s>

en: They are telling people go learn how to use a VPN, and I foresee that being exactly what is going to happen.
amh: ለህዝቡ እየነገሩት ያሉት ይሄንን ነው ሂዱ ቪፒኤን እንዴት መጠቀም እንዳለባችኹ ተማሩ” እናም በእርግጠኝነት ምን እንደሚፈጠር መተንበይ እችላለው፡፡
mt0: <pad> This is what they're telling people: "Go and learn how to use VPN." So I can predict exactly what will happen.</s>

en: A Facebook campaign has launched to call for Internet freedom and the right to access Google.
amh: የበየነ መረብ ነጻነትን እና ጎግል የመጠቀም መብትን ለመጠየቅ የፌስቡክ ዘመቻ ይፋ ተደርጓል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Facebook launched a campaign to demand internet freedom and the right to use Google.</s>

en: Mana Neyestani's cartoon (right) on Google being filtered is eye-catching on this Facebook page.
amh: ጎግል ሲጠል የሚያሳየው የማና ነይስታኒ ካርቱንም (በቀኝ በኩል) በዚህ የፌስቡክ ገጽ አይነ ገብ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The cartoon of Man and the Neist (right) showing Google when it is hated is also featured on this Facebook page.</s>

en: Several Iranian netizens also tweeted about the filtering with irony.
amh: በርካታ ኢራናውያን የበየነ መረብ ተጠቃሚዎች በውስጠ ዘ ስለማጥለሉ ተውተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many Iranian internet users have been blocked from the Internet due to domestic censorship.</s>

en: Behran Tajdin tweeted :
amh: ባህራን ታጅዲን ይህን ትዊት አደረገ ፤
mt0: <pad> Bahar Tajdini tweeted this.</s>

en: @Behrang: This public who requested Google filtering, did they not have gmail accounts?
amh: @Behrang፤ እነዚህ ጎግል እንዲጠል የጠየቁ ህዝቦች” የጄሜል አድራሻ የላቸውም?
mt0: <pad> @Behrang; Do the people who asked Google to be banned have an email address?</s>

en: If they had, what do they use them for?
amh: ካላቸው ለምን ነበር የሚጠቅሟቸው ?
mt0: <pad> Why were they needed?</s>

en: Saye Roshan tweeted :
amh: ሳዬ ሮሻን ትዊት አደረገ፤
mt0: <pad> Sayy Rose Khan tweeted.</s>

en: @sayeeeeh: We blocked Gmail and Google, we brought up the rate for the dollar, I doubt we can make life harder for the USA with these actions.
amh: @sayeeeeh ፤ እኛ ጎግል እና ጂሜልን አግደናል፤ የዶላርን የዋጋ ተመን ከፍ አድርገናል፤ በዚህ ተግባራችን የአሜሪካዉያንን ህይወት ማክበድ እንደምንችል እጠራጠራለው፡፡
mt0: <pad> @sayeeeeh, We have banned Google and Gmail; we have raised the dollar's value; I wonder if we can change the lives of Americans with our actions.</s>

en: In reality the primary victim in this decision is not Google, but the freedom of Iranians.
amh: በእውነቱ የዚህ ውሳኔ ቀዳሚ ተጠቂ ጎግል ሳይሆን የኢራናውያን ነጻነት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In fact, the main victim of this decision is Google not Iran's freedom.</s>

en: It seems even virtual freedoms are too much for the Islamic regime.
amh: ለእስላማዊ ስርዓት የበየነ መረብ ነጻነት እጅግ የሚበዛ ይመስላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> For the Islamic system, internet freedom seems too much.</s>

en: Proscovia Alengot Oromait has become Africa's youngest Member of Paliament (MP) at the age of 19, after she won the Usuk county election with 11,059 votes.
amh: ፕሮስኮቪያ አሌንጎት ኦሮሚያት በ19 ዓመቷ የአፍሪካ በዕድሜ ትንሽዋ የፓርላማ አባል የሆነችው የኡሱክ ክልል ምርጫን በ11,059 ድምጽ ካሸነፈች በኋላ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Procovia Alenga Oroma, 19, became the youngest member of the African parliament after winning the Usk Region election with 11,059 votes.</s>

en: The outspoken youngster replaces her father who died earlier this year.
amh: ብዙ የተነገረላት ይህች ወጣት በዚህ (የአውሮጳውያን) ዓመት መጀመሪያ ላይ በሞት የተለዩትን አባቷን በፓርላማ ትተካቸዋለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> The much-rumored young woman will replace her father in the European Parliament at the beginning of this year.</s>

en: Alengot is a member of National Resistance Movement, headed by President Yoweri Museveni.
amh: አሌንጎት በፕሬዚደንት ዮዌሪ ሙሴቬኒ የሚመራው የብሔራዊ ሬዚስታንስ ንቅናቄ አባል ናት፡፡
mt0: <pad> Alengota is a member of the National Resistance Movement, led by President Yoweri Museveni.</s>

en: Many people have come out to congratulate her, whilst some are saying she will not survive her term in parliament because of her age and limited experience.
amh: ብዙ ሰዎች ደስታቸውን ሊገልፁላት ወጥተዋል፤ ሌሎች ደግሞ በውሱን ልምዷና ዕድሜዋ ምክንያት በፓርላማ ጊዜዋ እንደማይሳካላት ስጋታቸውን ገልፀዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many people went out to express their joy; others feared that because of her limited experience and age she would not be able to succeed in her parliamentary time.</s>

en: Some people believe this is the beginning of change in Africa and its time to get rid of the overly old leaders and allow young people to take the continent forward.
amh: አንዳንዶች ይህ በአፍሪካ የሚመጣው ለውጥ መጀመሪያ እንደሆነ እየተናገሩ ነው፤ እናም ይህ ከመጠንበላይ የጃጁ የአፍሪካ መሪዎችን አስወግዶ በወጣቶች ለመተኪያ እና ወደፊት ለመራመጂ ጊዜው ነው ይላሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Some people are talking about the start of change in Africa; and that it is time to remove over-age African leaders and replace them with young people and move forward.</s>

en: Hon. Alengot's area faces challenges of clean water, electricity and poor roads among others.
amh: የተከበረች አልንጎት መኖሪያ አካባቢ ከፍተኛ የውሃ፣ ኤሌክትሪክ ኃይል እና በአግባቡ የተጠረገ መንገድ ችግር አለበት፡፡
mt0: <pad> The prestigious Alango settlement has high water, electric power and poorly paved roads.</s>

en: For now the people of Usuk have their hopes pinned on the 19 year-old MP.
amh: ለአሁን የኡሱክ ሕዝቦች በ19 ዓመቷ ወካያቸው የፓርላማ አባል ላይ ተስፋቸውን ጥለዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Now the Usuk people have put their hopes on their 19 year old parliamentarian.</s>

en: Hopefully, she will be in position to represent her area and develop it.
amh: የመኖሪያ አካባቢዋን በአግባቡ እንደምትወክል ተስፋ አለ፡፡
mt0: <pad> She is hoped to represent her neighborhood well.</s>

en: Google map of Alengo's constituency:
amh: የአሌንጎ ሰፈር በGoogle map፡
mt0: <pad> The neighborhood of Alengo on Google map</s>

en: View Larger Map
amh: ካርታውን አጉልተው ይመልከቱት
mt0: <pad> Open the map and look at it.</s>

en: Some citizen media comments are sampled below:
amh: አንዳንድ የዜጎች መገናኛ ብዙሐን አስተያየታቸውን እንደሚከተለው አስፍረዋል፡
mt0: <pad> Some citizens media expressed their comments as follows:</s>

en: Young women powering change! 19 year old Proscovia Alengot Oromait elected to Uganda Parliament. http://fb.me/28DoJ2IUr
amh: የወጣት ሴቶች የስልጣን ለውጥ! የ19 ዓመቷ ፕሮስኮቪያ አሌንጎት ኦሮማይት የኡጋንዳ ፓርላማ አባል ሆና ተመረጠች http://fb.
mt0: <pad> The power of young women! 19 year old Procovia Allende Oromaite has been elected to the Ugandan parliament as a member.</s>

en: Joy Doreen Biira requests someone to teach Ms Alomait the basics she needs to learn as an MP:
amh: ጆይ ዶረን ቢራ ደግሞ ወይዘሪት አሌንጎትን የፓርላማ ውስጥ መሰረታዊ ስርዓቶችን የሆነ ሰው እንዲያስተምራት ጠይቋል፡
mt0: <pad> Johnny Durand-Blair also asked Ms. Alengot to have someone teach the basic procedures of the parliament.</s>

en: @JoyDoreenBiira: Alengot Oromait, 19 years old is now a MP in Uganda....
amh: - አሌንጎት ኦሮሚያት፣ አሁን የ19 ዓመት የኡጋንዳ ፓርላማ አባል ናት….
mt0: <pad> Alengota Oroma, now a 19 year old Ugandan MP, is an Oromo.</s>

en: Very Good.
amh: በጣም ጥሩ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Very good.</s>

en: But can someone home-school her on the basics she needs to know else...
amh: ግን የሆነ ሰው ማወቅ ባለባት መሰረታዊ ጉዳይ ላይ የቤት ውስጥ ትምህርት ሊሰጣት ይችላል.
mt0: <pad> But someone can teach her a homeschool on something she should know.</s>

en: Commenting on New Vision website, Agambagye Frank thinks its good that she was elected and believes this is how democracy should be:
amh: በኒው ቪዥን ድረአምባ ላይ አስተያየቱን ሲያሰፍር አጋምባዬ ፍራንክ መመረጧ ጥሩ መሆኑን ገልፆ ዴሞክራሲ እንዲህ መሆን አለበት ብሎ እንደሚያስብ ተናግሯል፡
mt0: <pad> When he commented on the New Vision website, Agnew said that she thought it was good for Frank to be elected and that he thought democracy should be like this.</s>

en: thats why democracy is good pple voted her
amh: ዴሞክራሲ ደግነቱ ይኸው ነው፤ ሕዝቦች መረጧት
mt0: <pad> This is the beauty of democracy; the people have elected them.</s>

en: Commenting on a story on the Monitor website, nkuutu urges advises the MP to concentrate on her studies, as the MP seat can be lost at anytime and she may have to look for a job:
amh: ሞኒተር ድረአምባ ላይ ደግሞ፣ ንኩንቱ የሚጠይቀው የፓርላማው ወንበር በማንኛውም ሰዓት ተወስዶ፣ ሥራ መፈለግ ልትጀምር ስለምትችል አዲሷ የፓርላማ አባል በትምህርቷ ላይ ትኩረት እንድታደርግ ነው፡
mt0: <pad> On the Monitor, Nkuntun asked the new MP to concentrate on her education as the parliamentary seat can be taken away at any time and she could start looking for work.</s>

en: I just have one piece of advice for the hon MP: Don't worry, be happy.
amh: ለተከበርሽው የፓርላማ አባል አንድ ብቻ ምክር አለኝ፡ - አትጨነቂ፣ ተደሰቺ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I only have one advice for the honorable MP: Don't worry, enjoy.</s>

en: This might be the only time in your life to shine!
amh: ይህ በሕየወት ዘመንሽ ደምቀሽ የምትታዪበት ብቸኛው ጊዜ ሊሆን ይችላል!
mt0: <pad> This might be the only time you'll look so beautiful in your life.</s>

en: Come next elections ....who knows.
amh: የሚቀጥለው ምርጫ ላይም ነይ… ማንያውቃል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Maybe next election... who knows</s>

en: Don't forget your day job ...I mean your studies.
amh: የቀን ሥራሽንም አትዘንጊ… ማለቴ ትምህርትሽን፡፡
mt0: <pad> Don't forget your day job... that is, your school.</s>

en: No one will give you a job with a CV with ex-MP but no qualification.
amh: ማንም የቀድሞ የፓርላማ አባል ያለትምህርት ደረጃ በሚል CV ሥራ ሊሰጥሽ አይፈቅድም፡፡
mt0: <pad> No former MP will allow you to get a job on your CV with no education.</s>

en: Anyone can be an MP, but not everyone is educated.
amh: ማንም የፓርላማ አባል መሆን ይችላል፣ ሁሉም ግን የተማረ አይደለም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Nobody can be a member of the parliament, but not everyone is educated.</s>

en: Congrats!!
amh: እንኳን ደስ ያለሽ!!
mt0: <pad> Happy birthday to you!</s>

en: ProWoman thinks people are treating Ms Alengot like a baby.
amh: ፕሮውማን ሰዎች ወይዘሪት አሌንጎትን እንደ ሕፃን እየተመለከቷት እንደሆነ ታስባለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> Prouman thought that the people were treating Miss Alengot as a child.</s>

en: She goes on to tell them to let her think for herself because she is an adult:
amh: አዋቂ በመሆኗ ስለራስዋ ራስዋ እንድታስብ ለአስተያየት ሰጪዎቹ መክራለች፡-
mt0: <pad> As a mature person, she advised the commenters to think about themselves:</s>

en: Proscovia does not need too much advice.
amh: ፐሮስኮቪያ ብዙ ምክር አያስፈልጋትም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Proscovia doesn't need much advice.</s>

en: You guys are treating her like a baby.
amh: እናንተ ሰዎች እንደሕፃን እያያችኋት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> You people are looking at me like a child.</s>

en: At 19 she's an adult.
amh: የ19 ዓመት አዋቂ ናት፡፡
mt0: <pad> She is 19 years old.</s>

en: Why is every man trying to be a parent to her?
amh: ትምህርት እቤት ውስጥ ነው የሚጀምረው፤ ለምንድን ነው ሁሉም ወንድ ደርሶ ወላጅዋ ሊሆን የሚሞክረው?
mt0: <pad> Education begins at home; why does every man want to be her father?</s>

en: Leave this young woman alone to think critically for herself.
amh: ይህችን ታዳጊ ሴት ስለራሷ በአፅንኦት እንድታስብ ተዋት፡፡
mt0: <pad> Let this young girl think about herself a lot.</s>

en: It seems that there are too many cooks around.
amh: ብዙ ወጥ አብሳይ የበዛ ይመስለኛል፡፡

en: The fake (supposedly hacked) @PMMelesZenawi Twitter account, which managed to set off the debate mentioned above, also raises the question of why many public figures and politicians in Africa haven’t had their Twitter accounts verified.
amh: የውሸቱ (ምናልባትም የተጠለፈው) የ@PMMelesZenawi የትዊተር አካውንት፣ ከላይ ያየነውን ክርክር ከማስነሳቱም በላይ ብዙ የአፍሪካ መሪዎች እና ታዋቂ ሰዎች የትዊተር አካውንታቸውን እውነተኝነት አለማረጋገጣቸውን እንደጥያቄ አስነስቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The fake (probably hacked) @PMMelesZenawi Twitter account, beyond the above discussion, raised the question whether many African leaders and celebrities verify their Twitter accounts.</s>

en: Reportedly, in many cases Twitter takes too long, or simply never respond to requests for verifying accounts.
amh: ከዚህ በፊት እንደተነገረው፣ ትዊተር እንዲህ ዓይነት አካውንቶችን ማረጋገጫ እንዲያስቀምጥ ሲጠየቅ ወይ ለረዥም ጊዜ መልስ ሳይሰጥ ይቆያል አሊያም ደግሞ ከናካቴው መልስ ሳይሰጥ ይቀራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> As previously mentioned, Twitter either lags in responding to request for verification of such accounts or doesn't respond at all.</s>

en: Twitter is extremely popular in Tanzania as a tool for exchanging views and debate and also as a platform for breaking news.
amh: በታንዛንያ ከፍተኛ ዝነኝነት ያገኘው ትዊተር አመለካከቶችን እና ክርክሮችን ያስተናግዳል፣ ለሰበር ዜናዎችም እንደማስተላለፊያ ምንጭ እየሆነ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Twitter, which has gained widespread popularity in Tanzania, is a forum for opinion and discussion, and has also become a source of news.</s>

en: Twitter, however, can easily be abused as in @PMMelesZenawi case, and can also cause confusion and suspicion with regard to authenticity and reliability of sources.
amh: በተቃራኒው ግን፣ ትዊተር ልክ አሁን በ@PMMelesZenawi አካውንት እንደሆነው ሁሉ በቀላሉ ሊጭበረበሩበት ይችላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> But on the other hand, Twitter can be easily manipulated just like the @PMMelesZenawi account is now.</s>

en: Meles Zenawi was President of Ethiopia from 1991 to 1995 and later became the Prime Minister of Ethiopia in 1995 following the general elections that year.
amh: አ. ከ ከ1991 እስከ 1995 የኢትዮጵያ ፕሬዚደንት እና በ1995 በተካሄደው ጠቅላላ ምርጫ የኢትዮጵያ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር ነበሩ፡፡
mt0: <pad> A. was the president of Ethiopia from 1991 to 1995 and the prime minister of Ethiopia after the 1995 general election.</s>

en: Hibiscus is a Global Voices project designed to amplify Sino-Africa conversations taking place online and create dialogue about the relationship between China and Africa, specifically encouraging conversations between bloggers in both regions and those outside the region who write about the China-Africa relationship.
amh: ሒቢስከስ የቻይና እና አፍሪካ ግንኙነትን በተመለከተ ነገረ ውይይቶችን በመስመር ላይ ለማስተጋባት የተፈጠረ ‘የዓለም ድምጾች’ (Global Voices) ፕሮጀክት ነው፡፡ በተለይም ደግሞ በሁለቱም ክልሎች ያሉ ጦማሪዎች እና ከዚያም ውጪ ያሉትን የጋራ ውይይትን ለማበረታታት ይሠራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Hibiscus is a Global Voices project created to reflect on the issues of China and Africa relations. It works primarily to encourage shared discussion among both regions' bloggers and beyond.</s>

en: Chinese interest and presence in Africa has increased rapidly in the last few years and the country has become Africa's largest trading partner.
amh: የቻይና ትኩረት በአፍሪካ ላይ በከፍተኛ ፍጥነት የጨመረው ባለፉት ጥቂት ዓመታት ሲሆን አሁን አገሪቱን የአፍሪካ ትልቋ የንግድ ሸሪክ አድርጓታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> China's focus on Africa has grown exponentially in the past few years and has now made it the biggest trade partner of Africa.</s>

en: Trade between China and Africa increased by more than 22 percent year-over-year to $80.5 billion in the first five months of 2012, writes Mike King quoting figures from China’s Ministry of Commerce.
amh: በቻይና እና አፍሪካ መካከል የተደረገው የንግድ ልውውጥ ባለፉት 5 የ2012 ወሮች ውስጥ የዓመት ለዓመት ንፅፅሩ በ22 በመቶ ሲያድግ መጠኑ 80.
mt0: <pad> China and Africa trade volume in the past 5 months of 2012 grew by 22% year on year, with 80% of the total volume.</s>

en: As part of this project, we will regularly feature blogs or any other social media sites that focus on the China-Africa relationship.
amh: 5 ቢሊዮን ዶላር ደርሷል  በማለት የቻይና የንግድ ሚኒስቴርን ጠቅሶ ማይክ ኪንግ ጽፏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Chinese trade ministry quoted Mike King as saying that the amount of US exports to China has exceeded $5 billion.</s>

en: Today we are introducing to you China in Africa: The Real Story blog, written by Deborah Brautigam, author of The Dragon's Gift: The Real Story of China in Africa.
amh: ዛሬም፣ ቻይና በአፍሪካ፤ እውነተኛው ታሪክ የሚለውን በዲቦራ ብሮቲጋም (የThe Dragon's Gift: The Real Story of China in Africa ድራሲ) የተጻፈውን ጦማር እናስነብባችኋለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> Today, we're going to read a blog by Deborah Borthagem (author of The Dragon's Gift: The Real Story of China in Africa) called China in Africa: The True Story.</s>

en: Banner in Beijing in November 1996, during the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation.

mt0: <pad> a banner hanging at the 1996 China-Africa Forum in Beijing</s>
