en: Deborah Brautigam is:
amh: ዲቦራ ብሮቲጋም:
mt0: <pad> Deborah Brooks</s>

en: Professor and Director, International Development Program, Johns Hopkins University/SAIS; senior research fellow at IFPRI, and author of The Dragon's Gift: The Real Story of China in Africa (Oxford U. Press, 2009, 2011).
amh: Professor and Director, ጆን ሆፕኪንስ ዩኒቨርስቲ፣ የዓለም አቀፍ የልማት ፕሮግራም ፕሮፌሰር እና ዳይሬክተር ናቸው፤ በተጨማሪም የ IFPRI መራኄ ተመራማሪ ፌሎው፣ እና የ The Dragon's Gift: The Real Story of China in Africa (Oxford U.
mt0: <pad> Professor and Director, John Hopkins University, International Development Program; also the IFPRI lead researcher, and author of The Dragon's Gift: The Real Story of China in Africa (Oxford U.</s>

en: A China scholar, I first went to Africa in 1983 to research Chinese engagement and never stopped.
amh: የቻይና ምሁር ሲሆኑ፣ መጀመሪያ ወደ አፍሪካ የመጡት እ.
mt0: <pad> He was a Chinese student, and first came to Africa in the year 1835.</s>

en: China in Africa: The Real Story won the Danwei Model Worker Awards 2012, which is a list of the best specialist websites, blogs and online sources of information about China.
amh: ቻይና በአፍሪካ፤ እውነተኛው ታሪክ የዳንዌይ አርአያ ሠራተኛ ሽልማት 2012 አሸናፊ ነው፤ ዳንዌይ ስለቻይና የተመረጡ ልዩ የድረአምባ፣ ጦማር እና የመስመር ላይ የመረጃ ምንጮች ዝርዝር ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> China in Africa: The True Story is the winner of the Danwei Pioneer Employee Award 2012; Danwei is a list of special websites, blogs and online information sources selected for China.</s>

en: Below are some of interesting stories that Deborah Brautigam has written about the Chinese presence in Africa.
amh: ከዚህ በታች የምናቀርብላችሁ በዲቦራ ብሮቲጋም ስለቻይና በአፍሪካ መገኘት የተጻፉ ጥቂት ማራኪ ታሪኮች ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The following are some of the fascinating stories by Deborah Brown about China's presence in Africa.</s>

en: Learning Chinese in Zambia':
amh: ቻይኒኛን በዛምቢያ መማር':
mt0: <pad> Learn Chinese in Zambia</s>

en: A growing number of students are producing really first rate field research on China in Africa.
amh: ቻይና በአፍሪካን በተመለከተ የመጀመሪያ ደረጃ የመስክ ጥናት የሚያደርጉ ተማሪዎች ቁጥር እያደገ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> China is increasing the number of first-class field studies on Africa.</s>

en: I recently read the M.A. thesis of Arwen Hoogenbosch
amh: በቅርቡ ያነበብኩት አንድ የአርወን ሁግንቦሽ ኤም.
mt0: <pad> I recently read an Armenian Higgins email.</s>

en: Arwen spent several months doing participant observation, enrolled in a Chinese language school in Zambia
amh: አርወን ብዙ ወራት ያጠፋው በዛምቢያ የቻይና ቋንቋ ትምህርት ቤት የተማሪዎችን/ተሳታፊዎችን አስተያየት ሲያጠና ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Aryan spent many months studying the feedback of Chinese language school students/participants in Zambia.</s>

en: (which has both a Confucius Institute and a private-for-profit Chinese language school).
amh: (ትምህርት ቤቱ የኮንፉሺየሽ ተቋም እና ለትርፍ ያልተቋቋመ የቻይንኛ ቋንቋ ትምህርት ቤት አለው፡፡ )
mt0: <pad> The school has a Confucius Temple and a non-profit Chinese language school.</s>

en: He got to know his fellow students, and reports on their varied goals and hopes for learning Chinese.
amh: አርወን አብረውት ለተለያየ ዓላማ እና ተስፋ ውስጥ ቻይኒኛ ያጠኑ ተማሪዎችን ሪፖርት አይቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Arlene has seen the reports of students who learned Chinese with her for different purposes and hopes.</s>

en: She continues:
amh: ተመራማሪዋ ቀጥለውም ይናገራሉ:
mt0: <pad> The researcher continued to speak.</s>

en: Arwen's analysis of the motives for Zambians to study Chinese is thoughtful.
amh: የአርወን ትንታኔ እንደሚያስረዳው፣ ዛምቢያዎች ቻይኒኛ የሚያጠኑት አርቀው በማሰብ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Arwen theory suggests that the Zambians learn Chinese in order to think ahead.</s>

en: Some thought it would advance their job prospects, although Arwen writes: it appears that Chinese companies prefer Chinese skilled employees.
amh: አንዳንዶች የሥራ አድማሳቸውን እንደሚያሰፋላቸው ያስባሉ፤ ነገር ግን አርወን በጽሑፉ እንዲህ ይላል፡
mt0: <pad> Some people think it will expand their work area; but Aryan writes in his book that it will not.</s>

en: I think there is a lot more potential for Africans who speak Chinese than perhaps Arwen does.
amh: የቻይና ኩባንያዎች በቻይና የሰለጠኑ ተቀጣሪዎችን ይፈልጋሉ፡፡   አርወን ከሚችለው ቻይኒኛ የተሸለ የሚናገሩ ብዙ አፍሪካውያን ሳይኖሩ አይቀሩም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Chinese companies want employees trained in Chinese. There are many Africans who can speak Chinese better than they can speak Armenian.</s>

en: I'm current in Ethiopia and seeing some fascinating examples of Chinese companies employing Ethiopians at a high management level.
amh: አርወን ከሚችለው ቻይኒኛ የተሸለ የሚናገሩ ብዙ አፍሪካውያን ሳይኖሩ አይቀሩም፡፡
mt0: <pad> There are many Africans who can speak Chinese better than Armenian.</s>

en: Kenyan Traders Protest Against Chinese Competitors':
amh: የኬንያ ነጋዴዎች አመጽ በተፎካካሪዎቻቸው ላይ':
mt0: <pad> Kenyan traders protest against their competitors</s>

en: The proliferation of Chinese traders in African markets is one of the perinneal sore spots in China-Africa relations.
amh: የቻይና ነጋዴዎች በአፍሪካ ገበያ ውስጥ ዘልቆ መግባት በአፍሪካ-ቻይና ግንኙነት ላይ አላስፈላጊ አሻራ ያሳርፋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Chinese traders' entry into the African market will have unnecessary effects on the relations between China and Africa.</s>

en: This video highlights the recent protests in Nairobi where African traders fear and resent the competition.
amh: ይህ ቪዲዮ የሚያሳየው የአፍሪካ ነጋዴዎች የቻይናን ፉክክር ፍራቻ፣ በቅርቡ በናይሮቢ ያደረጉትን ተቃውሞ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> This video shows African businessmen fearing Chinese competition, recently protested in Nairobi.</s>

en: Consumers generally welcome the expansion of products at lower cost, but frequently complain about the low quality of cheap goods.
amh: ሸማቾች በጥቅሉ በርካሽ ዋጋ ሸቀጦች መቅረቡን በፀጋ ይቀበሉታል፤ ነገር ግን የርቃሽ ሸቀጦችን አነስተኛ ጥራት በየቂዜው ማማረራቸውም አልቀረም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Customers generally accept the offer of cheap goods; however, they do complain about the poor quality of cheap goods every now and then.</s>

en: On the plus side: cheap Chinese cell phone have allowed Africans at the bottom of the pyramid to communicate in unexpectedly large numbers.
amh: በበጎ ጎኑ ስንመለከተው ደግሞ፤ በፓይራሚዱ መቀመጫ ላይ ያሉ አፍሪካውያንን ርካሾቹ የቻይና ተንቀሳቃሽ ስልኮች ባልተጠበቀ ቁጥር ተጠቃሚ አድርገዋቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> On the positive side, cheap Chinese smartphones have made Africans on the pyramid seats use of unexpectedly large numbers of cheap Chinese mobile phones.</s>

en: None of these products need to be sold by Chinese, of course.
amh: ይህ ሁሉንም የቻይና መድሃኒቶችን እምነት በማሳጣት የመድሃኒቶች የውጭ ገበያቸው ላይ ትልቅ ተጽዕኖ ያሳርፋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This will have a great impact on the foreign market for Chinese medicines by defamating all Chinese medicines.</s>

en: As I've noted in this blog, thousands of African traders visit Chinese cities and export directly from China to their home markets.
amh: በእርግጥ እነዚህ ሁሉ ሸቀጦች በቻይኖቹ ሻጭነት ገበያ መውጣት አይጠበቅባቸውም፤ ቀደም ሲል እንደጠቀስኩት፣ በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ የአፍሪካ ነጋዴዎች የቻይና ከተሞችን እየጎበኙ እና ከቻይና ወደአገራቸው ሸቀጦችን በመላክ ሥራ ላይ ተሰማርተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> However, not all of these goods have to be sold by Chinese traders; as I mentioned above, thousands of African traders are visiting Chinese cities and engaged in the trade of exporting goods from China to their own country.</s>

en: The YouTube video below posted by NTVKenya on August 16, 2012, shows Kenyan traders protesting against Chinese traders:
amh: በኤንቲቪኬንያ ላይ በኦገስት 16፣ 2012 ዩቱዩብ ላይ የተለጠፈው ቪዲዮ አፍሪካውያን ነጋዴዎች የቻይና ተፎካካሪዎቻቸውን ሲቃወሙ ያሳያል:
mt0: <pad> The video posted on YouTube by NTV Kenya on August 16, 2012 shows African traders fighting Chinese competitors.</s>

en: Zombie Chinese Land Grabs in Africa Rise Again in New Database!':
amh: ዞምቢ የቻይኖች መሬት መቀራመት በአፍሪካ እንደገና በአዲስ የመረጃ ቋት እያደገ ነው!
mt0: <pad> Zumbi Chinese land grabs in Africa are growing again with a new information network</s>

en: Last week, the new Land Matrix land grab database was released at a big World Bank conference on land.
amh: ባለፈው ሳምንት፣ አዲሱ የመሬት ማትሪክስ የመሬት መቀራመት የመረጃ ቋት በትልቁ የዓለም ባንክ የመሬት አውደጉባኤ ላይ ታይቶ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> Last week, the new Land Registry land use information base was unveiled at the World Bank's large Land Conference.</s>

en: The Land Matrix project is an international partnership involving five major European research centres and 40 civil society and research groups from around the world.
amh: የመሬት ማትሪክሱ ፕሮጀክት የአውሮፓ ምርምር ማዕከልን እና በዓለም ዙሪያ የሚገኙ 40 የሲቪል ማሕበራትና ተመራማሪዎች ቡድንን ዓለም አቀፍ ትብብር ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Earth Mathematics Project is an international collaboration of the European Research Center and 40 civil society and research groups around the world.</s>

en: On paper, they have a strong methodology and very strict criteria about projects that are to be included.
amh: በጥናቱ፣ ጠንካራ አዘገጃጀት እና መካተት ስላለባቸው ፕሮጀክቶች በጣም ቀጥተኛ መመዘኛ አላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the study, projects that require strong organization and participation have a very direct criterion for success.</s>

en: But in practice, they seem to violate their own rules routinely, at least when it comes to Chinese projects in Africa.
amh: በተግባር ግን፣ የገዛ መመዘኛቸውን በተደጋጋሚ ሲጥሱት ታይተዋል፤ ቢያንስ በአፍሪካ ያሉ የቻይና ፕሮጀክቶችን በተመለከተ፡፡
mt0: <pad> But in practice, they have often violated their own standard; at least with regard to Chinese projects in Africa.</s>

en: She goes on to list Chinese zombie land grabs in Africa:
amh: የቻይኖቹ ዞምቢዎች መሬት ወረራ በአፍሪካን ተመራማሪዋ በጥልቀት ሲዘረዝሩት:
mt0: <pad> The Chinese Zombi invaded Africa, the researcher explained in detail.</s>

en: I understand there is a lot of Chinese land investment in Asia, especially in Cambodia and Laos.
amh: በእስያ፣ በተለይም በካምቦዲያ እና በሌኦስ ብዙ የቻይኖች መሬት ኢንቨስትመንት እንዳለ ይገባኛል፡፡
mt0: <pad> I know there are many Chinese land investment in Asia, especially in Cambodia and Laos.</s>

en: I don't know the Asia cases, but when the database was made public, I checked the China-Africa cases in the online database, which supposedly only lists the cases that have passed their robust fact-checking process (which apparently involves checking to see if another NGO has published a link to a media report on an alleged case).
amh: የእስያውን ጉዳይ አላውቅም፤ የመረጃ ቋቱ ይፋ ሲወጣ ግን፣ የቻይና-አፍሪካን ጉዳይ ተመልከቼዋለሁ፡፡ እንደምትገምቱት ሁለገብ ዝርዝሮችን ብቻ ለጥሬ ሐቅ ማመሳከሪያነት ያስቀምጣል (ይህም ምናልባት ሌላ መንግስታዊ ያልሆነ ድርጅት አጠራጣሪ መረጃ አውጥቶ ከሆነ ለማመሳከር ብቻ ይበጃል)፡፡
mt0: <pad> I don't know the Asian issue; I have however watched the China-Africa issue since the information source was released. As you can guess, it only provides all-party lists for a raw fact comparison (which is only useful if another non-governmental organization has published suspect information).</s>

en: I was interested to see which Zombie Chinese projects (i.e. dead projects, or projects that in fact never had any life to them at all!) are in their database as confirmed.
amh: እኔ በጣም ፈልጌ የነበረው ዞምቢዎቹን የቻይና ፕሮጀክቶች ጉዳይ በመረጃ ቋታቸው ውስጥ እርግጡን ለማየት ነበር፡፡ (ያለቁ ፕሮጀክቶች፣ ወይም ለእነርሱ መኖራቸው እንኳን የማይታወቁትን ፕሮጀክቶችን ጉዳይ ማለቴ ነው) ይህን ምሳሌ ተመልከቱ:
mt0: <pad> I really wanted to see the Zombi's Chinese projects in their database. (finished projects, or projects that are not even known to exist) See this example.</s>

amh: 8 ሚሊዮን ሄክታር የፓልም ዘይት ፕሮጀክት አለው፡፡
mt0: <pad> He has a palm oil project of 8 million hectares.</s>

en: Huh?
amh: ቀልድ?
mt0: <pad> You don't know the joke.</s>

en: This proposed joint venture is not Chinese but South African-Chinese-Ethiopian, and was listed in an Ethiopian database in 2008 as in the pre-implementation phase.
amh: ይህ የጥምረት ፕሮጀክት የቻይኖች አይደለም፣ ነገር ግን የደቡብ አፍሪካዊ - ቻይናዊ - ኢትዮጵያዊ ፕሮጀክት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> This joint venture project is not Chinese, but South African - Chinese - Ethiopian.</s>

en: It has never been implemented.
amh: እስካሁን አልተጀመረም፡፡
mt0: <pad> It hasn't started yet.</s>

en: (5) Zimbabawe 101,170 ha irrigated maize project.
amh: (5) በዝምባብዌ 101,170 ሄክታር የበቆሎ ፕሮጀክት አለ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Zimbabwe has a 101,170 hectares of cattle farms (5)</s>

en: I've written about this countless times.
amh: ስለዚህ ጉዳይ ተቆጥሮ የማያልቅ ጊዜ ጽፌያለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I've written about this matter for countless times.</s>

en: It was a construction contract given to a Chinese company by the Zimbabwe government, not a Chinese investment.
amh: በዝምባብዌ መንግስት ለቻይና የኮንስትራክሽን ኩባንያ የተሰጠ ውል ነው፣ የቻይና ኢንቨስትመንት አይደለም፡፡
mt0: <pad> It is a contract awarded by the Zimbabwean government to Chinese construction company, not Chinese investment.</s>

en: They were not paid.
amh: አልተከፈላቸውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> They were not paid.</s>

amh: ወደአገራቸው ገብተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> They have returned to their country.</s>

en: The land never ended up being developed.
amh: መሬቱ ለምቶ አልበቃውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> The land was so wet that it couldn't be covered.</s>

en: This all happened almost ten years ago, in 2003 for Pete's sake!
amh: የፔቲ ያለህ፣ ይሄ የሆነው ከአሥር ዓመት በፊት ነው፤ እ.
mt0: <pad> 'Oh, Pete, this happened ten years ago; eh?</s>

en: Africa's Free Press Problem: Is China Causing It?':
amh: በ2003. 'የአፍሪካ ነፃ ፕሬስ ችግር፤ ቻይና አመጣሽ ይሆን?
mt0: <pad> 2003 "The African Free Press Problem: Is China the cause?</s>

en: Keita's piece makes a lot of good points.
amh: የኬታ ጽሑፍ ብዙ ጥሩ ነጥቦችን ያነሳል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The article by Kate raises many good points.</s>

en: Investigative reporters have a very tough road in many parts of Africa and there are many examples of courage under impossibly tough conditions.
amh: ምርምር አዘል ሪፖርት በአፍሪካ እጅግ ፈታኝ የሆነ መንገድ ከፊቱ ይደቀንበታል፤ እናም በማይቻለው ጎዳና ላይ ብዙ ደፋር እርምጃዎችን መውሰዱን መጥቀስ ይቻላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The research report shows that Africa faces a very challenging path; and many bold steps have been taken on the seemingly impossible road.</s>

en: However, his opinion oversteps his evidence in linking increased Chinese economic activity in Africa with increased repression of the media.
amh: በአስተያየቱ፣ ቻይና በአፍሪካ የምታደርገው ምጣኔ ሃብታዊ እንቅስቃሴን እና የመገናኛ ብዙሐን መታፈንን ግንኙነት ለመዘርዘር ማስረጃዎችን አቅርቧል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In his comment, he presented evidence to link China's economic activities in Africa and the media censure.</s>

en: Asking Why this disturbing trend? (of media repression) Keita points to (inter alia) the influence of China, which surpassed the West as Africa’s largest trading partner in 2009.
amh: ለምን ይህ አስጨናቂ መገናኛ ብዙሐንን የማፈን እርምጃ አስፈለገ?  ሲል ይጠይቃል፡፡ ኬታ የሚመልሰው ምዕራባውያንን በ2009 የበለጠው የቻይና-አፍሪካ የንግድ ሸሪክነትን እንደሰበብ በማስቀመጥ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Why this shocking media suppression measure was needed? asked. Keta responded by pointing out the greater Sino-African trade ties in 2009 as a reason for Westerners to blame China for the increase in Sino-African trade.</s>

en: As an example of this causal linkage, Keita wrote: The volume of trade between Rwanda and China increased fivefold between 2005 and 2009. During the same period, the government has eviscerated virtually all critical press and opposition and has begun filtering Rwandan dissident news Web sites based abroad.
amh: ለነዚህ ጉዳዮች ግንኙነት ምሳሌ ኬታ የሚያቀርበው፣ በ2005 እና በ2009 መካከል የቻይና እና ሩዋንዳ የንግድ ግንኙነት በ5 እጥፍ አድጓል፡፡
mt0: <pad> According to Kenya, the trade between China and Rwanda has grown by 5 times between 2005 and 2009, which is a good example of relations between these issues.</s>

en: She agrees with Keita about Chinese technical and media ties with African government:
amh: ተመራማሪዋ፣ የአፍሪካ መንግስት መገናኛ ብዙሐን አፈና እና የቻይኖች ቴክኒካዊ ድጋፍ ትስስርን በተመለከተ ከኬታ ጋር ይስማማሉ:
mt0: <pad> The researchers agree with Keta on the link between African government media censorship and Chinese technical support.</s>

en: Keita actually does make a good point in his observation that with growing trade, China has been deepening technical and media ties with African governments to counter the kind of critical press coverage that both parties demonize as neocolonialist.
amh: ኬታ ጥሩ ነጥብ ያነሳው እያደገ ባለ የንግድ ግንኙነት ቻይና ሐያሲ ፕሬሶችን ለማፈን እና ቴክኒካል ድጋፍ በመስጠት ሁለቱም ኒዮ ኮሎኒያሊስት እያሉ በሚጠሩት ሰበብ ተሳስረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Kathy raised a good point about the growing trade relationship China is suppressing the Haitian press and providing technical support both are linked to what they call neocolonialism</s>

en: Rather than training African reporters to be like Xinhua reporters, the Chinese goal in stepping up training and PR activities is to present a different picture of Chinese activities in Africa to counter the negative reporting eminating from the West.
amh: የአፍሪካ ሪፖረተሮች እንደ ዢኖዋ ሪፖርተሮች እንዲሆኑ በማሰልጠን ፈንታ፣ የቻይናውያን ዓላማ በምዕራባውያን ስለቻይና በአፍሪካ ኢንቨስትመንት የሚወራውን አሉታዊ ዜና የሚያስተባብል ስልጠና እና ማሕበራዊ ግንኙነት ላይ ማተኮር ይዘዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Instead of training African reports as China's Xinhua reports, the Chinese have focused on training and social media to spread negative news about China's investment in Africa to Westerners.</s>

en: The establishment of modern China-Africa relations dates back to the late 1950s when China signed the first official bilateral trade agreement with Algeria, Egypt, Guinea, Somalia, Morocco and Sudan.
amh: በ1950ዎቹ፣ ቻይና ከአልጄሪያ፣ ግብጽ፣ ጊኒ፣ ሶማሊያ፣ ሞሮኮ እና ሱዳን ጋር የጋራ ስምምነት ስትፈርም ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the 1950s, China signed cooperative agreements with Algeria, Egypt, Guinea, Somalia, Morocco and Sudan.</s>

en: However, ancient China-Africa relations date back as far as 202 BC and AD 220.
amh: በርግጥ፣ ጥንታዊው የቻይና-አፍሪካ ግንኙነት ከክ.
mt0: <pad> Indeed, the ancient Chinese-African relations have been very close.</s>

en: Lebanon now boasts a Virtual Museum of Censorship, an online database of censorship cases in Lebanon since the 1940s.
amh: አ ጀምሮ በሊባኖስ የተደረጉ የሳንሱር እርምጃዎችን በመስመር ላይ የሚያስቀምጥ የመረጃ ቋት የመካነ ድር ዐውድ ርዕይ ለሳንሱር በመክፈት ተኩራርታለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Information Network, a website that publishes information about the censorship measures in Lebanon since the beginning, has been criticized for opening its web page to censure.</s>

en: The website was launched by Lebanese organization MARCH to draw attention to information kept away from people.
amh: ይህ መካነ ድር ይፋ የተደረገው ማርች በተሰኘ የሊባኖስ ድርጅት ሲሆን ከህዝብ ርቀው ወደተቀመጡ መረጃዎች ትኩረትን ለመሳብ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> This website was launched by a Lebanese organization called Marches to draw attention to information that is hidden from the public.</s>

en: On September 2, 2012, the day the Museum of Censorship was launched, MARCH said:
amh: አ ይህ የመካነ ድር ዐውደ ርዕይ ለሳንሱር ይፋ ሲሆን ማርች እንዲህ ብሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> March said that the web site was open to censure when it was launched.</s>

en: WELCOME TO THE VIRTUAL MUSEUM OF CENSORSHIP IN LEBANON !
amh: እንኳን ወደ ሊባኖስ የመካነ ድር ዐውደ ርዕይ ለሳንሱር በደህና መጣችኹ!
mt0: <pad> Welcome to the Lebanon Web Conference on Censorship.</s>

en: Ever wondered WHAT was censored in Lebanon, WHEN, and particularly WHY?
amh: በሊባኖስ ምን ሳንሱር ሲደረግ እንደነበር ፣መቼ?
mt0: <pad> What was censored in Lebanon, when?</s>

en: You have come to the right place.
amh: የሚለውን በማወቅ ፍጹም ለመገረም ወደ ትክክለኛው ስፍራ ነው የመጣችኹት፡፡
mt0: <pad> You know you've come to the right place to be completely amazed.</s>

en: Here, you will be able to look up material that was censored since the 1940's !
amh: እዚህ ከ1940 ጀምሮ ምን አይነት ነገሮች ሳንሱር ሲደረጉ እንደነበሩ መመልከት ትችላላችኹ፡፡
mt0: <pad> You can see what things were censured here from 1940.</s>

en: Heard of something that is being censored, is under the threat of being censored or has been censored in the past that we have missed/failed to spot?
amh: ከዚህ በፊት ሳንሱር የመደረግ አደጋ ላይ የነበሩ ወይም ከዚህ በፊት ሳንሱር ተደርገው የነበሩ እኛ ግን ለመለጠፍ ያላገኘቸው/የሳትናቸው ሳንሱር ስለተደረጉ አንዳንዶች ነገሮች ሰምታችኃል?
mt0: <pad> Do you know about the things that were in danger of being censured or that were previously censured that we didn't find/lose to post?</s>

en: Feel free to report it in order to complete the database.
amh: ለኛ ለመጠቆም ነጻ ሁኑ ፤ ምክንያቱም የመረጃመረቡን ምሉዕ ያደርጋልና፡፡
mt0: <pad> Be free to point us out, as it will make the network more complete.</s>

en: Netizens can report censored movies, music, theater pieces, books, print and audiovisual content from 1940s to date on the website.
amh: የበየነ መረብ ተጠቃሚዎች የሚያውቋቸው 1940 ጀምሮ ሳንሱር የተደረጉ ህትመቶችና የምስልወድምጽ ይዘት ያላቸው ፊልሞች ፣ ሙዚቃዎች ፣ ቲያትሮች ፣ መጽሐፍት ካሉ ለመካነ ድሩ መጠቆም ይችላሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Internet users can refer to the archive for publications and audio-visual material that have been censured since 1940, such as films, music, theaters, books.</s>

en: They are required to give the name of the censored work, the censorship date, entity and reason.
amh: ከእነርሱ የሚጠበቀው የታገደውን ስራ ስም ፣ የታገደበትን ቀን ፣ምክንያት እና የመኖሩን ምስክር መጥቀስ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> They are required to provide the name of the work suspended, the date of the suspended, the reason and evidence of its existence.</s>

en: For instance, Charlie Chaplin's Great Dictator was banned in 1940 for its anti-Nazi views.
amh: ለምሳሌ በ1940 የቻርሊ ቻፒሊን ግሬት ዲክታተር ጸረ ናዚ እይታ ስላለው ታግዷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> For example, in 1940, the great dictator Charles Chaplin was banned for his anti-Nazi views.</s>

en: While, in 1990 LBC International received threats from the National Audiovisual Media Council to suspend its transmission over the broadcast of an interview with David Levy, the Israeli foreign Minister at that time.
amh: በ1990 ደግሞ ኤልቢሲ ኢንተርናሽናል በጊዜው የእስራኤል የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር ከነበሩት ዴቪድ ሌቪ ጋር ያደረገውን ቃለመጠይቅ ስርጭት እንዲያቋርጥ ከብሔራዊ የምስልወድምጽ ሚዲያ ካውንስል ማስፈራሪያ ደርሶታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In 1990, the National Broadcasting and Media Council threatened to stop broadcasting an interview with David Levi, then Israel's foreign minister.</s>

en: Who censors in Lebanon?
amh: በሊባኖስ ሳንሱር የሚያደርገው ማነው?
mt0: <pad> Who is the censorship in Lebanon?</s>

en: The Virtual Museum of Censorship lists four main Lebanese censorship entities:
amh: የሳንሱር ዐውደ ርዕይ መካነ ድር በሊባኖስ አራት ዋና የእግድ ፈጻሚዎችን ይዘረዝራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The censorship watchdog website lists four main enforcers in Lebanon.</s>

en: General Security: Licensing, Monitoring, Censoring creative works
amh: ጠቅላላ ደህንነት፡
mt0: <pad> General security</s>

en: Provides licenses to publish for periodical publications
amh: ለፈጠራ ስራዎች ፍቃድ መስጠት፣ መቆጣጠር ፣ ሳንሱር ማድረግ
mt0: <pad> License, control, and censure of intellectual property works.</s>

en: May suspend a TV channel for a maximum period of 3 days
amh: የመረጃ ሚኒስቴር : የውጭ የህመትቶች ውጤቶች ወደ ሀገር ውስጥ እንዳይገቡ ማዕቀብ መጣል ፣ቅጅውን በቁጥጥር ስር ማዋል ፣ በየጊዜው ለሚታተሙ የህትመት ውጤቶች እንዲታተሙ ፍቃድ መስጠት ምን አልባትም የቴሌቪዥን ስርጭቶችን እስከ ሶስት ቀናት ሊያዘገይ ይችላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Information Minister: ban on imports of foreign print products, copying control, permitting the publication of regularly published print products</s>

en: Can censor cinematic works from the preliminary stage of the censorship process, along with the General Security
amh: የሲኒማ ስራዎችን በቅደመ መድረክ የሳንሱር ሁደት ውስጥ በማሳለፍ ከጠቅላላ ደህንነት ጋር በመተባበር ሊያግድ ይችላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> It can be prevented by passing films through pre-screening censorship, in cooperation with general security.</s>

en: The special administrative committee: In the case that General Security finds what it considers enough cause to prevent part or all of the film from being screened, a decision shall be made by the committee according to a majority vote of its member to allow the film to be screened as it is, to edit certain parts of the film or to ban the film from being screened altogether.
amh: ልዩ አስተዳደራዊ ኮሚቴ፡ ጠቅላላ ደህንነት የአንድን ፊልም በከፊል ወይም ሙሉውን ከመታየት ለማገድ በቂ ምክንያት ካገኘ ፊልሙ እንዳለ እንዲታይ ፣ የተወሰነው ክፍል አርትኦት እንዲሰራለት ወይንም ከናካቴው እንዲታገድ ውሳኔውን የሚያስተላልፈው የኮሚቴው አባላት በሚሰጡት አብላጫ ድምጽ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Special Administrative Committee: General Security If the security of a film is sufficient to prevent it from being shown in part or in full, the decision is made by the majority of the members of the Committee to allow the film to be shown as it is, with a certain edit or without any edit at all.</s>

en: The final decision shall officially be issued by the Ministry of Interior, alone.
amh: የመጨረሻው ውሳኔ በመንግስት ደረጃ የሚሰራጨውው በሀገር ውስጥ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The final decision is made by the Ministry of Interior.</s>

en: The National Audiovisual Media Council:The Council has become a media watchdog.
amh: ብሔራዊ የምስልወድምጽ ሚዲያ ካውንሰል፡ ካውንስሉ ‘የሚዲያው ጠባቂ ውሻ’ ሆኗል፡፡
mt0: <pad> National Television and Radio Council: The council has become the "media watchdog"</s>

en: Censorship motives
amh: የሳንሱር መግፍኤዎች
mt0: <pad> The causes of censure</s>

en: In Lebanon, censorship practices are either politically, religiously or morally motivated.
amh: በሊባኖስ የሳንሱር ልምዶች ፖለቲካዊ ፣ ሀይማኖታዊ ወይም የሞራላዊ መግፍኤዎች ውጤት ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Lebanon's censure practices are the result of political, religious or moral reasons.</s>

en: The Virtual Museum of Censorship explains:
amh: ፖለቲካዊ ምክንያቶች፡
mt0: <pad> Political reasons.</s>

en: Political reasons: regarding foreign relations with friendly countries, the censor pays considerable attention to the political sensitivities of Arab regimes and endeavors to safeguard diplomatic relations with these countries as well as banning attacks on the Palestinian cause and Arabs in general.
amh: ከወዳጅ ሀገራት ጋር የሚደረግ የውጭ ግንኙነትን በተመለከተ የሳንሱር ሂደቱ ለአረብ ሀገራት የአገዛዝ ስርዓቶች ፖለቲካዊ ትኩሳቶች ላቅ ያለ ትኩረትን ይሰጣል፤ ከእነዚህ ሀገራት ጋር ያለን ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ግንኙነቶች ለመጠበቅ ጥረት ያደርጋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The censorship process regarding foreign relations with friends pays great attention to Arab regimes' political inclinations; it tries to keep our diplomatic relations with these countries.</s>

en: Films on the civil war have been routinely censored since the nineties on the basis that referring to the conflict threatens civil peace”.
amh: ከዘጠናዎቹ ጀምሮ የሲቪል ሰላም በማስፈራራት” እንደመሰረት በመጥቀስ በእርስ በርስ ጦርነትን የሚያሳዩ ፊልሞችበተደጋጋሚ ታግደዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> From the 1990s, films showing civil war have been often banned, citing "threatening civil peace" as the basis.</s>

en: Israel: regarding relations with enemy states, censorship is firstly based on a national law that calls for the boycott of all Israeli products.
amh: ከጠላት ሀገር ጋር ያለ ግንኙነትን በተመለከተ መጀመሪያ ሳንሱር መሰረት ያደረገው የእስራኤል ምርቶችን በሙሉ አለመጠቀምን የሚጠራውን ብሔራዊ ህግ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The first censorship based on the national law was the boycott of Israeli goods, which is called the "national law of boycott"</s>

en: Secondly, there is censorship of all forms of publicity or compassion for Israel : this boycott was initially observed by the entire Arab League.
amh: በመቀጠል ለእስራኤል ሁሉም አይነት ቅርጽ ያላቸው ማስተዋወቆች ወይም ርህራሄ ያላቸው ነገሮች ለእግድ ተዳርገዋል፡፡ ይህ እስራኤል ላይ የተጣለ እግድ በመነሻ በመላው የአረብ ሊግ ሀገራት ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> Following this, all forms of advertising or sympathies for Israel were banned. This ban on Israel initially affected all Arab League countries.</s>

en: Today, only Lebanon and Syria adhere to it stringently(...)
amh: ዛሬ ሊባኖስ እና ሶርያ ብቻ በትጋት እንዲፈጸም ይጥራሉ ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Today only Lebanon and Syria are trying to force it through.</s>

en: Religion: General Security will send creative works it thinks might upset religious sensitivities to their respective governing bodies (usually the Catholic Information Center or the Dar-al-Fatwa, which is Lebanon’s highest Sunni Muslim authority).
amh: ጠቅላይ ደህንነት የፈጠራ ውጤቶች ሀይማኖታዊ ቁጣዎችን የሚቀሰቅሱ ናቸው ብሎ ካሰበ ወደሚመለከታቸው አካላት (አብዛኛውን ጊዜ ለካቶሊክ የመረጃ ማዕከል ወይም በሊባኖስ ትልቁ የሱኒ ሙስሊም ባለስልጣን ለሆነው ለዳር አል ፈጣዋ ) ይልካቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> If the General Security thinks that the creations are religiously provocative, it will send them to relevant authorities (often to the Catholic Information Center or to Dar al-Fatawa, the largest Sunni Muslim official in Lebanon).</s>

en: Scenes or topics that question the ability of religion to counter evil and offensive scenes are removed.
amh: ገቢሮች ወይም ርዕሶች የሀይማኖትን አቅም ምላሽ የመጠየቅ ለመጻረር አቅም ካለውና የሚያስቀይም ከሆነ ገቢሮቹ ይወገዳሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> If chapters or sections have the potential to challenge the religion's authority, ask for an answer, or insult it, they will be removed.</s>

en: Obscene and Immoral content: regarding censorship material which offends public morals, contains scenes of nudity, sex and foul language are strictly censored and the censor generally determines the extent to which the film or work does not offend public morals.
amh: የህብረተሰቡን ሞራል የሚነካ ውጤትን በተመለከተ ሳንሱር የሚደረገው ራቁት ገቢር ፣ ወሲብና ጋጣወጥ ቋንቋን ያካተተ ከሆነ የግድ ሳንሱር ይደረጋሉ የሳንሱር ምርመራው የሚጠበቅበት ፊልምም ሆነ ሌላ ስራ የህብረተሰቡን ሞራል የማይነካ መሆኑን ማረጋገጥ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The content of the film or other work is censured for morally inappropriate effects. The purpose of the censorship examination is to ensure that the film or other work is morally inappropriate.</s>

en: Also, works that promote homosexuality are prohibited but violent scenes or scenes depicting drug use are allowed.
amh: የአመጽ ገቢር ወይም የአደንዛዥ ዕፅ ተጠቃሚነት የሚወክሉ ገቢሮች ግን የተፈቀዱ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> However, flags that represent rebellion or drug use are permitted.</s>

en: Twitter reactions
amh: የቲዊተር ምላሾች
mt0: <pad> Twitter responses</s>

en: On Twitter, the initiative was welcomed:
amh: በትዊተር ይህ ስራ መልካም ተቀባይነትን አግኝቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This work has received good reviews on Twitter.</s>

en: @SultanAlQassemi: This is a brilliant idea: The Virtual Museum of Censorship (Lebanon) censorshiplebanon.org via @Sandmonkey Every Gulf state needs one
amh: @SultanAlQassemi፡ ይህ በጣም ጠሩ ዐሳብ ነው ፡፡ የሳንሱር ዐውደ ርዕይ መካነ ድር (ሊባኖስ)censorshiplebanon.
mt0: <pad> @SultanAlQassemi: This is a very good idea. Censors' Forum (Lebanon)censorshiplebanon.</s>

en: @ramseygeorge: This is fantastic
amh: org via @Sandmonkey ሁሉም የገልፍ ሀገሮች አንዳንድ ያስፈልጋቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> org via @Sandmonkey All the turtle countries need some.</s>

en: Can democracy exist in Islamic societies?
amh: ‘በኢስላማዊ ማኀበረሰብ ዴሞክራሲ ሊኖር ይችላል?
mt0: <pad> Can there be democracy in an Islamic community?</s>

en: This was the topic of conversation between Bahraini bloggers today.
amh: ’ዛሬ ይህ ርዕስ በባህሬናውያን ጦማሪዎች መካከል መነጋገሪያ ሆኗል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Today this topic has become a hot topic among the Baharein journalists.</s>

en: Bahraini artist Al Shaikh raised the issue when he tweeted :
amh: ጉዳየን ያነሳው የባህሬናውው አርቲስት አል ሻክህ ትዊት በማድረግ ነው :
mt0: <pad> The issue was sparked by the Bahraini artist Al-Sakka through a tweet.</s>

en: @Anas_Al_Shaikh: It is difficult to separate between what is political and what is religious in Islamic societies and this is why democracy will never succeed even if we write the best constitutions and accept the peaceful rotation of power
amh: @Anas_Al_Shaikh፤ በኢስላማዊ ማኀበረሰብ ውስጥ ፓለቲካ ምን አንደሆነ እና ሀይማኖት ምን እንደሆነ ለመለየት አስቸጋሪ ነው፤ ለዚህም ይመስላል ምንም እንኳን ምርጥ ህገ መንግስት ብናዘጋጅም ሰላማዊ የስልጣን ሽክርክርን ብንቀበል ዴሞክራሲ ተሳክቶልን የማያውቀው፡፡
mt0: <pad> @Anas_Al_Shaikh; It is difficult to distinguish between politics and religion in the Islamic community; that's why it seems like even if we draft the best constitution and accept peaceful power struggle, democracy will never be recognized by the people who don't know it.</s>

en: Fearless Ba7rainia replies:
amh: ፊርለስ ባሪኒያ መለሰ፤
mt0: <pad> Charles Barnia responded: "I don't know."</s>

en: @fearlessbahrain: Democracy is the solution and the remedy for such problems. If laws are developed, people will improve too in a natural way.
amh: @fearlessbahrain፤ ለእንደዚህ አይነት ችግሮች ዴሞክራሲ መፍትሔና ፈዋሽ ነው፤ ህጎች ከተዘጋጁ በተፈጥሮዓዊ መንገድ እየተሻሻሉ ይመጣሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> @fearlessbahrain; Democracy is the solution and cure for such problems; once the laws are set, they will naturally improve and grow.</s>

en: A civil society is our people's savior
amh: የሲቪል ማኀበረሰብ የኛ ህዝብ መድህን ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The civil society is the shield of our people.</s>

en: Bahraini journalist Abbas Busafwan has another take. He responds to Al Shaikh's original tweet saying:
amh: ባህሬናዊው ጋዜጠኛ አባስ ቡሳፍዋን ሌላ መወሰድ አለው፤ ለአል ሻይክህ የመጀመሪያ ትዊት እንዲህ ሲል መለሰ፤
mt0: <pad> Bahraini journalist Abbas Buhdaain responded to Al-Sheikh's first tweet by saying: "I have to go."</s>

en: @abbasbusafwan: This conclusion is really painful. It could be a generalisation.

mt0: <pad> @abbasbusafwan; this conclusion is true; it is a generalization.</s>

mt0: <pad> Maybe Turkey can be a success story.</s>

en: Al Shaikh answers:

mt0: <pad> Al-Shaiqa asked for help.</s>

en: @Anas_Al_Shaikh: Turkey did not balance between religious and political issues.
amh: @Anas_Al_Shaikh፤ በቱርክ የሀይማኖት እና ፖለቲካዊ ጉዳዮችን ሚዛናዊ አይደሉም፡፡
mt0: <pad> @Anas_Al_Shaikh; in Turkey, the balance of religion and politics is not even.</s>

mt0: <pad> For example, in Turkey there are gay rights; and I myself have seen protests on the popular Taxim Street.</s>

mt0: <pad> Abu Karim says that we should improve our own democracy before importing Western democracy.</s>

en: @AbuKarim1: Our problem is that we want to implement Western theories on our societies instead of searching in what we have and modernising it
amh: @AbuKarim1፤ ችግራችን ያለንን ከማሠስ እና እርሱን ከማዘመን ይልቅ በእኛ ማኀበረሰብ ላይ የምዕራባውያንን ንድፈ ዐሳብ ለመተግበር እንፈልጋለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> @AbuKarim1; Our problem is that we want to implement Western ideas on our community instead of cleaning and modernizing it.</s>

en: Lightening the skin is a common practice in Africa where the sale of skin lightening products is legal in many countries.
amh: በብዙ የአፍሪካ ሀገሮች ቆዳን ማቅላት የተለመደ እና በህግም የተፈቀደ ተግባር ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In many African countries, leather making is a common and legal activity.</s>

en: However, the use of these creams is not safe: stretch marks, pimples, hair, hypertension and diabetes are all risks user take.
amh: በሴኔጋል ቆዳን የሚያቀላው እና ‹‹ኬስ ፔች›› የተባለው ምርት የድህረ ገፅ እሰጥ አገባ ቀስቅሷል፡፡

amh: ኬን ፋቲም ዲዎፕ ነጭ ቆዳ በ15 ቀናት በማለት ሲገልፅ፡

amh: እርሱም ቆዳን ነጭ እንደሚያደርግ ተነገረለት የክሬም አይነት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> He is also a kind of cream that is said to whiten skin.</s>

en: Twenty days ago, a new product called Khess Petch appeared in the Dakar greater area, on more than 100 billboards of 12 square meters each.
amh: ከ20 ቀናት በፊት ‹‹ኬስ ፔች›› የተባለ አዲስ ምርት በዳካር ዋነኛ ቦታዎች ላይ ከ100 በላይ በሆኑና እያንዳንዳቸው 12 ስኩዌር ሜትር መጠን ባላቸው የማስታወቂያ ቦታዎች ላይ ተሰቅሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> 20 days ago, a new product called "Case Pegs" was advertised on over 100 advertising spots in Dakara's main places, each measuring 12 square meters.</s>

en: With her blog post, 'A very clear skin at any cost: Understanding the phenomena in Africa', Carole Ouédraogo on the website NextAfrique explains that this phenomenon is common in many African countries:
amh: ብሏል፡፡ ካሮል ኦድራጎ በበኩሏ NextAfrique በተባለው ድረ ገጽ ላይ ንፁህ ቆዳ በማንኛውም ዋጋ፡ በአፍሪካ ያለውን ክስተት መረዳት ባለችው ጦማሯ ድርጊቱ በብዙ የአፍሪካ ሀገሮች ተለመደ ተግባር እንደሆነ ስትገልፅ፡
mt0: <pad> Carol O'Dowd, in her article on NextAfrique titled Clean skin at any cost: Understanding the African phenomenon in Africa, said that the practice is common in many African countries.</s>

en: The researchers estimate that roughly 25 % of women in Bamako, Mali use the skin lightening products... in South Africa 35% ... in Senegal 52% ...
amh: ምርምሮች በግርድፉ ሲያስቀምጡ በማሊ፣ ባማኮ ከሚኖሩት ሴቶች ውስጥ 25 በመቶው ቆዳን የሚያቀሉ ምርቶችን ይጠቀማሉ… በደቡብ አፍሪካ ደግሞ 35 በመቶ… በሴኔጋል 52 በመቶዎቹ ሴቶች፡፡
mt0: <pad> Research shows that 25 percent of women in Mali, Bamako use skin-lightening products... in South Africa 35 percent... in Senegal 52 percent of women.</s>

amh: አስከትላም፡
mt0: <pad> You don't know</s>

en: Women in Senegal associate light skin with beauty, elegance and high social status.
amh: ሴኔጋላዊያን ሴቶች ቀላ ያለ ቆዳን እንደ ቁንጅና፣ ውበት እና በህብረተሰቡ ውስጥ ከፍተኛ ግምት እንደማግኛ አድርገው ያስቀምጡታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Senegalese women view dark skin as a symbol of beauty, elegance and social status.</s>

en: On the blog A Toubab in Dakar, a blog post entitled 'The Xessalisation a.k.a the stupid quest for whiteness' tries to answer the question Why whiten your skin?:
amh: ከዳካር የሚፃፈው ኤ ቱባብ (ቱባብ ማለት በምዕራብ አፍሪካ ዘየ የምዕራቡ አለም ሰው ማለት ነው) የተባለው ጦማር The Xessalisation ማለትም ነጭ የመሆን ፍላጎት ድድብና ባለው ፅሁፉ ለምን ቆዳዎን ነጭ ያደርጉታል?
mt0: <pad> Why do you want to make your skin white? The Xessalisation, or the desire to be white.</s>

en: Some believe that Senegalese man love clear skin, so somewomen whiten their skin to please them.
amh: ሌሎች ደግሞ ይህ ‹‹የበታችነት ስሜት መገለጫ›› ነው ይላሉ….
mt0: <pad> Others say that this is a "display of inferiority".</s>

en: Other talk of aninferiority complex …
amh: ቆዳን ማንጣት፡
mt0: <pad> a leather jacket</s>

en: Blogger Fatou on Blackbeautybag goes further in his post 'Skin Whitening: Practices, Challenges and Accoutability':
amh: በተግባር፣ ተግዳሮቱ እና ተጠያቂነት ባለው ጦማር፤ ጦማሪ ፋቱ በብላክቢዩቲባግ ጦማር ላይ ፡
mt0: <pad> a blog with practice, challenge and responsibility; by blogger Pattu on the Black Beauty Blog</s>

en: These issues are related to sequels from slavery and colonialism.
amh: ይህ ጉዳይ ከባርነት እና ቅኛ አገዛዝ ጋር ግንኙነት ያለው ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> This issue is related to slavery and the colonial rule.</s>

en: From a psychological point of view, the past has left its mark on many people.
amh: ከስነ ልቦና አንፃር ያለፈው ታሪክ በብዙ ሰዎች ላይ የራሱን አሻራ አሳርፎ አልፏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The past has left a deep psychological mark on many people.</s>

en: Remarks like: YOU ARE BLACK AS THE NIGHT, IF YOU ARE TOO BLACK, NO MAN WILL WANT YOU, and the list goes on and on...
amh: በዝቅተኝነት ስሜት ላይ ጦማሪ ማማ ሳራቴ ከጥቁር ወደ ነጭ ፡ በዘር ከፍ ማለት በሚል ርዕስ ክርክር ለማስነሳት አንድ ጦማር አስፍሯል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The angry blogger Mama Sarte posted a blog post titled "Black to White: Race Raised" to spark a debate.</s>

en: Rapidly, a citizen awareness project exposing the risks of the cream grew on social networks.
amh: በተፋጠነ ሁኔታ የንቁ ዜጎች ፕሮጀክት የክሬሙን ጉዳት በማህበራዊ ድረ ገፆች አጋልጧል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Citizens Project has quickly exposed the cream's dangers on social media.</s>

en: Launched online on the 8 September, a petition calling for the Ministry of Health to put a halt to the advertising campaign, gathered more than 1,000 signatures in four days.
amh: በሴፕቴምበር 8 የተጀመረው የድረ ገፅ አቤቱታ ዘመቻ የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስትር ማስታወቂያውን እንዲያስቆም በ4 ቀናት ውስጥ 1000 ፊርማዎችን አሰባስቦ አቤት ብሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The online petition campaign started on September 8 has collected over 1,000 signatures in just four days to demand that the Health Minister stop the advertisement.</s>

mt0: <pad> you don't know</s>

en: Bloggers and infographics designers took the idea to task and organized a counter-campaign: We see your Khess Petch (completely white) campaign and we raise its counter: Nioul Kouk (completely black in wolof).
amh: ጦማሪዎች እና የግራፈክስ ባለሙያዎችም ይሄን ሀሳብ በመውሰድ ተቃራኒ ዘመቻ ከፍተዋል ‹‹የናንተን ኬስ ፔች (ሙሉ ለሙሉ ነጭ) ዘመቻ አይተነዋል፣ እናም ተቃራኒ የሆነውን ኒዎል ኮክ (ሙሉ ለሙሉ እንደ ዎልፍ ጥቁር) ዘመቻን ከፍተናል፡
mt0: <pad> Bloggers and graffiti artists also took the idea and launched a counter-campaign: "We saw your Case Page (all white) campaign, and we launched the New Look Cookie (all black like wolf) campaign."</s>

en: A student from Hainan University threw his shoe at Maoist commentator Sima Nan on October 7, 2012, to protest against the absence of rights to free speech in China.
amh: ተማሪው ርምጃውን የወሰደው በጥያቄ እና መልስ ሰዓት ነው፡፡ ከዚህ በታች ያለው ሁኔታውን የሚያሳየው አጭር የተማሪውን ንግግር የሚያስቀምጥ ፅሁፍ ነው፡
mt0: <pad> The student took the action during question and answer time. The text below is a short summary of the student's speech showing the situation.</s>

en: Before he threw the shoe, he said, even if your talk is not good, you can go back to your hotel.
amh: ‹‹ከሁሉ አስቀድሜ አቶ ሲማ ናንን እንኳን ወደ ሀይናን ዩንቨርስቲ በሰላም መቱ ለማለት እፈልጋለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> First of all, I want to say welcome to Dr. Sima Nan at the University of China in Beijing.</s>

en: If I argue against it, certainly I will be locked up in a tiny dark room.
amh: እኔም እዚህ ተማሪ ነኝና፡፡
mt0: <pad> I'm a student here too.</s>

en: The student took the action during a Question and Answer session.
amh: በመጀመሪያ በአንድ ወቅት ስለ ሶቅራጠስ አንብቤለሁ በአንድ እናም እኔ ማውቀው አለማወቄን ነው ይላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> I've read about Socrates once and he says that all I know is my ignorance.</s>

en: Below is a video showing the incident with a brief transcription of the student's remarks:
amh: በሁለተኝነት እኔ ነፃነት እና ዲሞክራሲን እንደ ነፃነቴ ማስጠበቂያ እፈልጋቸዋለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Secondly, I want freedom and democracy as my protection of freedom.</s>

en: I am also a student here.
amh: በሶስተኝነት እርስዎ ዲሞክራሲን ተቃርነው የተናገሩት ንግግር ነፃነቴን እንደተጋፋኝ ለመናገር እፈልጋለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I want to say that your speech against democracy is a violation of my freedom.</s>

en: I want to make a few points.
amh: እኛ በእኩልነት ነፃነታችንን ማራመድ አልቻልንም፡፡
mt0: <pad> We couldn't push our freedom forward in equal measure.</s>

en: Secondly, I need freedom and democracy is a means to protect freedom. Thirdly, I have to say, your talk against democracy has invaded my freedom. We are not equally able to exercise our freedom of speech.
amh: ምንም እንኳን የምትናገረው ጥሩ ነገር ባይሆንም፣ ወደ ሆቴልህ መመለስ ትችላለህ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Even if you don't know what you're saying, you can go back to your hotel.</s>

en: The four points that you have mentioned, I cannot go against them because of political correctness.
amh: ነገር ግን እኔ ንግግሩን ብቃወም፣ ትንሽ ጨለማ ክፍል ውስጥ እንደሚዘጋብኝ እርግጠኛ ነኝ፡፡
mt0: <pad> But if I refuse the conversation, I'm sure I'll be locked in a small dark room.</s>

en: Even if your talk is not good, you can go back to your hotel.
amh: የኔ ጥያቄም እንደሚከተለው ነው፤ ጫማየን ወደ እርስዎ መወርወር እችላለሁ?
mt0: <pad> My question is this; can I throw my shoes at you?</s>

en: If I argue against it, certainly I will be locked up in a tiny dark room.
amh: በዚህ ሀገር ነፃነቴን ተገፍፌያለሁ፣ እናም እዚህ የመጣሁት ነፃነቴን ለማስጠበቅ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> I have been denied my freedom in this country, and I came here to keep my freedom.</s>

en: Please don't interrupt me.
mt0: <pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: You should have the manners not to interrupt me.
amh: ሌላ ተማሪ በወቅቱ ነበረውን ሁኔታ በጦማሩ ሲገልፅ:
mt0: <pad> A student describes the situation in his blog.</s>

en: Here comes my question, can I throw my shoe at you?
amh: 30 ነበር፡፡

en: As my freedom is harmed in this country, I am here to protect my freedom.
amh: ሲጀመርም ሲማ ናን የዩንቨርስቲውን አስተዳዳሪ ሊ ጂንባዎንን በማወደስ ጀመሩት፡፡
mt0: <pad> First, Simin Nan started by praising the university's director Lee Jin-won.</s>

en: Another student describes the scene in his blog:
amh: በእውነት ማካበድ ይችሉበታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> They can really lie.</s>

en: The talk started at 7:30. At the beginning Sima Nan kept praising our university headmaster Li Jianbao, he is really good at flattering.
amh: የአስተዳዳሪው ስብእናም በቅፅበት ማደግ ጀመረ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The manager's personality began to grow instantly.</s>

en: Then he pretended to be very open minded said that he was aware that some people wanted to throw things at him and invited them to throw stuff.
amh: አሰከትለውም በጣም ግልፅ ለመምሰል ሞከሩ እናም አንዳንድ ሰዎችም የተለያዩ ነገሮችን ሊወረውሩ እንደሚችሉ ይገባኛል አይነት ሀሳብ በማምጣት፤ ለዛም ዝግጁ እንደሆኑ ገለፁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> They then tried to be very clear and said that they were prepared for people to throw different things at them, which I understand that some people may think.</s>

en: Since he had not started talking, people were not ready to throw things.
amh: ከዛም አራት ነጥቦችን ብቻ አስቀምጠው ቀሪውን ጊዜ ለጥያቄ እና መልስ እንደሚያዉሉት ቃል ገቡ፡፡
mt0: <pad> They promised to only leave four points and use the rest of the time for questions and answers.</s>

en: Then he promised that he would focus on making four points and leave more time for exchange.
amh: ንግግራቸው ረጅም፣ አሰልች እና በስህተቶች የተሞላ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> Their talk was long, boring and full of mistakes.</s>

en: I was too naive to believe him.
amh: አራት ነጥብ ያሉትም 1.
mt0: <pad> Also, there are four points.</s>

en: His talk was long, boring and full of mistakes.
amh: በፓርቲ አመራር ውስጥ ብዙ ማህበራዊ ችግሮች ይኖራሉ 2.
mt0: <pad> There are many social problems in the party leadership.</s>

en: His four points were: 1.
amh: የፓርቲው አመራሮች ብዙ ስኬቶች እንዳስመዘገቡ 3.
mt0: <pad> The party leaders have achieved many successes.</s>

en: The party leaders have great achievements; 3. Without the party society would be in chaos; 4.
amh: ያለ ፓርቲ ህብረተሰቡ ማጥ ውስጥ እንደሚዘፈቅ 4 የዜጎች ዲሞክራሲ ከፓርቲው አመራር መነጠል እንደማይችሉ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> 4 citizens' democracy cannot be separated from the party's leadership</s>

en: People's democracy should not be detached from party leadership.
amh: በንግግራቸው መካከልም አንድ ሰው ወደ አዳራሹ ሊገባ ሲል በጠባቂዎች ተከለከለ፡፡
mt0: <pad> While they were talking, a man was stopped by guards from entering the room.</s>

en: In the middle of his talk, someone tried to enter the hall but was stopped by the security guards.
amh: ከአንድ ሰዓት ከሰላሳ ደቂቃ ንግግር በኋላ ሲማ ናና ንግግራቸውን አቆሙ፡፡
mt0: <pad> After an hour and thirty minutes of speech, Sheikh Nima stopped his speech.</s>

en: The climax was unexpected.
amh: የጥያቄ እና መለስ ጊዜውም ተጀመረ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The question and answer period began.</s>

en: Sima Nan finally had enough of his talk after one and a half hours.
amh: ከኔ ፊት ለፊትም አንድ ብርቱካናማ የስፖርት ልብስ ለበሰ ሰው መናገር ጀመረ፡፡
mt0: <pad> A man in red sports clothes started talking to me.</s>

en: The Q & A session started.
amh: ንግግሩንም ከግሪኩ ፈላስፋ ሶቅራጠስ ንግግር ጠቅሶ ጀመረ፡፡
mt0: <pad> He started his speech by citing the Greek philosopher Socrates's speech.</s>

en: In front of me a man dressed in orange sport wear started talking.
amh: ዝርዝር ሁኔታዎችን አስገራሚ ስለነበሩ ዘንግቻቸዋለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I forgot the details because they were so amazing.</s>

en: His main point was about freedom and equality.
amh: የንግግሩ ዋነኛ ነጥብም ነፃነት እና እኩልነት ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> The main point of his speech was freedom and equality.</s>

en: He said: Today we don't have equality in our rights to speak. I have no freedom.
amh: ምንም እንኳን የተናገሩት ጥሩ ነገር ባይሆንም፣ ወደ ሆቴልዎት መመለስ ይችላሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Even though you didn't say anything good, you can go back to your hotel.</s>

en: What you have said are politically correct theories. When you are done, you go back to your hotel.
amh: ነገር ግን እኔ ንግግሩን ብቃወም ትንሽ ጨለማ ክፍል ውስጥ እንደሚዘጋብኝ እርግጠኛ ነኝ ፡፡
mt0: <pad> But I'm sure if I refuse the conversation, I'll be locked in a small dark room.</s>

en: If I argue against that I would be locked up in a tiny dark room (This is all I can remember, sorry).
amh: (ይህ እኔ ላስታውስ የቻልኩት ነገር ነው፣ አዝናለሁ) ፡፡
mt0: <pad> This is all I can remember, sorry.</s>

en: Then Sima Nan said that it was not a question. The student then replied, Here comes my question, can I throw my shoe?
amh: ሲማ ናን አስከትለው ይህ ጥያቄ አይደለም አሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Simah followed him and said this is not a question.</s>

en: Then he threw a sports shoe to the stage with determination.
amh: ተማሪውም ሲመልስ የኔ ጥያቄ ይሄው ነው፣ ጫማየን መወርወር እችላለሁ; ከዛም በቁርጠኝነት የለበሰውን የስፖርት ጫማ ወደ መድረኩ ወረወረ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The student answered, "My question is this, can I throw my shoes?" and he threw his sports shoes onto the stage with a firm hand.</s>

en: I clapped my hand without being aware of that…
amh: እኔም ሳላስበው አጨበጭብ ነበር…
mt0: <pad> I was actually cheering without realizing it.</s>

en: Sima Nan is a Maoist and in the past few years he has kept praising the North Korean model in China to advocate for a stricter approach to foreign policy.
amh: ሲማ ናን ማኦይስት ሲሆኑ ባለፉት ጥቂት አመታት ውስጥ የሰሜን ኮሪያ ሞዴል በጫይናም እንዲዳብር እና በውጭ ጉዳዮች ላይ ጠንካራ አካሄድ እንዲኖር ይፈልጋሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Simin Aun is a Maoist who has been trying to develop the North Korean model in China in recent years and wants a stronger position in foreign affairs.</s>

en: He has also propagated a lot of hate speech against liberals, accusing them of being traitors of the country.
amh: በተጨማሪም ለዘብተኞች ላይ የጥላቻ ንግግር በማድረግ እና የሀገሪቱ ስጋቶች ናቸው በሚል ውንጀላቸው ታዋቂ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> They are also known for their hatred of investors and accusations of them as national enemies.</s>

en: Many have applauded the student's courageous act, but some are also worried about the student's safety.
amh: ብዙ ተማሪዎች የተማሪውን ደፋር ተግባር ያደነቁ ሲሆን አንዳንዶች ግን የተማሪው ደህንነት አሳስቧቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many students admired the student's brave act, while some were worried about the student's safety.</s>

en: Below is my pick of the online discussion :
amh: ከዚህ በታች በድረ ገፅ ስለሁኔታው የነበረውን ውይይት በኔ ምርጫ አቅርቤያለሁ:
mt0: <pad> I have chosen to present the discussion on the web page about the matter in my choice below.</s>

en: 慕容雪村: Sima Nan calls himself an intellectual and upholds Maoist ideology.
amh: ምንአልባትም በማኦ ዘመን ስለተካሄደው ማሰቃየት እና ጥቃት ዘንግተውት ይሆናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Maybe you forgot about the torture and persecution that happened during Mao's time.</s>

en: He has probably forgotten about the torture and insult intellectuals went though in the Mao Era - they were forced to wear tall hats and rally on the street, beaten by belts with copper locks, forced into labour on cattle farms to reflect upon their wrongs.
amh: - በዛን ወቅት ሰዎች ረጅም ኮፍያ አጥልቀው በመንገድ ይነዱ ነበር፣ በብረት ቀበቶም ይገረፉ ነበር ፣ከብት በመጠበቅ ስራ ላይ እንዲሰማሩ በማድረግ ስህተታቸውን እንዲያምኑ ይደረጉ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> When people were driving in long coats, they were beaten with steel rods, and made to work as pigkeepers to make them believe their mistakes.</s>

en: Zhang Zhixin had his throat cut, Wang Shiwei was buried in a well after a secret execution.
amh: ዛነግ ዚን አንገቱን ተቆርጧል፣ ዋንግ ሰዊ በድብቅ ከተገደለ በኋላ ጉድጓድ ውስጥ ተቀብሯል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The head of Zanzao Zin was cut off, Wang Shui was killed in secret and buried in a hole.</s>

en: Lao She and Fu Lei committed suicide… Throwing shoe at him is like a reward.
amh: ላኦ ሺ እና ፉ ሊ ራሳቸውን አጥፍተዋል… ጫማ ወደ እራሳቸው መወርወሩ ለእራሳቸው እንደ ሽልማት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Lao Shi and Fu Li have killed themselves... throwing shoes at themselves is a self-reward.</s>

en: 吴钩1975: Many are debating about the student's act on Weibo.
mt0: <pad> Wu Guo 1975</s>

en: Some clapped their hands, some criticized the student for infringing other's rights.
amh: በዊቦ ብዙዎች ስለ ተማሪው ድርጊት እየተከራከሩ ይገኛሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many people are arguing about the student's action on the web.</s>

en: We should have some consensus in understanding the nature of throwing shoes.
amh: አንዳንዶች አጨብጭበዋል፣ ሌሎች ደግሞ የሌሎቹን መብት መጣስ ተገቢ አይደለም እያሉ ይተቻሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Some cheered, others criticized, saying that violating the rights of others is not right.</s>

en: I don't agree that throwing shoes is an attack.
amh: ጫማ ስለመወርወር ጉዳይ ስምምነት ላይ መድረስ ይኖርብናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> We have to agree on the issue of throwing shoes.</s>

en: It is just a form of protest by the weak side in a situation when the power is not equal.
amh: እኔ ጫማን መወርወር ጥቃት ነው ብየ አላስብም፤ ይልቅስ ደካማው ወገን ተቃውሞውን የሚገልጽበት መንገድ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> I don't think throwing shoes is an attack; it's more a way for the weaker to express their discontent.</s>

en: It is quite commonly seen in western countries when people throw eggs at government officials. Don't label the act.
amh: በምዕራብ ሀገሮች ወደ ባለስልጣናት እንቁላል መወርወር በጣም የተለመደ እና እንደ ጥፋት የማይይጠር ድርጊት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In western countries, throwing eggs at officials is very common and not seen as a crime.</s>

en: 十年砍柴: One should not cheer for the student.
amh: 十年砍柴: ሰዎች በተማሪው ድርጊት ደስ ሊላቸው አይገባም፡፡
mt0: <pad> 十年砍柴: People shouldn't be happy with the student's behavior.</s>

en: In western countries, throwing eggs and shoes are common forms of expression and the punishment is light.
amh: በምእራብ ሀገሮች እንቁላል መወርወር መብት አካል ሲሆን ቅጣቱም እዚህ ግባ የማይባል ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In western countries, throwing eggs is a part of the culture and punishments are not very harsh.</s>

en: But in China, the risk is very high.
amh: ነገር ግን በቻይና አደጋው ብዙ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> But in China the danger is very high.</s>

en: This time Sima Nan does not have the power to punish the student.
amh: ሲማ ናን ተማሪውን መቅጣት ስልጣን የለውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Simin Nan has no power to punish the student.</s>

en: But if other hot blooded students are encouraged and decide to throw shoes at those who have real authority, the price is too huge.
amh: ነገር ግን ድርጊቱን እንደ ተሞክሮ በመውሰድ ሌሎች ተማሪዎች ይሄን ድርጊት ስልጣኑ ያላቸው ሰዎች ላይ ከፈፀሙት፤ የሚከፍሉት ዋጋ ከባድ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> But taking the act as a lesson, other students did the same thing to those in power; the price is very high.</s>

en: Campus Divas For Rich Men is a Facebook page dedicated to hooking up female Kenyan university students under the age of 26 with rich men of any age.
amh: የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ችኮች ለሀብታሞች (Campus Divas For Rich Men) ከ26 ዓመት በታች የሆኑ የኬንያ የዩንቨርስቲ ሴት ተማሪዎችን በማንኛውም ዕድሜ ክልል ውስጥ ያሉ ሀብታሞች ‘ለማጣበስ’ የተፈጠረ የፌስቡክ ገጽ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Campus Divas For Rich Men is a Facebook page set up to lure 26 year old Kenyan university girls into getting married to rich men of any age.</s>

en: The page has used the slogan Money can buy us.”
amh: ገጹ የተጠቀመበት መሪ ቃል ገንዘብ-ይገዛናል” የሚል ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The page used the slogan "Money-Buys Us."</s>

en: After receiving coverage on Kenya’s radio stations such as Kiss 100, Hot 96 and Classic 105 as well as exclusive coverage by Standard Newspaper, Daily Nation and Kenya’s KTN and K24 television stations; netizens created the following hashtags to discuss the Facebook page and share their opinions about it: #campusdivasforirchmen, #HakunaKituUtafanya (there is nothing to do), #CandidatesBetterThanRomney, #TeamMafisi , #wordszawazito , #Kiss100 and #KOT.
amh: ኪስ 100፣ ሀት 96 እና ክላሲክ 105 በተሰኙ የኬንያ ሬድዮ ጣቢያዎች እና በተለይ ደግሞ በስታንዳርድ ጋዜጣ፣ ዴይሊ ኔሽን እና የኬንያ ኬቲኤን እና ኬ24 ቴሌቪዥኖች ሰፊ ሽፋን ከተሰጠው በኋላ የመረብዜጎች (netizens) የሚከተሉትን ‹ሀሽታጎች› ፈጥረው በትዊተር እና ፌስቡክ ላይ አስተያየቶችን አስፍረዋል፡ - #campusdivasforirchmen፣ #HakunaKituUtafanya (ምንም ማድረግ አይቻልም)፣ #CandidatesBetterThanRomney፣ #TeamMafisi ፣ #wordszawazito ፣ #Kiss100 እና #KOT፡፡
mt0: <pad> After widespread coverage on Kenyan radio stations Kiss 100, Hot 96, Classic 105 and in particular on Standard, Daily Nation and Kenyan TV Channels KTN and K24, Kenyan netizens created hashtags and posted comments on Twitter and Facebook: - #campusdivasforirchmen, #HakunaKituUtafanya (nothing can be done), #CandidatesBetterThanRomney, #TeamMafisi, #wordszawazito, #Kiss100 and #KOT.</s>

en: Picture of Facebook Page of Campus Divas for Rich men.
amh: የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች ስዕል፤ ፎቶው የ asselo.
mt0: <pad> Collage of campus-chics for the rich; photo by asselo.</s>

en: Photo by asselo.wordpress.com
amh: wordpress.
mt0: <pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know wordpress.</s>

en: Other netizens took to their blogs and YouTube to either condemn or support this bold move in a predominantly conservative society.
amh: ሌሎች የመረብዜጎች ጉዳዩን የራሳቸው ጦማሮች እና ዩቱዩብ ላይ በማዛወር በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ ወግ በሚያጠብቅ ማኅበረሰብ ውስጥ የተከፈተውን ይህንን ገጽ በማውገዝ እና በመደገፍ ሥራ ላይ ተጠምደዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Other Internet citizens have been engaged in criticizing and supporting this page that was opened in a highly conservative community by moving it to their own blogs and YouTube, taking the matter to their own websites and YouTube.</s>

en: The debate about the page has brought up issue such as social media monitoring, HIV/AIDS, religion and African customs, opportunities for Kenyan youth, poverty, greed and peer pressure among Kenyan university students.
amh: ስለገጹ የተነሳው ሙግት የማኅበራዊ አውታሮች ቁጥጥር፣ የኤችአይቪ/ኤድስ፣ ሃይማኖት እና አፍሪካዊ ልምዶች፣ የኬንያውያን ወጣቶች ዕድል፣ ድህነት፣ ብልሹነት እና የአቻ ግፊት በኬንያ ዩንቨርስቲ ተማሪዎች ላይ ያለው ጦስ ለውይይት እንዲነሱ አድርጓል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The controversy over the page has sparked a discussion about social media control, HIV/AIDS, religion and African practices, Kenyan young people's future, poverty, inequality and the influence of gender pressure on Kenyan university students.</s>

en: The page which was created on 3rd July 2012, has already garnered 50,684 ‘likes’ with 65,830 visitors talking about it.
amh: በጁላይ 3/2012 የተፈጠረው ገጽ ከአሁኑ 50,684 ወዳጆች (‘likes’) እና 65,830 ስለገጹ እያወሩ ያሉ ጎብኝዎችን አግኝቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The page, created on July 3, 2012, has now 50,684 likes and 65,830 people who have been talking about the page.</s>

en: Kenyanlist, a Kenyan blogger, points out that:
amh: ኬንያንሊስት የተሰኘ/ች ኬንያዊ ጦማሪም ለመጠቆም እንደሞከረው/ችው፡
mt0: <pad> Kenyan blogger The Kenyanist also tried to point out, as the Kenyan writer</s>

en: But Solomonirush says that the page is all but a ploy by some canny netizens to take advantage of young Kenyan students.
amh: ሰሎሞንሪሽ ግን ገጹ አሁንም ቢሆን በአንዳንድ ሸረኛ የመረብዜጎች የተፈጠረና በኬንያዊ ወጣት ተማሪዎች ላይ የሚያላግጥ የውሸት ገጽ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> But the page is still a fake page created by some evil Arabs and aimed at Kenyan young students.</s>

en: The blogger reports:
amh: ይህ/ች ጦማሪ እንደሚለው/ትለው፡
mt0: <pad> You don't know what this blogger is/is saying/doing.</s>

en: My investigations reveal that this page, and probably others of the same kind, is administrated by canny people seeking to make money.
amh: ምርመራዬ እንደሚያረጋግጠው፣ ይሄ ገጽ እና ሌሎችም እንዲህ ያሉት ገንዘብ ማግኘት በሚፈልጉ ሸረኞች የተፈጠሩ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> As my investigation has confirmed, this page and others like it are created by scammers who want to make money.</s>

en: I have also seen other pages where dating and sex is the subject of concern, and due to the high number of likes by the audience, they charge to do advertisements on the page.
amh: ሌሎችም ስለ መቃጠር (dating) እና ወሲብ የሚያወሩ ገጾችን አይቻለሁ፡፡ እናም በሚያፈሯቸው ብዙ ወዳጆች ገጹ ላይ ማስታወቂያ እያስቀመጡ ገንዘብ ይቀበላሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I've seen other pages about dating and sex. And a lot of friends who are using them make money by putting ads on the page.</s>

en: The cunning administrators expose the young students, who are willing to adventure, into perils of sexual abuse, sexually transmitted diseases, and kidnapping.
amh: ሸረኞቹ የገጾቹ አስተዳዳሪዎች ለጀብዱ/ታይታ የተዘጋጁ ወጣት ተማሪዎችን ያታልሏቸውና ለፆታዊ ጥቃት፣ ለተላላፊ በሽታዎች እና መታገት ጭምር ያጋልጧቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The administrators of the smuggler's pages trick young students into believing that they are ready for adventure and exposed them to sexual assault, sexually transmitted diseases and even extortion.</s>

en: The social media buzz about the page has led those opposing it to create a Facebook group called Anti-Campus Divas for Rich Men.
amh: ስለገጹ የተጧጧፈው ውይይት ገጹን የሚቃወሙት የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች ተቃዋሚ የተሰኘ የፌስቡክ ገጽ እንዲከፍቱ አስገድዷቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The debate about the page led to campus hooligans forcing them to open a Facebook page called The Rich's Opponent.</s>

en: A Kenyan blogger, Kenya-post, reports:
amh: ኬንያ-ፖስት በሚል የሚጠራ/ትጠራ ኬንያዊ በጦማሩ/ሯ፡
mt0: <pad> Kenyan called Kenya-Post in his/her blog.</s>

en: The second group, Anti-Campus Divas for Rich Men operates on contrary principles of the first one.
amh: ሁለተኛው ቡድን (የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች ተቃዋሚ) በመጀመሪያው ቡድን ተቃራኒ መርሕ ይሠራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The second group (the campus riots-The protesters for the rich) works on the opposite of the first group's policy.</s>

en: As the first preaches sex, sex, sex and cash, it promotes chastity and encourages young people to abstain.
amh: የመጀመሪያው ወሲብ፣ ወሲብ፣ ወሲብ እና ገንዘብ ሲሰብክ ይህንኛው ደግሞ ጨዋነትን በማስተዋወቅ፣ ወጣቶች እንዲታቀቡ ያበረታታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> While the first preached sex, sex, sex and money, this one promoted morality by encouraging young people to behave.</s>

en: Whereas the first group rides high with over 20,000 likes in there Facebook page, the Anti- Campus Divas for Rich Men only has 5,000.
amh: የመጀመሪያው 20,000 ወዳጆች ፌስቡክ ላይ ሲያገኝ ተቃዋሚው ግን 5,000ዎች ብቻ ወደውታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The first one had 20,000 Facebook friends while his opponent only 5,000.</s>

en: Other Facebook pages opposed to Campus Divas For Rich Men include Decent Divas Against Campus Divas for Rich Men and Dislike Campus Divas for Rich Men, Campus Divas For Broke Men With Rich Love.
amh: የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች የተሰኘውን ገጽ የተቃወሙ ሌሎች የፌስቡክ ገጾች ውስጥ እነጨዋ ቀወጢ-ቺኮች የካምፓስ ቀወጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞችን” ይቃወማሉ እና የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞችን አንፈልግም፣ የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች የፍቅር ሀብታም ለሆኑ ችስታ ወንዶች የሚሉ ይገኙበታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Other Facebook pages that oppose the page include Gentle Knockers Against Campus Knockers for Riches and We Don't Want Campus Knockers for Riches, and Campus Knockers for Riches: Love for Rich Stupid Boys.</s>

en: A number of Kenyans on Twitter have condemned hypocrisy over their reactions and stated that Kenyans need to vote for leaders who will increase the Higher Education Loans Board Allowance for less well off partners to be able to date the girls:
amh: ይህንን ተከትሎ በርካታ ኬንያውያን በትዊተር ላይ ምላሻቸውን ሲያሰፍሩ ኬንያውያን ለከፍተኛ ትምህርት መማርያ ብድር ማግኘት የሚቻልበትን መንገድ የሚያመቻች መሪ እንዲመርጡና የሚፈልጉት ሴት መጥበስ እንዲችሉ ጠይቀዋል፡
mt0: <pad> After this, many Kenyans posted their responses on Twitter, asking Kenyans to choose a leader who can provide them with the way to get loans for university education and marry whoever they want.</s>

en: @clansewe: To all Kenyans railing against the 'Campus Divas for Rich Men page, stop your hypocrisy.
amh: @clansewe: የ‹ካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች› ገጽን የምትቃወሙ ኬንያውያን ሁሉ ዝባዝንኬያችሁን አቁሙ፡፡
mt0: <pad> @clansewe: All Kenyans who oppose the page 'Campus Crash-Chicks for Riches', stop your gossip.</s>

en: We all Kenyans have put cash above everything!
amh: ኬንያውያን ሁላችንም፣ ገንዘብን ከምንም በላይ እናስቀድማለን!
mt0: <pad> All Kenyans, we all value money above everything.</s>

en: @kevoice: We will vote 4 leaders who will increase the HELB allowance so that we can be able to date Campus Divas 4 Rich Men. #TujipangeKisiasa
amh: @kevoice: የከፍተኛ ትምህርት ብድር ( HELB ) የሚያሳድግልንን መሪ በመምረጥ ለሀብታሞች የተዘጋጁትን የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ማውጣት አለብን፡፡
mt0: <pad> @kevoice: We have to choose a leader who will raise our HELB by taking out the campus riot-checks for the rich, designed for the rich.</s>

en: @mwendembae: @lionsroar101 So now there is a fb page called anti-campus divas for rich men.
amh: @mwendembae: @lionsroar101 አሁን ደግሞ የ‹ካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞችን ተቃዋሚ› የፌስቡክ ገጽ ተፈጠረ ማለት ነው፤ ገርሞኛል፣ እኔኮ ልከሰት ነበር #idlers
mt0: <pad> @lionsroar101 Now there's a Facebook page for "Campus Riot-Chicks for the Rich"; I'm surprised, I was supposed to be angry.</s>

en: Ha, I'm amused.”was bound to happen #idlers
amh: ይህ አስተያየት በሌሎችም ገጹን በተቃወሙ የመረብዜጎች ተንፀባርቋል፡
mt0: <pad> This opinion was also expressed by other Arabs who supported the page.</s>

en: @thatguydavy: Campus divas for rich men......and you wonder why hurricanes are named after women!
amh: @thatguydavy: የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች…… እና አሁን ለምን ማዕበል በሴቶች እንደተሰየመ ገባችሁ!
mt0: <pad> @thatguydavy: Shocking campus-chicks for the rich...... and now you know why the wave was named after women......</s>

en: @mpalele: The sad part abt this Campus Divas for Rich Men is that they think 50K , coffee java and a trip 2 naivasha is the definition of a rich man.
amh: @mpalele: ስለነዚህ የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች አሳዛኙ ጉዳይ 50,000፣ ቡና እና ጥቂት ጉዞ የሀብታም ሰው ትርጉም ይመስላቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> @mpalele: About these campus riots for the rich The sad thing about 50,000, coffee and a few trips is that rich people think a few trips are the meaning of being rich.</s>

en: @rmresh: Campus Divas For Rich Men....desparation at its best.... @nochiel: @savvykenya Please be warned that the abhorrent Campus Divas For Rich Men page is using your old profile pic
amh: @nochiel: @savvykenya የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች  ላይ ያሉ ፎቶዎች የቀድሞ የፕሮፋይል ስዕሎቻችሁ ሊሆኑ ስለሚችሉ ተጠንቀቁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> @nochiel: @savvykenya 'The campus chicks for the rich' Be careful with photos on your profile as they could be your old ones.</s>

en: KTN Kenya, a television station in Kenya, used the YouTube platform to portray the Facebook page as a prostitution ring and campus students interviewed say that this is nothing out of the ordinary:
amh: የኬቲን ቴሌቪዥን፣ የዩትዩብ አለፈመደብ (platform)በመጠቀም የፌስቡክ ገጹ የሴተኛ አዳሪነት ደወል እንደሆነ እና የካምፓስ ተማሪዎችን ሲጠየቁ ይህ ከተለመደው ውጪ አለመሆኑን ሲናገሩ አሳይቷል፡
mt0: <pad> When asked if this was a normal thing, the students on campus said it wasn't.</s>

en: Campus Divas For Rich Men is so far the boldest move in discussing matters involving Kenyan youth and sexuality openly in such a traditionally conservative society.
amh: የካምፓስ ቀውጢ-ቺኮች ለሀብታሞች በእንደዚህ ያለ ወግ አጥባቂ ማኅበረሰብ ውስጥ የኬንያ ወጣቶችን እና ወሲባዊ ተግባርን በተመለከተ በግልፅ ውይይትን በጉልህ ያራመደ ለመሆን በቅቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The campus riots-chicks for the rich has managed to push forward a public discussion about Kenyan young people and sexual behavior in such a conservative community.</s>

en: So far, bloggers from 95 countries are ready to type with fast and fit fingers.
amh: እንግዲህ ከ95 ሀገሮች የተውጣጡ ጦማሪያን በነዛ ብቁ እና ፈጣን እጆቻቸው ሊከትቡ ተዘጋጅተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Now 95 bloggers from 95 countries are preparing to write with their skilled and fast hands.</s>

en: For one day they will blog about one common theme creating a colorful collection of stories and reflections that will reach a collective audience of millions.
amh: ለአንድ ቀን ሁሉም ስለ አንድ ተመሳሳይ ጉናይ ላይ በመፃፍና የሚያምር የታሪክ ፍሰት በመስራት በሚሊዮን ለሚቆጠሩ ተካታዮቻቸው ይጦምራሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> One day everyone will be writing about the same subject and making an interesting story flow for their millions of followers.</s>

en: On October 15, 2012 - it's Blog Action Day!
amh: ጥቅምት 15፣ 2012 - የጦማር የተግባር ቀን !
mt0: <pad> 15 October 2012 - Blog Action Day!</s>

en: Since 2007 Blog Action Day has worked to raise awareness on important issues by facilitating a yearly blog blitz.
amh: ም ጀምሮ የጦማር የተግባር ቀን በጠቃሚ ጉዳዮች ላይ ንቃትን ለመፍጠር፤ የጦማር ጥቃት ለመፈሰፀም ያስተባብራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> From the beginning of the blog action day, the goal of the blog action day has been to create awareness on important issues; to launch a blog attack.</s>

en: Through the years the event has been covered on Global Voices highlighting the issues as environment, poverty, climate change, water and food.
amh: ያለፉት ዓመታት መሪ ጉዳዮችም አካባቢ፣ ድህነት፣ የአየር ንብረት ለውጥ፣ ውሃ እና ምግብ ነበሩ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The leading issues of the past years were environment, poverty, climate change, water and food.</s>

en: This year's theme is nothing less than ‘The Power of We’. How to write about 'The power of We'?
amh: የዘንድሮው ዓመት መሪ ርዕሰ ጉዳይም ‘የእኛ ኃይል’ ይሰኛል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The theme of this year's annual conference is "Our Power."</s>

en: Photo by Maria Grabowski
amh: ፎቶ በማሪያ ግራቦውስኪ
mt0: <pad> Photo by Maria Grabowski</s>

en: Have you ever felt the power of working together to make a positive change?
amh: ስለ ‘የእኛ ኃይል’ እንዴት መፃፍ ይችላሉ?
mt0: <pad> How can you write about "Our Power"?</s>

en: Write about your own effort in fighting for a cause, or maybe about a group that inspires you - in short: people's joint actions to make a difference.
amh: በርግጥም አዎንታዊ ለውጥ ለማምጣት በጋራ መስራትን አስበዉት ያውቃሉ? ያገባኛል ስለሚሉት ጉዳይ መሟገት ወይም ስለ ወሳኝ እና አነሳሽ ቡድን - በአጭሩ፡ ለውጥ ለማምጣት ሰዎች ይሰባሰባሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Do you really think of working together to make positive change? Speaking out about something that you care about or forming a crucial and passionate group - in short: people come together to make change.</s>

en: You can write your entry in any language, from any country.
amh: እርስዎም በፈለጉት ቋንቋ፣ ከፈለጉት ሀገር ሆነው መፃፍ ይችላሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> You can write in any language, from any country.</s>

en: Register here to join Blog Action Day 2012 for ‘The Power of We’ on October 15 and reach an audience of millions.
amh: በጥቅምት 15/ 2012 'የእኛ ኃይል' በሚል መሪ ርዕስ የሚካሄደውን የጦማር የተግባር ቀን 2012 እዚህ ላይ በመመዝገብ ይቀላቀሉ፤ ለሚሊዮኖችም ተደራሽ ይሁኑ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Join the 2012 Blog Action Day, which will be held on October 15, 2012 under the theme "Our Power" and reach millions of people.</s>

en: Follow #BAD12 for updates on Twitter.
amh: አዳዲስ ለውጦችንም ትዊተር ላይ #BAD12 ብለው ይከታተሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Also follow the latest changes on Twitter by using the hashtag #BAD12.</s>

en: After witnessing its biggest protest, the anonymous organizers of the Dignity March called for another one.
amh: ትልቁን አመጽ ከተመለከቱ በኋላ ህቡዓኑ የክብር ሰልፍ” አዘጋጆች ሌላ የተቃውሞ ጥሪ አቀረቡ፡፡
mt0: <pad> After seeing the large protest, the organizers of the "Solidarity March" made another call for protest.</s>

en: Tens of thousands showed up in the areas of Mishref and Sabah Al-Salem protesting the Kuwaiti ruler's amendment of the voting law, which now allows a citizen to vote for one candidate instead of four.
amh: የኪዌት መሪዎች የመምረጥ መብት ህግን በመከለሳቸው በሚሽረፍ እና ሳባህ አል ሳሌም አከባቢዎች በአስር ሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ ሰዎች ተቃውሟቸውን ሲያሰሙ ታይተዋል፡፡ ይህ ህግ አንድ ዜጋ ለአራት እጩ ተወዳዳሪዎች የሚሰጠውን ድምጽ ወደ አንድ ያወርደዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Thousands of people have been seen protesting in the areas of Bishar and Subah al-Salim against the election law that has been imposed by the Kuwaiti leaders. This law reduces the number of applicants from four to one, which cuts the number of voters from one to four.</s>

en: Protesters did not find the Amir's decree constitutional and believe the new law is made to play with the coming elections in December and to weaken the opposition that won most of the parliament's seats earlier this year.
amh: ተቃዋሚዎቹ የአሚሩን ውሳኔ ሕገ መንግስታዊ ሆኖ አላገኙትም አዲሱ ህግ የተዘጋጀው በዚህ ዓመት ቀድሞ አብዛኛውን የፓርላማ ወንበር ያሸነፈውን ተቃዋሚ ፓርቲ በመጪው ታህሳስ በሚካሂደው ምርጫ ላይ ለማዳከም ነው ብለው ያምናሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Critics did not find the emperor's decision constitutionally valid and believe the new law was designed to weaken the opposition party in the upcoming December election.</s>

en: Like the previous march, Sunday's protest witnessed smoke and tear gas bombs and several arrests of protesters, who were later released.
amh: እንደ መጀመሪያው ሰልፍ ዕለተ ሰንበት የአስለቃሽ ጢስ እና ቦንቦችን ሰለባ የሆኑ ሲሆን በርካቶችም ከታሰሩ በኋላም መለቀቃቸው ታውቋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> As with the first protest, on Sunday they were targeted by smoke bombs and firebombs, and many were arrested but released after being detained.</s>

en: Who is leading the protests?
amh: ተቃውሞውን የሚመራው ማነው ?
mt0: <pad> Who is leading the protest?</s>

en: In the past few years, protests were criticized because they were led by opposition MPs.
amh: ባለፉት ጥቂት አመታት አመጸኞቹ በተቃዋሚ የፓርላማ አባላት በመመራታቸው ትችት ደርሶባቸዋል፤ በኋላ ወጣቶቹ የተቃውሞው መሪዎች ለመሆን ጥረት አድርገዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Over the past few years, protesters have been criticized for being led by opposition MPs; afterwards, young people have tried to be leaders of the protests.</s>

en: Lately, the youth tried to be the leaders of those protests. This shift got bigger numbers to show up for those dignity marches.
amh: ይህ ለውጥ የክብር ሰልፎች ላይ የተሳተፉ ሰዎች ቁጥር እንዲያሻቅብ አድርጎታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This change has allowed the number of people who participate in honor marches to rise.</s>

en: What is interesting though is that an anonymous Twitter account is the one deciding dates of both marches and the meeting points.
amh: ሌላው አስገራሚ የሚያደርገው ነገር ደግሞ የሁለቱም ሰልፎች ቀንና መነሻ ቦታ የተወሰነው በህቡዕ የትዊተር ገጽ መሆኑ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The other interesting thing is that the day and location of both protests were decided by an Anonymous Twitter account.</s>

en: The account @KarametWatan tweeted a message on the 24th of October to Twitter not to revel their identity to the Kuwaiti authorities:
amh: ጥቅምት 24 @KarametWatan (በአረብኛ የሀገር ክብር) የተሰኘ የትዊተር ገጽ ትዊተር ማንነታቸውን ለኪዌት መንግስት አሳልፎ እንዳይገልጥ የሚጠይቅ መልዕክት በትዊተር አስተላለፈ፡፡
mt0: <pad> 24 October @KarametWatan (Arabic: كرامة الوطن) a Twitter account posted a message on Twitter asking people not to give their identities to the Kuwaiti government.</s>

en: We the people of Kuwait ask you to protect the privacy of our account details of @karametwatan from all/any officials seeking the information of the owners and/or IP addresses of the persons using and posting from the mentioned account.
amh: እኛ የኪዌት ህዝቦች የገጻችንን @karametwatan ግለኝነት እና ዝርዝር መረጃዎች በዚህ ገጽ ተጠቅሞ የሚለጥፍን ግለሰብ የበየነመረብ አድራሻ (IP addresses) ከሚፈልጉ ከሁሉም / ከማንኛውም ባለስልጣናት እንዲትጠብቁልን እንጠይቃለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We the people of Kuwait ask that you protect our page @karametwatan from all/any authorities who want to know the IP address of the individuals who post on this page using this page.</s>

en: We are responsible for the organization of a march called Dignity of a Nation in Kuwait, the largest ever march in the history of Kuwait calling for democracy, human rights, and fight against corruption.
amh: በኪዌት ታሪክ ከመቼውም ጊዜ የበለጠ ቁጥር ያለው ዴሞክራሲ፣ ሰብዓዊ መብቶችን እና ሙስናን መዋጋት የጠየቀውን ክብር ለሀገራችን” የተሰኘውን ሰልፍ የማዘጋጀቱን ሃላፊነት እንወስዳለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We will take the responsibility to organize the "Pride for Our Country" rally, which has been called by the most number of people in Kuwait's history, demanding democracy, human rights and fight corruption.</s>

en: The turn-out reached over 150,000 (around 11.5% of citizens of Kuwait) that stunned the government.
amh: ይህ ግልብጥ ብሎ የወጣው ከ150, 000 በላይ ቁጥር ያለው ህዝብ(ከጠቅላላው የከዌት ዜጋ 11.
mt0: <pad> This huge crowd of 150, 000 people (the total number of Kuwaiti citizens) went out in protest.</s>

en: In return the government ordered their forces to attack the peaceful demonstration in a brutal manner that was never been seen before for no reason.
amh: በምላሹም መንግስት በአውሬነት፣ ያለምክንያት፣ ከዚህ በፊት ታይቶ በማይታወቅ መልኩ ይህን ሰላማዊ ሰልፍ እንዲያጠቁ ሀይሎቹን አዟል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In response, the government has sent its forces to destroy this peaceful protest in a way never seen before.</s>

en: Over 100 people were injured and over 50 were detained in an unlawful manner.
amh: ከመቶ በላይ ሰዎች ሲጎዱ ከሀምሳ በላይ የሚሆኑት ደግም በህገወጥ መልኩ ወህኒ ወርደዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Over 100 people were injured and over 50 were illegally jailed.</s>

en: We do not feel safe and your protection of our privacy is pivotal.
amh: በአደጋ ውስጥ እንዳለን ይሰማናል፤ ለግለኝነታችን የምታደርጉት ጥበቃ ወሳኝ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> We feel in danger; your protection of our privacy is crucial.</s>

en: In a comment on having a Twitter account organizing those major marches, Hamad Al-Sabah wrote:
amh: እነዚህ ትልልቅ ሰልፎችን የሚያስተባብረው የትዊተር ገጽ መሆኑ ያሰገረመው ሓማድ አል ሳባህ ይህንን አስተያየቱን አስፍሯል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Mohamed al-Sabah was surprised that the Twitter account that organized the large protests was the one that organized them.</s>

en: @hmalsabah: Am I the only one that is uneasy about the fact that thousands of people in #Kuwait are obeying the commands of some anonymous Twitter acct?
amh: @hmalsabah: በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ በኪዌት ያሉ ሰዎች የአንድን ህቡዕ የትዊተር ገጽ ትዕዛዝ ማክበራቸውን ማመን የከበደኝ እኔ ብቻ ነኝ?
mt0: <pad> @hmalsabah: Am I the only one who couldn't believe that thousands of people in Kuwait followed a secret Twitter page order?</s>

en: Should Bahrainis support Kuwaitis?
amh: ባህሬናውያን ኪዌቶችን ደግፈዋልን?
mt0: <pad> Do the Bahrainis support the Kiwis?</s>

en: Considering the sectarian remarks and support of Kuwaiti opposition figures for the Bahraini regime against the February 14th revolution, the Shia of Kuwait do not want to protest next to the opposition.
amh: የጎጠኞቹን ሐተታ ግምታ ውስጥ በማሰገባትና የኪዌት ተቃዋሚ መሪዎች የጥር 14 አብዮት የባህሬንን ስርዓት በመደገፋቸው፤ የኪዌት ሻይቶች ከተቃዋሚዎች ጎን ሆነው መሰለፍ አይፈልጉም፡፡
mt0: <pad> taking into account the nationalists' statement and that the leaders of the Kuwaiti opposition in the 14th February revolution supported the Bahrein regime; the Kuwaiti Shiites do not want to stand with the opposition.</s>

en: This, in result, influenced the Shia of Bahrain and started a discussion on whether Bahrainis should or should not support Kuwaiti marches.
amh: በውጤቱም የተፅእኖ ወስጥ የወደቀው ባህሬናዊ ሻይት ሰልፉን መደገፍ እንዳለባቸውና መደገፍ እንደሌለባቸው ውይይት ጀምሯል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Bahraini Shiite, who fell into the resulting effect, began to discuss whether to support or not to support the protest.</s>

en: In comment on this topic, Bahraini Human Rights Defender Maryam AlKhawaja wrote:
amh: ለዚህ ርዕስ ምላሽ ባህሬናዊው የሰብዓዊ መብት ተሟጋች ማርያም አልካዋጃ እንዲህ ጽፏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Bahraini human rights activist Maryam Al-Khawaja wrote in response to this article:</s>

en: @MARYAMALKHAWAJA: yes, i support anyone with righteous demands regardless of whether they support mine or not.
amh: ጥያቄዎቹ ሐቀኛ ከሆኑ እነርሱ የኔን ጉዳይ ቢደግፉም ባይደግፉም፤ የኔ ድጋፍ አይለያቸውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> If the questions are sincere, my support will not change whether they support my case or not.</s>

en: @MARYAMALKHAWAJA: there r many of whom supported the bahrain protests who r taking part in the kuwaiti protests as well. but thats not the point
amh: @MARYAMALKHAWAJA: የባህሬንን ተቃውሞ የሚደግፉ በርካቶች በኪዌት አመጽም ሱታፌ አላቸው፤ ነጥቡ ግን ያ አይደለም፡፡
mt0: <pad> @MARYAMALKHAWAJA: Many who support the Bahrein protests are also involved in the Kuwaiti protests; but that is not the point.</s>

en: Another Bahraini activist, Ahmed Al-haddad, from the European-Bahraini Organization for Human Rights wrote :
amh: አህመድ አል ሓዳድ የተባለ ሌላ የባህሬን አራማጅ ከአውሮጳ-ባህሬን የሰብዓዊ መብት ድርጅት ይህን ጽፏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ahmed Al-Khader, another Bahareen activist from the European-Bahrain Human Rights Organization, wrote this.</s>

en: @DiabloHaddad: If you think you have the right to consider the Kuwaiti struggle as of Muslim Brotherhood and sectarian, then others have the right to consider yours as Shia and sectarian too.
amh: @DiabloHaddad: የኪዌትን ትግል እንደ ሙስሊም ወንድማማች እና ጎጠኛ አድርገን የመቁጠር መብት እንዳለህ ካሰብክ ሌሎች ደግሞ ያንተን (የባህሬንን ትግል) እንደ ሻይቶች እና ጎጠኛ ትግል አድረገው የመውሰድ መብት አላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> @DiabloHaddad: If you think the Kuwaiti struggle is a Muslim brotherhood and nationalist struggle, then others should also see yours (the Bahrine struggle) as a Shiite and nationalist struggle.</s>

en: Other objections
amh: ሌሎች ተቃዉሞዎች
mt0: <pad> Other protests</s>

en: Aside from the sectarian conflict, there were others who showed objection to the current protests.
amh: ከጎጣዊ ግጭት ውጭ ሌሎች ደግሞ ለዚህ አመጽ ያላቸውን ተቃውሞ አሳይተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Out of the neighborhood fighting, others have also shown their discontent with this protest.</s>

en: Hamad Al-Sabah, who thinks the coming parliament can solve this crisis instead of protests, tweeted:
amh: ከተቃውሞ ይልቅ መጪው ፓርላማ ችግሩን ይፈታዋል ብሎ የሚያስበው ሓማድ አል ሳባህ እንዲህ ተወተ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Mahmud al-Sabah, who thought the next parliament would solve the problem rather than protests, died so.</s>

en: @hmalsabah: Let me reiterate that I believe that the protesters have a just cause, but I don't support their methods.
amh: @hmalsabah: የማምነውን እንደገና ሳስተውለው የአማጺያኑ ጥያቄ ፍትሐዊ ነው፤ ነገር ግን የሚከተሉትን መንገድ አልደግፈውም፤ በሰላማዊ መንገድ በቀላሉ ሊፈታ ይችላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> @hmalsabah: I believe the protesters' demand is fair; but I don't support the way they are going; it can be easily resolved by peaceful means.</s>

en: It can easily be solved peacefully
amh: ፋዋዝ አል ማትሩድ መለሰለት፡፡
mt0: <pad> Fauzi Al-Matrude answered him.</s>

en: In reply, Fawaz Al-Matroud wrote: @FawazAM: people often mistake mob rule and political freedom.
amh: @FawazAM: ህዝቦች አብዛኛውን ጊዜ በንቅናቄ ህጎች እና ፖለቲካዊ መብቶች ላይ ይሳሳታሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> @FawazAM: People often misunderstand the movement laws and political rights.</s>

en: Just because lots of people break the law together, doesn't make them right.
amh: ብዙ ሰዎች በህብረት ህግን ስለጣሱ እነርሱን ትክክል አያደርጋቸውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many people in the United States don't feel that breaking the law of the Union is wrong.</s>

en: @HisHersQ8: The Amir has a point when it came to illegal protests.
amh: @HisHersQ8: ህገወጥ ተቃውሞ ጋር ስንመጣ አሚሩ ነጥብ አላቸው፤ በዓለም ዙርያ ያሉ ዴሞክራሲዎች ሁሉ የትኛውንም ህገ ወጥ ተቃውሞችን ያቆማሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> @HisHersQ8: When it comes to illegal protest, Amir has a point; all democracies around the world stop any illegal protests.</s>

en: Democracies all around the world stops any illegal protests
