en: Did Jordanians crackdown on Kuwaitis?
amh: ጆርዳናዊያን በኪዌቶች እርምጃ ተወስዶባቸዋል ?
mt0: <pad> Do Jordanians have been taken prisoner by the Kuwaitis?</s>

en: Weeks ago, an anonymous Twitter user named Mujtahidd tweeted about Jordan sending troops to repress Kuwaiti protesters.
amh: ከሳምንታት በፊት ሙታሂድ በሚል ስም የሚራ ህቡዕ የትዊተር ገጽ የኬዌት ተቃዋሚዎችን ለማፈን ጆርዳን ወታደሮቿን ልካለች ብሎ ተወተ፡፡
mt0: <pad> For a few weeks a mysterious Twitter account called Mutahid accused Jordan of sending troops to quell the protests of Kuwaiti citizens.</s>

en: The popular and controversial Twitter user got Salafi MP Walid AlTabtabai to tweet the news.
amh: ታወቂውን እና አወዛጋቢ ሳሊፊ የፓርላማ አባል ዋሊድ አልታባቲበያ ዜናውን በተዊተር አሰራጨው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The famous and controversial Salif MP Walid Al-Tabbatiya spread the news on Twitter.</s>

en: Yesterday, in the protest, former MP and opposition frontman Musalam Al-Barrak gave a controversial speech.
amh: ትላንት ደግሞ የቀድሞው የፓርላማ አባል እና የተቃዋሚው ፊትአውራሪ ማስላም አል ባራክ አወዛገቢ ንግግር አደረገ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Yesterday, former parliamentarian and the leader of the opposition, Mohammed al-Bark, made a controversial speech.</s>

en: The MP was jailed last week for defaming the Amir but got released in two days due to the big protests that took place in his support.
amh: ባለፈው ሳምንት የአሚሩን ክብር በማሳነሱ የታሳረ ቢሆን እርሱን የሚደግፍ ታላቅ ተቃውሞ በመቀስቀሱ በሁለት ቀናት ውስጥ ሊለቀቅ ችሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> He was arrested last week for insulting the dignity of the Amir, but after a large protest by his supporters he was freed in two days.</s>

en: In this video, Al-Barrak says: Security men are our brothers. If they beat you, do not react. But if they are Jordanian or Palestinian security men, then we will step on them.
amh: በዚህ ቪድዮ አልባራክ የደህነት ሰዎች ወንድሞቻችን ናቸው፤ ቢመቷችኹ አጸፋውን አትመልሱላቸው፤ ግን የጆርዳን እና ፍልስጤም የደህንነት ሰዎች ቢሆኑ ግን ተነሱባቸው” ብሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Arabic video shows the Al-Abrac security men are our brothers; if they hit you, don't retaliate; but Jordanian and Palestinian security men, stand up for them.</s>

en: In reaction, Jordan's foreign ministry made a statement denying the accusations.
amh: በምላሹ የጆርዳን የውጭ ጉዳይ ሚኒስቴር ክሱን ክዶ መግለጫውን አቅርቧል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Jordanian Ministry of Foreign Affairs denied the charges and issued a statement.</s>

en: The Amir's reply
amh: የአሚሩ ምላሽ
mt0: <pad> Amir's answer:</s>

en: Ethiopia was among four African countries that were elected as members of the United Nations Human Rights Council on 12 November, 2012.
amh: አ. የተባበሩት መንግስታት የሰብዓዊ መብቶች ምክር ቤት አባላት ሆነው ከተመረጡ አራት የአፍሪካ ሀገራት ውስጥ ኢትዮጵያ አንዷ ነች፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia is one of the four African countries selected to be members of the UN Human Rights Council.</s>

en: Other countries that were elected for a three-year term are Argentina, Brazil, Côte d’Ivoire, Estonia, Gabon, Germany, Ireland, Japan, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Montenegro, Pakistan, the Republic of Korea, Sierra Leone, the United Arab Emirates, the United States and Venezuela.
amh: ለመጪዎቹ ሶስት አመታት የተመረጡ ሌሎች ሀገራት አርጀንቲና፣ ብራዚል፣ ኮትዲቯር፣ ኢስቶኒያ፣ ጋቦን ፣ ጀርመን፣ አየርላንድ ፣ ጃፓን፣ ካዛኪስታን፣ ኬንያ ሞንቴኔግሮ፣ ፓኪስታን፣ የኮሪያ ሪፐብሊክ፣ ሴራሊዮን፣ የተባበሩት አረብ ኢመሬት፣ አሜሪካና ቬንዙዌላ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Other countries selected for the next three years are Argentina, Brazil, Botswana, Estonia, Gabon, Germany, Ireland, Japan, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Montenegro, Pakistan, the Republic of Korea, Sierra Leone, the United Arab Emirates, the United States and Venezuela.</s>

en: However, Ethiopia’s election to Human Rights Council did not go down well with most Ethiopians.
amh: ነገር ግን የኢትዮጵያ ለሰብዓዊ መብቶች ምክር ቤት መመረጥ ብዙዎቹን ኢትዮጵያውያንን አላስደሰተም፡፡
mt0: <pad> But the election of Ethiopia to the UN Human Rights Council did not please many Ethiopians.</s>

en: Writing about the election the Ethiopian satirist Abe Tokichaw wrote in Amharic :
amh: ኢትዮጵያዊው ምፀተኛ አቤ ቶክቻው ይህን ምርጫ አስመልክቶ ይህን ጻፈ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Ethiopian satirist, Abe Tokicha, wrote this about the election.</s>

en: Ethiopian blogger and journalist Eskinder Nega was sentenced to 18 years in jail with 23 other activists on On 13 July, 2012.
amh: አ ከሌሌች 23 አራማጆች ጋር ተከሶ 18 ዓመት ተፈርዶበት በእስር የሚገኘው ኢትዮጵያዊው ጦማሪ እና ጋዜጠኛ አስክንድር ነጋ የፎቶ ምንጭ፡
mt0: <pad> The Ethiopian blogger and journalist Asokandrar Ngawang, who was convicted of conspiracy to commit terrorism with 23 other dissidents, is currently in jail.</s>

en: Photo courtesy of FreeEskinderNega.com
amh: - FreeEskinderNega.
mt0: <pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know - FreeEskinderNega.</s>

en: Ethiopia has been elected to be a member the United Nations Human Rights Council.
amh: ኢትዮጵያ የተባበሩት መንግስታት ሰብአዊ መብት ኮሚሽን አባል ሀገር ሆና ተመረጠች።
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia was selected as a member of the United Nations Human Rights Commission.</s>

en: Which Ethiopia?
amh: የትኛዋ ኢትዮጵያ! ?
mt0: <pad> What's the name of Ethiopia?</s>

en: Which Human Right?
amh: የትኛው ሰብአዊ መብት!
mt0: <pad> What human rights do you know?</s>

en: Which United Nations Human Rights Council?
amh: የትኛው የተባበሩት መንግስታት የሰብአዊ መብት ኮሚሽን!
mt0: <pad> The United Nations Human Rights Commission</s>

en: Is it not worrisome that an Ethiopian sense of discomfiture is not shared by our government?
amh: እኔ የምለው ኢትዮጵያዊው የዩልኝታ ባህላችን ያለው ህብረተሰቡ ዘንድ ብቻ መሆኑ በጣም አሳሳቢ ችግር አይመስላችሁም?
mt0: <pad> I think that the Ethiopian hospitality culture is only in the community, doesn't it?</s>

en: If our government had any Ethiopian sense of discomfiture, they would have rejected when they got elected as a member the United Nations Human Rights Council!
amh: እንዴ መንግስት እኮ ይሉኝታ ቢኖረው ኖሮ ተመድ የሰባዊ መብት ኮሚሽን አባል አድርጌ መርጨሀለሁ!
mt0: <pad> If the government had a sense of compassion, I would have elected you as a member of the Human Rights Commission.</s>

en: They would have admitted that the Ethiopian government would not fit in the Human Rights Council but our government never had an Ethiopian sense of discomfiture and accepted the membership to United Nations Human Rights Council gladly!
amh: ” ሲለው… አረ በህግ አምላክ እኔ አልሆናችሁም ሀገር ተሳስታችሁ ነው! ወይ ደግሞ ባታውቁኝ ነው የመረጣችሁኝ…! ” ማለት ነበረበት።
mt0: <pad> He had to say, "Oh my God! I'm not you! You've either misjudged me or you haven't known me!</s>

en: They even went on to declare that the Ethiopian government has a good human right record!
amh: ነገር ግን መንግስቴ ምን ይሉኝ” ያልፈጠረበት ነውና አሜን ብ ሎ መቀበሉ ሲገርመን፤ ጭራሽ በአደባባይ እንዲህ ነን እኛ ሰብአዊ መብት ጠባቂዎች” ተብሎ ተነገረን!
mt0: <pad> But the government took it all in stride, and even told us in public that we are human rights defenders.</s>

en: Zerihun Tesfaye, an exiled journalist and blogger, described the conundrum of Ethiopia’s election in an extended Amharic note on Facebook:
amh: በደረሰበት ጫና ከሀገር የተሰደደው ጋዜጠኛ እና ጦማሪ ዘሪሁን ተስፋዬ በፌስቡክ ገጹ ይህን ለማመን የሚከብድ ‘የኢትዮጵያ መመረጥ’ እንዲህ ሲል ገልጾታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The journalist and blogger, Zerishaun Tesfaw, who fled the country under pressure, has written on his Facebook page that it is difficult to believe that "Ethiopia was chosen."</s>

en: Let me chant, I can’t, I can’t as she has forgotten my cause!
amh: እስቲ ልነሳና ልበል አልቸም አልቸም
mt0: <pad> I'll stand up and say, "Alchemy.</s>

en: Says a local songster.
amh: እሷ የኔን ነገር ትተዋለች መቼም የሠፈራችን አዝማሪ።
mt0: <pad> She's gone with me, anyway. Our village singer.</s>

en: I find it easy to join this local songster and chant with him when we fall upon international organizations and governments who deafen their ears to our cause!
amh: አንዲህ ነገር ዓለሙን የተዉ ግለሰቦች፣ ዓለም አቀፍ ተቋማት እና መንግሥታት ሲያጋጥሙ አዝማሪውን ተቀብሎ ማንጎራጎሩ ሳይቀል አይቀርም።
mt0: <pad> When you see this kind of thing from world-leavers, international organizations and governments, it's not unlikely that the singer will be greeted by the audience and sung.</s>

en: But paradoxically, sometimes international organizations have a better understanding than Ethiopians themselves, about horrendous human right situations in Ethiopia and we feel better as we consider the international community is recognizing our great efforts.
amh: ስለኢትዮጵያ መንግሥት ሰብዓዊ መብት ረገጣ አንዳንዴ እኛን ባለጉዳዮቹን በሚያስደንቅ ኹኔታ የዓለም ዓቀፉ ማኅበረሰብ ሲያቀነቅን ወይ ጉድ ለካንስ እነዚህ ሰዎች የልብ አውቃ ኖረዋል ብለን ተስፋ እናደርጋለን።
mt0: <pad> When the international community suddenly voices concern for human rights abuses by the Ethiopian government, we wonder if they have a heart.</s>

en: Sometimes we even think the international community is part of the revolution we aspire to in Ethiopia and our hearts fill with joy!
amh: አንድ ቀን የለውጡ አካል ሆነው የነጻነታችንን እንቀዳጃለን ብለንም ልባችን በሐሴት ትሞላለች።
mt0: <pad> Our heart is also full of joy that one day we will be part of the revolution and claim our freedom.</s>

en: So through journalism we used to report a lot on human rights abuse in Ethiopia.
amh: እናም የጋዜጠኝነት ሙያችንም የረዳንን ያህል የማቃጠር ሥራ እንሠራለን።
mt0: <pad> And our journalistic expertise will help us to make the most of it.</s>

en: For instance, if we report fifty innocent Ethiopians are jailed in a famous prison called Kality” some of the international community members correct us with more accurate number (120) of innocent prisoners including their names!
amh: ሌሎች የማይጠቀሱ ጉዳዮች ተደራርበው ትላንት የተባበሩት መንግሥታት የሰብዓዊ መብቶች ካውንስል ይህቺን በሰብዓዊ መብት አያያዝ የማትጠረጠር አገር አባል አድርጎ ሲመርጥ ግን የሠፈሬን አዝማሪ ማስታወስ ግድ አለኝ።
mt0: <pad> When the UN Human Rights Council yesterday elected this country a member, I had to remember the shepherd's poet.</s>

en: Then we feel these people are with us and hope good things are yet to come!
amh: በእውነት እነዚህ የመብት ተሟጋቾች እና ተቋማት ተስፋ ሊያስቆርጡን እየሞከሩ ነው?
mt0: <pad> Really are these rights activists and institutions trying to kill hope?</s>

en: But when I heard of the news of Ethiopia’s election to the United Nations Human Rights Council last evening, the hymn of our local songster rang a bell!
amh: ወይስ በየትኛውም መስፈርት አገርን ለማስተዳደር ብቃቱ የሌለው ቦዘኔ መንግሥት ምን አልባት አባል ሲሆን የጠባይ ለውጥ ያመጣ ይኾን ብለው?
mt0: <pad> Or maybe the weak government that is incapable of governing the country by any standard might change its behavior if it became a member?</s>

en: Are these intergovernmental human rights organizations trying to destroy our optimism?
amh: አሁን አሁን እየተፎጋግርን ያለን ያህል ተሰማኝ።
mt0: <pad> I feel like we're running now.</s>

en: Or do they think a bad-mannered government will get better when it becomes a member of United Nations Human Rights Council?
amh: ክፋቱ አሁንም የእነሱን ድጋፍ የምንፈልግ መሆናችን፤ የለማኝ ስልቻ ቢንከባለል ከለማኝ ደጅ እንዲሉ።
mt0: <pad> The bad thing is that we still need their support; the prayer wheel shall be folded, the prayer seat shall be turned away from the prayer bed.</s>

en: Nowadays I feel everybody has become politically correct to everybody!
amh: ሌላው ያገባኛል ያለው የበየነ መረብ ቀበኛ ዮሐንስ ሞላ ይህን ጻፈ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Other concerned internet troll John Moll wrote this.</s>

en: But the worse thing is still we need their help!
amh: እማር በሰር ጫሪም፣ ጒቸ ገግት ቧሪም፡፡
mt0: <pad> 'I am a lion, I am a wolf, I am a leopard.'</s>

en: And another concerned netizen, Yohanes Molla, wrote :
amh: ” የጉራግኛ ተረትና ምሳሌ (ወማካ) ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> "The Guragunta is a collection of proverb and saying (hamakka)."</s>

en: There is a local proverb which says: A fool makes a donkey carry red meat and sends her along with a hyena!
amh: ወደ አማርኛ ሲመጣ አህያ ላይ ስጋ ጭነው፣ ጅብን ሸኝ አሉት፡፡
mt0: <pad> When he came to Amharic, they put meat on a donkey and sent him away.</s>

en: So the hyena will chomp through the red meat and later turn on the donkey!
amh: እንግዲህ ይህ ሲሆን ውጤቱ ግልፅ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> So the result is clear.</s>

en: However, when I woke up this morning I could not escape this story!
amh: ምናልባት አህያዋንም ጠግቦ ካቆያት ነው እንጂ እርሷንም በጊዜ ይበላታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Maybe he's fed the donkey, but he'll eat it too if he doesn't keep it fed.</s>

en: It keeps coming back to me and makes my day horrific!
amh: ትናንት ማምሻውን በእንቅልፍ ልቤ አንብቤው….
mt0: <pad> I read it in my sleep yesterday evening.</s>

en: So what could better describe Ethiopia’s election to United Nations Human Rights Council other than the proverb I cited above!
amh: ’ እያልኩ ተኝቼ፣ ዛሬ ስነቃ እውን ሆኖ የደገመኝና እስካሁን ድረስ በአህምሮዬ ላይ ተተክሎ ቀኔን ያጠቆረብኝና፣ እያቃጨለብኝ ያለውን ኢትዮጵያ የተመድ የሰብዓዊ መብት ካውንስል አባል የመሆን ወሬ ጉዳይ ከዚህ ተረትና ምሳሌ የተሸለ ምን ይገልፀው ይሆን?
mt0: <pad> "I'm going to sleep and I'm going to say, "What can be better than this proverb and example to describe the news that Ethiopia is to become a UN Human Rights Council member?</s>

en: Jawar Mohammed wrote a detailed analysis of how Ethiopia secured a seat in the council.
amh: ዳንኤል ብርሃነ ግን የኢትዮጵያን የምክር ቤት አባልነት ከሚቃወሙት ጋር አይስማማም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Daniel Berhane does not agree with those who oppose the parliamentary membership of Ethiopia.</s>

en: But Daniel Berehane disagreed with those opposing Ethiopia's membership to the council:
amh: የኢትዮጵያ ለተባበሩት መንግስታት ሰብዓዊ መብቶች ምክር ቤት መመረጥ ምንም ጥመት አላየኹበትም፡፡
mt0: <pad> I don't see any negative in the election of Ethiopia to the UN Human Rights Council.</s>

en: I see no anomaly with Ethiopia being elected to the UN Human Rights Council. Both Ethiopia and the Council have good Constitutions.
amh: ሁለቱም፤ ኢትዮጵያም ምክር ቤቱም ጥሩ ሀገ መንግስት አላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Both, Ethiopia and the Congress, have a good constitution.</s>

en: They both have capacity (political, financial, etc) limitations implementing it.
amh: ሁለቱም ለትግበራ የአቅም (ፖለቲካዊ፣ የገንዘብ ወዘተ.
mt0: <pad> both implementation capabilities (political, economic, etc.)</s>

en: Perfect match.
amh: ፍጹም ጥምረት!
mt0: <pad> Perfect combination!</s>

en: Human rights groups have been criticizing Ethiopia as one of the most serious human rights violators in Africa with huge number of dissidents, activists and journalists languishing in jail.
amh: ኢትዮጵያ የሰብዓዊ መብት ተሟጋቾች ከፍተኛ የሰብዓዊ መብት ጥሰት ያካሄዳሉ ብለው ከሚከሷቸው የአፍሪካ ሀገሮች አንዷ ስትሆን በተጨማሪም በርካታ ተቃዋሚዎች፣ አራማጆችና ጋዜጠኞች በወህኒ የሚሰቃዩባት ናት፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia is one of the countries that human rights activists accuse of being one of the worst human rights abuses in Africa and where many opponents, activists and journalists are imprisoned.</s>

en: The reports have not been received well by some netizens.
amh: ይህ የባቡር መሥመር የአቡነ ጴጥሮስንና የዐፄ ምኒሊክን ሐውልት እንዲነሡ ያደርጋል?
mt0: <pad> Is this train line going to lift the statues of Abbot Peter and King Maximilian?</s>

en: It was in 1896 that Ethiopian forces led by Emperor Menelik II had defeated an Italian army with better contemporary military technology at the Battle of Adwa.
amh: በወቅቱ የኢትዮጵያ ንጉሰ ነገስት የነበሩት አጼ ምኒልክ መላውን የኢትዮጵያ ህዝብ ከጎናቸው አሰልፈው የጊዜውን ዘመናዊ መሳሪያ የታጠቀውን የጣሊያን ጦር አድዋ ላይ ድል አደረጉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The then King of India, Prince Menon, gathered all the people of the country behind him and defeated the Italian army on Adwa with modern weapons.</s>

en: Subsequently, the victorious Emperor had brought in a range of technologies including railway to transform his country.
amh: በቀሪው የንግስና ዘመናቸው ደግሞ በዘመኑ መንፈስ የተቃኙ ብዙ ስራቸውን ሲያከናወኑ የባቡር መስመርን ጨምሮ በርካታ ስልጣኔዎች ወደሀገራችን እንዲገቡ ጥረት በማድረግ አሳልፈዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In his remaining years of reign he did many modern work, while trying to bring in many civilizations to the country, including the train line.</s>

en: For his triumph at Adwa and for his endeavor to change Ethiopia in his own ways, a statue in his honor was erected at the center of Addis Ababa called Arada.
amh: ለዚህ የአድዋ ድልና ሀገሪቱ ዘመናዊ እንድትሆን ላደረጉት ጥረት መታሰቢያ ይሆን ዘንድ ይህ ሐውልት በመሐል አዲስ አበባ አራዳ ጊዮርጊስ ቆመላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> This statue is standing in the middle of New York City, Ararat Giorgis to commemorate this victory and the efforts made to make the country modern.</s>

en: The statute of Emperor Menelik II in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
amh: ኢትዮጵያን ወረረ፡፡
mt0: <pad> He invaded Ethiopia.</s>

en: Almost forty years later, in 1935, the Italians launched a new but a prearranged military campaign endorsed by their then belligerent leaders.
amh: ከመጀመሪያዎቹ ኢትዮጵያውን ጳጳሳት አንዱ የሆኑት ብፁዕ አቡነ ጴጥሮስ እጃቸውን ተይዘው ማርሻል ግራዚያኒ ፊት ቀረቡ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Reverend Pope Peter, one of the first Ethiopian bishops, appeared before Marshal Garigiani with his hand taken.</s>

en: The Italians managed to have a brief military occupation of Ethiopia but faced a staunch resistance from Ethiopians.
amh: የኢትዮጵያ መሬት ጠላትን ብትቀበል የተረገመች ትሁን፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ethiopian land be cursed to receive enemies.</s>

en: Pope Abune Petros, who was among the first Popes of Ethiopian Orthodox Church, was the leading figure of the resistance in Ethiopia.
amh: በፈጣሪዬ ኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ ስም የተወገዘች ትሁን፡፡ ” ብለው ተናገሩ፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the name of my Lord Jesus Christ, be she cursed!</s>

en: The Italians never liked what he was doing as a patriot and tried to stop him.
amh: ከዚያ በማርሻል ግራዚያኒ ትእዛዝ በስምንት ጥይት ተደብድበው ወደቁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Then, at the order of Marschall Garibaldi, they were struck by eight bullets and fell.</s>

en: He was forced to appear before General Rodolfo Graziani to submit and declare the Ethiopian patriots as bandits.
amh: አለመሞታቸው ሲታወቅ ከግራዚያኒ አዛዦች አንዱ በሦስት የሽጉጥ ጥይት ራሳቸውን በመምታት ገደላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> When it became known that he was not dead, one of the Garibaldi officers shot himself with three rifle bullets.</s>

en: He refused to comply with their demand and condemned the aggressors instead. He asked Ethiopians to struggle for their freedom. Finally, the Italians executed him in public.
amh: ይህን ለሀገር ነጻነት የከፈሉትን መስዋዕትነት ለማዘከር በግፍ ከተገደሉበት ቦታ በቅርብ ርቀት ሐውልት ተሰራላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> This sacrifice for the country's freedom was commemorated by building a monument near the site of their brutal murder.</s>

en: As it was done with Emperor Menelik II, a statue of Abune Petros was built at the center of Addis Ababa as reminiscent of his unwavering stand for his country.
amh: ይሁንና ከቻይናው ሪልዌይ ግሩፕ ሊሚትድ ጋር በመተባበር የከተማ ባቡር መስመር ለመዘርጋት ያቀደው የኢትዮጵያ መንግስት እነዚህን ሁለት ሐውልቶች ሊያፈርስ መዘጋጁቱ ብዙ ኢትዮጵያውያንን አስቆጥቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> But the Ethiopian government is preparing to demolish these two statues in order to build a city rail line in cooperation with Chinese Railway Group Limited, which has angered many Ethiopians.</s>

en: However, unconfirmed reports are circulating online that the two iconic statues found on an historical thoroughfare might get wrecked due to an Addid Ababa rail tunnel construction project.
amh: ስለኢትዮጵያ ታሪክ ባሕል እምነት ፖለቲካ እና ትውፊት ምልከታውን የሚያቀርበው ዳንኤል ክብረት መሠረታዊ ጥያቄውን በማስቀድም ትችቱን አስከተለ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Daniel Kable is a contributor to the BBC's weekly Ethiopian political and cultural magazine.</s>

en: The reports have not been received well by some netizens.
amh: ይህ የባቡር መሥመር የአቡነ ጴጥሮስንና የዐፄ ምኒሊክን ሐውልት እንዲነሡ ያደርጋል?
mt0: <pad> Is this train line going to lift the statues of Abbot Peter and King Maximilian?</s>

en: The statute of Pope Abune Petros in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
amh: ለዚህ ጥያቄ ምላሹ ‹አዎን› ከሆነ ስለ ባቡሩ የሚኖረን ግምት ይለያል፡፡
mt0: <pad> If the answer to this question is "yes", our attitude towards the train will change.</s>

en: Daniel Kiberet, a blogger who usually write on culture, history and spirituality of Ethiopia, asks :
amh: ኢትዮጵያን እናሳድጋለን ስንል ያሳደጓትን እየዘነጋንና መታሰቢያቸውን እያፈረስን መሆን የለበትም፡፡
mt0: <pad> When we are trying to develop Ethiopia, it should not be by forgetting the ones who have brought it up and by destroying their memorials.</s>

en: Will the Addis Ababa rail lines construction destroy the statues of Emperor Menelik II & martybishop Abune Petros?
amh: ‹በማን ላይ ቆመሽ እግዜርን ታሚያለሽ› አለ ያገሬ ሰው፡፡
mt0: <pad> "Who's the one you stand on, and you're looking at God?" said the villager.</s>

en: If the answer to this question is yes, our stance for the rail lines construction would be different!
amh: የምናመጣው አዲስ ነገር ባለን ላይ የሚጨመር እንጂ ያለንን የሚያጠፋ መሆን የለበትም፡፡
mt0: <pad> We bring something new that should add to what we have, not destroy what we have.</s>

en: Our development should not come at the expense of the statues of forefathers of Ethiopia who have given their life for the country!
amh: መኪና ያስፈልገናል፣ ግን እግር የሚቆርጥ መሆን የለበትም፡፡
mt0: <pad> We need a car, but it shouldn't be a drag.</s>

en: What we put in for development should reflect on what we already have, it should not destroy what we have.
amh: ይህን ታሪክና ቅርስ እያጠፉና እያበላሹ የሚመጣ ለውጥ አንገት ቆርጦ ፀጉርን እንደማስተካከል ነው የሚቆጠረው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The change that comes destroying and damaging this history and heritage is considered to be like removing the head and readjusting the hair.</s>

en: We might need vehicles but the vehicles should not cut off our feet.
amh: እናም የሚመለከታቸው ሁሉ ወደ ርምጃ ከመግባታቸው በፊት ሦስት ጊዜ ሊያስቡ ይገባል፡፡
mt0: <pad> And all those involved should think three times before acting.</s>

en: Whether we like it or not Ethiopia is a country with rich history and heritage and these are foundations for our survival and continuation.
amh: መቼም የመጀመርያውን ባቡር ያስገቡትን የዐፄ ምኒሊክን ሐውልት አፍርሶ ባቡር እናስገባ ማለት የታሪክ ምጸት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Nevertheless, it is a historic insult to demolish the monument of King Maximilian who brought the first train.</s>

en: So constructing rail lines at the cost of Ethiopia’s iconic figures is like going to a barber shop for hair cut after amputating one’s head!
amh: ለነጻነት የተሠውትን የአቡነ ጴጥሮስ ሐውልት ነቅሎ በባቡር ላይ በነጻነት ለመሄድ መከጀል ግፍ መሥራት ነው የሚሆነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The statue of St Peter's, who died for freedom, is being removed and the people being forced to ride on the train in order to be free.</s>

en: The project group should think thrice before they decide to demolish these statutes.
amh: አብይ ተክለ ማርያም ደግሞ ይህ ወሬ ውሽት እንዲሆን ተመኝቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Also, Abiy Tukul Maryam wishes this rumor to be a hoax.</s>

en: Destroying a figure of a man who had built the first railway in Ethiopia a century ago to construct rail lines is a complete sarcasm!
amh: ከአራት አመት በፊት ስለእርሱ ረጅም መጣጥፍ ጽፌ ነበር፡፡

en: Abush Zekaryas relates an incident related to the recent controversy, which erupted in Italy after a small town east of Rome built a memorial to a Fascist military leader, General Rodolfo Graziani, using public funds.

en: It has been three months since Meles Zenawi, the late Ethiopian Prime Minister, was formally declared dead at the age of 57 after months of speculation as to his whereabouts.
amh: የቀድሞው ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር መለስ ዜናዊ የት ይሆኑ ይሆን በሚለው ላይ ወራት የዘለቀው ግምት አቧርቶ በ57 ዓመታቸው ከዚህ ዓለም በሞት እንደተለዩ በመደበኛ መንገድ ከተገለጸ ወዲህ ሦስት ወራት ተቆጥረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The speculation for months about where the former Prime Minister will be has finally ended after officially announced that he died at the age of 57 and was buried in his hometown of Kathmandu.</s>

en: However, Meles Zenawi’s ghost shows no sign of loosening its grip over Ethiopians, through his portraits in the streets of Addis Ababa and almost all major cities, towns and rural villages.
amh: ቢሆንም የመለስ ዜናዊ የሙት መንፈስ በአዲስ አበባ እና በሌሎችም ዋና ዋና ከተሞች እና የገጠር መንደሮች አውራ ጎዳናዎች ላይ በተሰቀሉ ምስሎቻቸው ኢትዮጵያውያንን አጥብቀው የያዙበት እጃቸው የመላላት አዝማሚያ አላሳየም፡፡
mt0: <pad> But the dead spirit of Meles Zenawi has not given up on his strong hand that held Ethiopians in New York and other major cities and rural villages, with their pictures hanging on the streets of the main roads of the capital and other major towns and villages.</s>

en: As his legacy continues to be discussed in various international mainstream media, Ethiopians have been taking to social media sites such as Facebook and Twitter to reflect on his legacy.

en: I used to wonder about people who bitterly hate Genet Zewde while she was a minister of Education and love Meles, People who hate Bereket Simon and admire Meles, those who detest Ethiopian Television and have kind word for Meles, those who despise Ethiopian Telecom and adore Meles.

en: Now that he is dead and we are told that he has been the thinker and doer of all the undertakings the country does the past two decades, can you at least have the decency to get of them and blame the man who is behind all these degenerations and denounce the legacy he built?
amh: አሁን መለስ ሞተዋል፣ እናም ላለፉት ሁለት ዐሥርት ዓመታት የነገሮች ሁሉ አድራጊ እና ፈጣሪ እንደሆኑ ተነግሮናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Now Meles is dead, and for two decades we have been told that he is the doer and creator of everything.</s>

en: If he takes all the praise to himself, should he not be entitled to solely take all the blame as well?

amh: እኔ:- አዎ እርግጥ ነው!
mt0: <pad> I: Oh, sure!</s>

en: He was a great leader and probably the best Ethiopia has seen so far.
amh: ታላቅ መሪ ብቻ ሳይሆን ምናልባት ኢትዮጵያ ያየችው ምርጡ መሪያችንም ነበሩ፡፡
mt0: <pad> He was not only a great leader but probably the best leader that Ethiopia has ever seen.</s>

en: However, this doesn’t mean he wasn’t irreplaceable, as you always believe. MF:- If you think PM.
amh: ነገር ግን ይህ ማለት አንተ ብዙ ጊዜ እንደምታምነው የማይተኩ ናቸው ማለት አይደለም፡፡
mt0: <pad> But that doesn't mean they're not reliable, as you often think.</s>

en: Meles was a great leader, do you support the idea of naming different institutions after his name?
amh: ጓደኛዬ:- መለስ ታላቅ መሪ ናቸው ብለህ ካመንክ ብዙ ተቋማት በእርሳቸው ስም መሰየማቸውን ትደግፋለህ?
mt0: <pad> My friend:- If you believe that Meles is a great leader, do you support the naming of many institutions in his name?</s>

en: Like the renaissance dam” to be named Meles Zenawi dam” and his image to be featured on the 100 Birr bill ?
amh: ለምሳሌ የሕዳሴው ግድብ” የመለስ ዜናዊ ግድብ” ቢባል እና ምስላቸው በመቶ ብር ኖት ላይ ቢሰፍር?
mt0: <pad> For example, if the Renaissance Dam is called the "Mile High Dam" and his image is on the 100 rupee bill, then it would be a "Mile High Dam" and not a "Mile High Dam."</s>

en: ME: - There is no problem with naming things after a great leader at all.
amh: እኔ: - ነገሮችን በታላቅ መሪ ስም መሰየም ምንም ችግር የለውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> I: - There is no problem in naming things after great leaders.</s>

en: For example, I was happy to see that Mekelle University named its new camps in Quiha as Meles Zenawi Institute of Technology” I also heard the same story from Jigjiga University.
amh: ለምሳሌ፣ መቐለ ዩንቨርስቲ የኲሓ ካምፓሱን ‹‹የመለስ ዜናዊ የቴክኖሎጂ ኢንስቲትዩት›› ጅጅጋ ዩንቨርስቲም ውስጥ ተመሳሳይ ታሪክ ሰምቻለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> For example, the University of MQili has renamed its campus in KnaQ "The Malis Zidane Technology Institute" and I have heard similar stories about the University of Jijiga.</s>

en: And then, it seems many Universities, offices, towns and villages are busy naming whatever thing they have after Meles.
amh: እናም፣ ብዙ ዩንቨርስቲዎቸ፣ ቢሮዎች፣ ከተሞችና መንደሮች ያላቸውን ነገር ሁሉ በመለስ እየተሰየሙ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> And, many universities, offices, cities and villages are re- naming everything they have after him.</s>

en: It sounds like they are in completion as to who wins the game” of the day well, and this could go beyond the limit.
amh: ፉክክሩን” ማን ያሸንፋል እየተባባሉ ይመስላል እና ጉዳዩ ከዚህም በላይ ገደብ ሊያጣ ይችላል፡፡
mt0: <pad> "Who will win the race" seems to be a contest and the matter may even go beyond that.</s>

en: For example, yesterday I heard that one of the oldest high schools in Tigray (which was named after one of the past Ethiopian heroes) has been changed to Meles Zenawi high school” – If this is true, it is ridiculous and disrespecting PM. Meles.
amh: ለምሳሌ፣ ትላንትና እንደሰማሁት ከትግራይ ጥንታዊ ትምህርት ቤቶች አንዱ (በነገራችን ላይ በቀድሞ ጀግናችን ስም የተሰየመ ነበር) አሁን ‹‹መለስ ዜናዊ ከፍተኛ ሁለተኛ ደረጃ ት/ቤት›› ተብሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> For example, yesterday I heard that one of the ancient schools in Tigrinya (which was named after our former hero) is now called "Mile high school" and a "Mile high school."</s>

en: Besides, don’t we have other local heroes who should be recognized at the local level, at least?
amh: ይህ እውነት ከሆነ፣ በጣም አስቂኝ እና ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር መለስ የሚያዋርድ ነው የሚሆነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> If this is true, it would be very funny and insulting to Prime Minister Meles.</s>

en: Can’t we just give whatever we want for the new ones and keep the old ones as they are.
amh: በዛ ላይ፣ በአካባቢ ደረጃ ሊከበሩ የሚገባቸው የአንድ አካባቢ ጀግኖች አይኖሩንም ማለት ነው?
mt0: <pad> In addition, does that mean that there are no local heroes to be honoured at the local level?</s>

en: Regarding the renaissance dam, well I believe it is appropriate to name the dam after Meles as it is believed to be one of his ambitious plans and had full energy and commitment for its accomplishment.
amh: የሕዳሴውን ግድብ በተመለከተ፣ በመለስ ስም መሰየሙ ተገቢ ነው ብዬ አምናለሁ ምክንያቱም ግድቡ ከአስጎምጂ ዕቅዳቸው አንዱ በመሆኑና ለአፈፃፀሙም ቁርጠኝነት እና ሙሉ ኢነርጂ ነበራቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Regarding the Idase Dam, I think it is appropriate to name it after Paul, because the dam was one of his ambitious plans and he had a commitment and full energy towards its implementation.</s>

en: But then, I fear that this could be against Meles’s belief because when he decided to name the dam renaissance dam” he probably had a good reason for that.
amh: ነገር ግን ይህም ራሱ ከመለስ እምነት ውጪ ይሆናል ብዬ እሰጋለሁ… ምክንያቱም እርሳቸው ‹‹የሕዳሴው ግድብ›› ብለው ሲሰይሙት በቂ ምክንያት ይኖራቸዋል ብዬ እገምታለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> But I'm afraid that this will be against the wishes of Khomeini... because I think he had a good reason for naming it "The Reconstruction Dam"</s>

en: But still completely in support of the idea of Meles Zenawi Dam”.
amh: ነገር ግን አሁንም ‹‹መለስ ዜናዊ ግድብ›› ቢባል የሚለውን ሐሳብ እደግፈዋለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> But I still support the idea that it should not be called "Mile of Megumi Zenawi."</s>

en: As to featuring Meles’s image on any of the Ethiopia banknotes/bills, I do not think it is a good idea.
amh: ነገር ግን የመለስን ፎቶ በየብሩ ላይ ማተም የሚባለው ጥሩ ሐሳብ አይመስለኝም፡፡
mt0: <pad> But I don't think it's a good idea to print the picture of MLK on every bar.</s>

en: The Ethiopian ruling party, EPRDF, has had to endure an endless censure for using the name and pictures of Meles Zenawi to unite the country under his vision.
amh: የገዢው ፓርቲ ኢሕአዴግ በመለስ ዜናዊ ራዕይ የኢትዮጵያ ሕዝብን አንድ ለማድረግ በስማቸው እና በምስላቸው መጠቀሙን መቀጠል አለበት፡፡
mt0: <pad> The ruling party EPRDF should continue to use their name and image to unite the Ethiopian people in the vision of Meles Zenawi.</s>

en: However, some people feel that the party is abusing the late leader to the maximum.
amh: ምንም እንኳን አንዳንድ የፓርቲ ሰዎች መለስን አላግባብ ፓርቲው እየተጠቀመባቸው እንደሆነ እየተሰማቸው ቢሆንም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Although some party members felt that the party was using Meles inappropriately.</s>

en: In an open memo, Kirubel Teshome asks the widow of Meles Zenawi to stop cheap adoration of her dead husband:
amh: በግልጽ ማስታወሻው፣ ክሩቤል ተሾመ የሟች መለስ ዜናዊ ባለቤት ስለባለቤታቸው እያወሩ ያሉትን ርካሽ የፍቅር ወሬ እንዲያቆሙ ጠይቋል:-
mt0: <pad> In his open note, the wife of late President Meles Zenawi, Kulubele Tassome, asked for the end of cheap love rumors about her husband:</s>

en: Open memo to W/ro Azeb Mesfin: Can you please, please, please, tell the Addis Ababa .A city administration to stop violating the wish of the late PM. You openly told Ethiopians and the world that Meles was not a kind of person that indulges individual fame or cult.
amh: - እባክዎ፣ እባክዎ፣ እባክዎ ለአዲስ አበባ አስተዳዳሪዎች እርስዎ መለስ የግል ዝና እና ሰብእና ግንባታ አይወዱም በማለት ለኢትዮጵያ ሕዝብ በግልጽ የተናገሩትን የመለስ ምኞት መጣስ እንዲያቆሙ ይንገሯቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Please, please, please tell the New York City authorities to stop violating the wishes of your late father, who told the people of Ethiopia that he did not like personal fame and image building.</s>

en: You revealed how he would have disliked to see all this images of him being a wall paper of the city.
amh: ምስላቸው የከተማዋ የግድግዳ ሽፋን ሆኖ ማየት እንዴት እንደሚጠሉ ነግረውናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> They told us how they didn't like to see their pictures on the city walls.</s>

en: I am sure, by now, you may have noticed how the city administration have been relentless in advancing against his legacy by painting the town with pictures of the late PM.
amh: እርግጠኛ ነኝ አሁን፣ የከተማዋ አስተዳደር ያለምንም እረፍት ከተማዋን በመለስ ምስል ከመለስ ውርስ በተቃራኒ እያጥለቀለቀው መሆኑን አስተውለዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> I'm sure now, the city administration has realized that the image of Leila is being smeared throughout the city without rest, in contrast to her legacy.</s>

en: I wonder why they dont wish to let him have peace at least on his death?
amh: ቢያንስ ከሞታቸው በኋላ እንኳን እረፍት እንዲያደርጉ ለምን እንዳልፈቀዱላቸው ግራ ገብቶኛል፡፡
mt0: <pad> I wonder why they didn't allow them to rest even after their death.</s>

en: It is also against his legacy to see cleaner and greener Addis.
amh: አሁንም የፀዳችና አረንጓዴ አዲስ አበባን ማየት ውርሳቸው ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> They missed the clean and green New Delhi.</s>

en: Can you please call for the immediate collection of his images from the walls, fences and buildings of Addis?
amh: ስለዚህ እባክዎ ባስቸኳይ ምስሎቻቸው ከከተማዋ ግድግዳዎች፣ አጥሮች እና ሕንፃዎች ላይ እንዲነሱ ያድርጉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> So please remove their pictures from the city's walls, streets and buildings as soon as possible.</s>

en: It would be a favor that the people of Addis will not forget!
amh: የአዲስ አበባ ሕዝቦች መቼም የማይዘነጉት ውለታ ይሆንልዎታል!
mt0: <pad> The people of New Delhi will never forget the debt you have to them.</s>

en: Since his death, the late prime minister has been praised for the economic growth Ethiopia has claimed to have recorded over the past two decades.
amh: ሞታቸው ከተሰማ ጀምሮ፣ የቀድሞው ጠቅላይ ሚኒስትር የኢትዮጵያ ኢኮኖሚ ላለፉት ሁለት ዐሥርት ዓመታት ላስመዘገበው የዕድገት ክብረወሰን ሲሞገሱ ከርመዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Since his death, the former prime minister has been praised for the record-breaking economic growth of the Ethiopian economy over the past two decades.</s>

en: By the same token, he has also been criticized for jailing political activists and journalists, using vaguely defined terrorism offenses.
amh: በተመሳሳይም፣ የፖለቲካ አራማጆች እና ጋዜጠኞችንም አሻሚ ትርጉም ባለው የአሸባሪነት ወንጀል በማሰራቸውም ይወቀሳሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the same way, political activists and journalists are also accused of committing terrorism in a misleading definition.</s>

en: Ethiopians across the world are celebrating TeamEthiopia, their national Soccer team, who fought a hard draw against defending champions Zambia in the 2013 Africa Cup of Nations in Nelspruit, South Africa.
amh: በመላው ዓለም ያሉ ኢትዮጵያውን የኢትዮጵያ ብሔራዊ እግር ኳስ ቡድን ከባለፈው ዓመት የ2012 የአፍሪካ አገራት ዋንጫ ሻምፒዮን ጋር በኔልስፕሩት፣ ደቡብአፍሪካ ያደረገውን ከባድ ግጥሚያ በድምቀት እያከበሩ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> All Ethiopians around the world are celebrating the difficult game that the Ethiopian national football team had with the 2012 African Cup of Nations champion in Nelson Mandela Stadium, South Africa.</s>

en: Besides the beauty of the Ethiopian game and the composure the players showed after a long absence from the AFCON tournament, Ethiopian politics was at the centre of online discussion.
amh: ከኢትዮጵያውያኑ ውብ አጨዋወት እና ከረዥም ጊዜ መጥፋት በኋላ በአፍሪካ ዋንጫ ከታየው ድንቅ የተጫዋቾች ችሎታ ባሻገር፣ የኢትዮጵያ ፖለቲካ ከኳሱ ጎንለጎን ማዕከላዊ የውይይት አጀንዳ ለመሆን በቅቶ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> Over the Ethiopians' beautiful play and the great players' skills that were shown in the African Cup after a long absence, the Ethiopian politics had managed to be a central topic of discussion alongside the football.</s>

en: Ethiopian fans in the stadium displayed various placards and flags representing different political interests.
amh: በስታዲየሙ ጨዋታውን ለመመልከት የገቡት ኢትዮጵያውያን የተለያዩ ጽሑፎችን እና ባንዲራዎችን ሲያውለበልቡ ታይተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Ethiopians who entered the stadium to watch the game were seen waving different posters and banners.</s>

en: Ethiopian Muslims protest the Ethiopian Government while supporting the Ethiopian Team in South Africa at The Cup of African Nations 2013.
amh: የኢትዮጵያ ሙስሊሞች የኢትየጵያ ቡድንን በደቡብ አፍሪካው የ2013 የአፍሪካ አገራት ዋንጫ ላይ እየደገፉ የኢትዮጵያ መንግሥት ላይ ያላቸውን ተቃውሞ አስደምጠዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ethiopian Muslims have expressed their discontent with the government of Ethiopia by supporting the country's team in the 2013 African Cup of Nations in South Africa.</s>

en: From the Awolia School Support Page Facebook Page
amh: ፎቶው የተገኘው ከአዎሊያ ትምህርት ቤት ደጋፊዎች የፌስቡክ ገጽ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The photo was taken from the Facebook page of Aulia School.</s>

en: In a bid to create a sense of deja vu for Ethiopians the blog Addis Rumble published a few historical photos from old AFCON tournaments in which Ethiopia had participated.
amh: Addis Rumble የተሰኘ ድረገጽ ደግሞ በበኩሉ ከዚህ ቀደም ኢትዮጵያ የተሳተፈችባቸውን የአፍሪካ አገራት ዋንጫ ጫወታዎችን ለትዝታ ያክል ለጥፏቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Addis Rumble, a website that shares the past African Cup of Nations games that Ethiopia has played, posted a photo of the game for memories.</s>

en: In the pictorial post titled, The Ethiopian comeback it wrote:
amh: ‹የኢትዮጵያ መመለስ› የሚል ርዕስ በሰጡት በዚህ ጽሑፋቸው የሚከተለውን አስፍረዋል፡
mt0: <pad> In his article titled "The Return of Ethiopia," he wrote the following:</s>

en: This week Ethiopia is making a surprise comeback at the 2013 Cup of Nations in South Africa after knocking out neighboring rivals Sudan through an aggregate 5-5 draw in the final qualification round.
amh: በዚህ ሳምንት፣ ኢትዮጵያ በድንገቴ ድል ጎረቤታችን ሱዳንን በደርሶ መልስ ጫወታ 5 ለ 5 በመርታት የመጨረሻውን ዙር አልፋ ለ2013 የአፍሪካ ዋንጫ ለመሳተፍ በቅታለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> This week, Ethiopia in a surprise win over our neighbors Sudan in a tie-break 5 to 5 victory over the last round to qualify for the 2013 African Cup of Nations.</s>

en: In the days after the qualification was secured in October last year, Addis seemed like a transformed city.
amh: ለዋንጫ ጨዋታው ማለፏ ከተረጋገጠ ወዲህ ባሉት ቀናት፣ ከጥቅምት ወር ወዲህ አዲስ አበባ የተለወጠች ከተማ መስላ ሰንብታለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> Since the end of the cup game, in October, New Delhi has looked like a different city.</s>

en: Previously you would hardly notice any football celebrations in the cityscape (other than of the usual English Premier League teams) but following the qualification most of the capital’s blue taxis and mini-buses – usually the best way of distilling public opinion – started displaying posters of the national team with a ‘Yes We Can’ text added.
amh: ከዚህ በፊት (ከተለመደው የእንግሊዝ ፕሪሚየርሊግ ወግ በቀር) ብዙም የደመቀ የኳስ ወሬ የማይስተዋልባት ከተማ በዚሁ ወሬ ተጠምዳ ሰንብታለች… ብዙ ጊዜ የሕዝብ አስተያየት እንደሚንፀባርቅባቸው የሚታመኑት የታክሲ ውስጥ ጽሑፎች ሳይቀሩ… ‹አዎ እንችላለን› የሚል ጽሑፍ ለጥፈው ታይተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The city that has been very much involved in the football news for a long time... Even the often-seen posters on taxi cabs that often reflect public opinion... have been displaying a message "Yes we can"</s>

en: The occasion was also packed with interesting Ethiopian political tidbits.
amh: አጋጣሚው የተለየ የፖለቲካ ጣዕምም ተቋድሷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The occasion also took on a different political flavor.</s>

en: Mohamed Ademo, a blogger based in New York wrote on Facebook about how different groups stood behind one team despite their variation on the political and cultural spectrum:
amh: ሞሐመድ አዴሞ የተሰኘ፣ ኢትዮጵያዊ የኒውዮርክ ጦማሪ በፌስቡክ ገጹ ላይ የተለያየ የፖለቲካ አመለካከት ያላቸው ሰዎች ከነፖለቲካ ልዩነታቸው አንድ ቡድንን ለመደገፍ የቆሙበትን ሁኔታ እንደሚከተለው ገልጾታል፡
mt0: <pad> Muhammad Adam, an Ethiopian New York blogger, has described the way different political views stand together to support a group despite their differences of opinion.</s>

en: Sport brings people together.
amh: ስፖርት ሕዝቦችን አንድ ያደርጋቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Sports unites peoples.</s>

en: The cheerful Oromo crowd in South Africa today is a good example of that.
amh: የደስተኞቹ ኦሮሞዎች ስብስብ ዛሬ በደቡብ አፍሪካ ያንን የሚያስመሰክር ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The gathering of the Third Oromo people in South Africa today is proof of that.</s>

en: In the states, rarely do we see both sides (Oromo and other Ethiopians) cheering for the same team.
amh: በአሜሪካ ሁለቱ ወገኖች (ኦሮሞዎች እና ሌሎቹ ኢትዮጵያውያን) አንድ ቡድን ለመደገፍ የምንገናኝበት ዕድል በጣም ጠባብ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The chances of the two groups (Orom and other Ethiopians) meeting in America to support a team is very small.</s>

en: We have separate sporting tournaments and federations.
amh: የተለያዩ የስፖርት ግጥሚያዎች እና ፌዴሬሽን ነው ያለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We have different sports and federations.</s>

en: For Ethiopia's football fans in South Africa, the choice today was between OLF flag, the defacto Oromo flag, and the EPRDF (Ethiopia's ruling party) flag.
amh: ዛሬ በደቡብ አፍሪካ ላሉ የኢትዮጵያ እግር ኳስ ደጋፊዎች ምርጫው በኦነግ ባንዲራ እና በአገልግሎት ላይ ባለው የኦሮሞ ባንዲራ መካከል ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> Today, the choice for Ethiopian football fans in South Africa was between the ONGC flag and the currently in service Orom flag.</s>

en: As you have said so eloquently, whether the Oromo and non-Oromo fans of Team Ethiopia displayed different flags didn't matter. They both supported one team.
amh: እናንተም ቀድማችሁ በግልጽ እንዳስመሰከራችሁት፣ ኦሮሞም ሆኑ የኦሮሞ ያልሆኑ የኢትዮጵያ ቡድን ደጋፊዎች የሚያውለወልቡት ባንዲራ ልዩነት ምንም ችግር የለውም፤ ምክንያቱም ሁሉም የሚደግፉት አንድ ቡድን ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> As you yourself have already proven, the difference of flag that Orom and non-Orom supporters of the Ethiopian team waved was no problem; because they all supported the same team.</s>

en: For far too long, at international sporting events and bazaars, a monolithic image of Ethiopia have been presented to the world.
amh: ለረዥም ጊዜ፣ የዓለም አቀፍ የስፖርት እንቅስቃሴዎች፣ አንዲት ኢትየጵያን ለዓለም ሲያስተዋውቅ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> For a long time, international sports events have been promoting one Ethiopia to the world.</s>

en: An Ethiopia with 3000 years of history that is still a christian island, has one flag, and speaks only Amharic.
amh: የ3000 ዓመት ታሪክ ያላት፣ የክርስትያን ደሴት፣ አንድ ባንዲራ ያላት እና አንድ አማርኛ የምትናገር ኢትዮጵያን፡፡
mt0: <pad> 3000-year history, a Christian island, one flag and one language, Ethiopia.</s>

en: But in reality, Ethiopia is a truly diverse nation with divergent aspirations and historical experiences.
amh: እውነታው ግን፣ ኢትዮጵያ የብዝኃ-ብሔሮች አገር በተለያዩ ታሪኮች እና ባሕሎች የተገነባች መሆኗ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The truth is, Ethiopia is a multi-ethnic country with different history and cultures.</s>

en: As a result, contending national sentiments (isms) have emerged.
amh: በውጤቱም፣ ብሔራዊ ስሜቶች እየጎሉ መጥተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> As a result, nationalism has grown.</s>

en: Under previous Ethiopian regimes, for example, the use of Afan Oromo in public spaces and government offices was banned.
amh: ባለፉት የኢትዮጵያ መንግሥታዊ ሥርዐቶች ለምሳሌ፣ ኦሮምኛ መናገር በሕዝባዊ ስፍራዎች እና በመንግሥት ጽ/ቤቶች ውስጥ የተፈቀደ አልነበረም፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the past Ethiopian governments, for example, it was not allowed to speak Orom in public places and government offices.</s>

en: In EPRDF's Ethiopia, while linguistic and cultural rights are - at least in theory - respected, wearing or displaying an OLF flag amounts to an act of terrorism.
amh: በኢሕአዴግ ኢትዮጵያ፣ የቋንቋና የባሕል መብቶች - ቢያንስ በኀልዮት ደረጃ ቢከበሩም የኦነግን ባንዲራ ማውለብለብና መልበስ በሽብርተኝነት ያስቀጣል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the Ethiopian EAHDE, language and cultural rights - at least in abstraction - are respected, but waving and wearing the ONGC flag is considered terrorism.</s>

en: What you saw today (the bitching and moaning about Oromo flag from those who still want to control the narrative of Ethiopia) is an extension of that false sense of unity.
amh: ዛሬ ያያችሁት (ስለኦሮሞ ሕዝብ ያለውን ትርክት ለመቆጣጠር የሚፈልጉ ሰዎች ስድብ እና ዘለፋ) የመነጨው ከዚህ የሐሰት የአንድነት ቀኖና ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> You have seen today (the abuse and insults of people who want to control the narrative about the Orom people) come from this false unity charter.</s>

en: I concur with you that, at the absence of national consensus, the way forward is to recognize our differences and respect people's rights to identify however they see fit.
amh: ከናንተ ጋር የምስማማው፣ ልዩነታችንን በመቀበል እና ሕዝቦች ያመኑበትን በማክበር ወደፊት መቀጠል ስንችል ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> I agree with you that we can move forward by accepting our differences and respecting what people believe.</s>

en: In the same vein, our Oromo activists should also stop pouncing on every chance to question the nationalism of those who are passionate football fans - and chose to look beyond politics.
amh: በተመሳሳይ መንገድ፣ የኦሮሞ አራማጆቻችን ከፖለቲካ አጀንዳ አፈንግጠው ኳሱን ብቻ ለመመልከት የፈለጉትን የኳስ አፍቃሪዎች ስሜት በብሔር ነክ ጥያቄዎች ማስጨነቃችሁን ማቆም ይኖርባችኋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the same way, our Orom activists should stop trying to hurt the feelings of football fans who want to watch the game only, by asking ethnic questions.</s>

en: All the while, it's imperative to stay civil and use this opportune moment to ask: who is Ethiopian, what's the Ethiopian identity, does the EPRDF flag represent the aspirations of the diverse people of Ethiopia, does waving OLF flag automatically make one a secessionist, why do Oromos love the OLF flag, why are non-Oromo Ethiopians so scared of assertive Oromo nationalism etc.
amh: ይህም ሆኖ ሳለ፣ እንደአንድ አስተዋይ ዜጋ የሚከተሉትን ጥያቄዎች መጠየቅ ተገቢ ይሆናል፡ - ማነው ኢትዮጵያዊ፣ የኢትዮጵያዊነት መለያ ምንድን ነው፣ የኢሕአዴግ ባንዴራ የኢትዮጵያዊ ብዝኃነትን ይወክላል፣ የኦነግን ባንዲራ ማውለብለብስ ገንጣይ ያሰኛል፣ ለምን ኦሮሞዎች የኦነግን ባንዲራ ይወዱታል፣ ለምን ኦሮሞ ያልሆኑ ኢትዮጵያውያን ኦሮሞነታቸውን የሚወዱ ኦሮሞዎችን ማየት ያስደነግጣቸዋል… ወዘተ፡፡
mt0: <pad> But, as a mature citizen it is appropriate to ask the following questions: - Who is an Ethiopian, what is the symbol of Ethiopianism, does the flag of the Ihapd represent the multiethnicity of Ethiopia? Does waving the ONP flag make you look threatening? Why do Oroms like the ONP flag? Why do non-Oroms find it disturbing to see Oroms who love their Oromia?</s>

en: Shared by Ermias M Amare on Facebook
amh: Ermias M Amare በተባለ የፌስቡክ ተጠቃሚ የተለጠፈ
mt0: <pad> Posted by Ermias M Amare on Facebook.</s>

en: On Twitter, under the hashtags of #TeamEthiopia and #Eritrea, there was also a great deal of discussion about sport and politics!
amh: #TeamEthiopia እና #Eritria በሚሉ ሀሽታጎች ትዊተር ላይ ስፖርትና ፖለቲካ ላይ ያተኮሩ በርካታ ውይይቶች ተካሄደዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> #TeamEthiopia and #Eritria are hashtags used on Twitter to discuss sports and politics.</s>

en: Kweschn Media tweeted:
amh: ክዌስችን ሚዲያ የተባለ ተጠቃሚ ያሰፈረውን ትዊት እንመልከት:-
mt0: <pad> Let's see what a Twitter user called QC Media posted:</s>

en: While #Zambia's fans waved only 1 flag, #Ethiopia's side had more than 2 flags.
amh: የ #ዛምቢያ ደጋፊዎች አንድ ባንዲራ ብቻ ሲያውለበልቡ፣ የ#ኢትዮጵያ ደጋፊዎች ከሁለት በላይ ባንዲራዎችን አውለብልበዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> While the Zambian fans waved only one flag, the Ethiopian fans waved more than two flags.</s>

en: But for Zerihun it would have been great for Eritreans if Eritrea was still a part of Ethiopia.
amh: ፖለቲካ የተቀባ ኳስ - መፍትሔ ያልተሰጣቸው ጉዳዮች ነፀብራቅ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Politically Painted Ball - A Mirror of Unresolved Issues</s>

en: Mentioning the alleged failed coup attempt by Eritrean rebel soldiers, he tweeted:
amh: ለዘሪሁን ደግሞ ኤርትራ እስካሁን የኢትዮጵያ አካል ብትሆን ለኤርትራውያን ጥሩ እንደነበር በዕለቱ ተካሄደ ስለተባለው የመፈንቅለ መንግሥት ሙከራ እየጠቀሰ ይናገራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> For Zirishan, it would be better for the Eritreans if Ethiopia were still part of Ethiopia, he said, referring to the attempted coup that happened on the day.</s>

en: Ethiopia will face Burkina Faso in the second match of group C of the AFCON tournament while Zambia will play Nigeria.
amh: ኢትዮጵያ በአፍሪካ ዋንጫ ቡድን ሲ ውስጥ ከተመደበችው ቡርኪና ፋሶ ጋር፣ ዛምቢያ ደግሞ ከናይጄሪያ ጋር ቀጣይ ጫወታ ታደርጋለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia will play Burkina Faso, which is in Group C of the African Cup of Nations, in its next game, and Zambia will play Nigeria.</s>

en: The 2013 Africa Cup of Nations, also known as the Orange Africa Cup of Nations, is 'the' football championship of Africa organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF).
amh: የ2013ቱ የአፍሪካ አገራት ዋንጫ፣ የብርቱካናማ የአፍሪካ አገራት ዋንጫ በመባልም ይታወቃል፣… በአፍሪካ የእግርኳስ ኮንፌዴሬሽን የሚዘጋጅ የአፍሪካ እግርኳስ ሻምፒዮኖች መለያ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The 2013 African Cup of Nations, also known as the Black Africa Cup of Nations,... is the trophy for the African football champions organized by the African Football Confederation.</s>

en: This is the 29th Africa Cup of Nations, and is being held from 19 January to 10 February 2013.
amh: ይህ 29ኛው የአገራት ዋንጫ ሲሆን ከጥር 11/2005 እስከ የካቲት 3/2005 ድረስ ይዘልቃል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This is the 29th Nations Cup and will be held from 11 January to 3 February 2005.</s>

en: What is it like to be a student at the Indigenous University of Venezuela ?
amh: የቬንዙዌላ አገርበቀል ዩንቨርስቲ ተማሪ መሆን ምን ይመስላል?
mt0: <pad> What it's like to be a student at the University of Venezuela</s>

en: Three students from the department of edu-communication recently took part in a workshop led by Rising Voices in order to learn how to take better digital photographs and how to upload and share them on the internet
amh: ከትምህርታዊ ተግባቦት የወጡ ሦስት ተማሪዎች በእያደጉ ያሉ ድምፆች ትዕይንተ ሥራ ላይ ዲጂታል ፎቶዎችን እንዴት ማንሳት፣ በይነመረብ ላይ መስቀል እና ማጋራት እንደሚቻል ለመማር ተሳትፈው ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> Three students from the educational interaction participated in the Growing Voices project to learn how to take digital photos, upload them to the internet and share them.</s>

en: These three students are part of an effort to showcase this unique university designed to provide an intercultural and experimental form of education to students from Venezuela's indigenous communities.
amh: እነዚህ ሦስት ተማሪዎች፣ በዚህ ልዩ ዩንቨርስቲ ውስጥ ከቬንዙዌላ ማኅበረሰብ የተውጣጡ እና በይነባሕላዊ እና ተግባራዊ የትምህርት ዓይነቶችን እንዲለዋወጡ የሚደረገው ጥረት ማሳያ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> These three students, from the Venezuelan community, are a symbol of the effort to exchange cultural and practical education in this special university.</s>

en: By accessing the university's satellite connection, which was provided by the government program called Infocentros , the students are able to access the internet to share images of activities, facilities, and the stunning nature that surrounds the 2,000-hectare campus located in the state of Bolívar.
amh: በመንግሥታዊው ኢንፎሴንትሮስ የተሰኘ ፕሮግራም በተዘጋጀው የዩንቨርሲቲውን የሳተላይት ግንኙነት በመጠቀም ተማሪዎቹ እንቅስቃሴዎቻቸውን፣ ንብረቶቻቸውን እና አስደናቂ ውበት የተላበሰውን እና በቦሊቪያ ውስጥ 2,000 ሄክታር ላይ የተንጣለለውን ካምፓሳቸውን በበይነመበረብ አጋርተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Students have used the university's satellite network, provided by the governmental program Infocentros, to share their activities, facilities and their beautiful campus that stretches over 2,000 hectares in Bolivia.</s>

en: To read more about the university and the workshop held in February 2013, please read the post on the Rising Voices blog.
amh: ስለ ዩንቨርስቲው እና ስለ የካቲት 2005ቱ ትዕይንተ ሥራ የተጻፉ ተጨማሪ ነገሮችን ለማንበብ እያደጉ ያሉ ድምፆች ላይ የተጻፈውን ጦማር ይጎብኙ፡፡
mt0: <pad> For more information about the university and the February 2005 graduation, visit the blog on Growing Voices.</s>

amh: የሚከተሉት በተማሪዎቹ ከተነሱት እና በዩንቨርስቲው የፍሊከር ቋት ላይ የተሰቀሉ ናቸው፡፡

amh: ኪውክሲ” የተባለ በብራዚል የተገደለ የአካባቢ መሪ ምስል የግድግዳ ላይ ቅብ የቹሩንታን የውስጥ ግድግዳ አስውቦት፤ ፎቶ በአዴንቶ

en: Rosie Alves is a young Angolan blogger and cronista living in Luanda.
amh: መኖሪያዋን ያደረገችው በአንጎላ ዋና ከተማ ሉዋንዳ ውስጥ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> She lived in Luanda, the capital of Angola.</s>

en: The crónica is a Portuguese writing form that is very suited to blogging - originally published in newspapers, they are tales, sometimes true and sometimes fictionalized, that convey a point or a conceit in a very short form. In her blog Sweet Cliché, Alves writes short tales, often about love and intimate encounters.
amh: cronista” ማለት በፖርቱጋል ቋንቋ መጦመር የሚለውን ቃል ተስተካካይ ትርጉም የሚሰጥ ሲሆን - ፅሁፎቹ ባብዛኛ ጊዜ በጋዜጣ የሚታተሙ ታሪኮች አንዳንዴ እውነተኛ ተሪኮች ሌላ ጊዜ ደግሞ የፈጠራ ልብ ወለዶች ሲሆኑ ብዙውን ጊዜ የራስ ችሎታን በአጭሩ ያሳያሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> cronista” is a synonym for the word "chronicle" in Portuguese, and his writings are mostly stories published in newspapers, sometimes true stories, sometimes fictional, often briefly showing his own skills.</s>

en: (Blogspot warns readers of the adult nature of her blog). Here's an excerpt from her most popular recent post Matei o meu amor - I killed my love:
amh: Sweet Cliché በተሰኘው ጦማሯ አልቬስ አጫጫር ታሪኮችን የምትፅፍ ሲሆን፣ በአብዛኛው ስለፍቅር እና ስለፍቅር ጥብቅ ግንኙነቶች ትፅፋለች ( Bolgspot የፅሑፎቿ እንባቢዎች እድሜቸው ለፅሑፉ የሚመጥን ስለመሆኑ ያስጠነቅቃል)፡፡
mt0: <pad> In her blog Sweet Cliché, Ellis writes clichéd stories, mostly about love and close relationships (Bolgspot warns her readers that they are not age-appropriate for her writing).</s>

en: I like to write narrative crónicas - that are sometimes made up only of dialogue. They come very close to short stories.
amh: ከዚህ በታች ሰሞኑን በጣም አነጋጋሪ የነበረው ፅሑፏ ቀርቧል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Here's a recently-published article by her.</s>

en: They are more committed to daily events, that is, banal, common events.

mt0: <pad> I killed my love:-</s>

en: I like to mix things up and explore new territory.
amh: አንዱን ከአንዱ መደበላላቅ እና እዲስ ነገር መፍጠርም እወዳለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I also like mixing things up and creating something new.</s>

en: GV: When did you start blogging?

mt0: <pad> GV: When did you start writing?</s>

en: Why do you write?
amh: ለምን ትፅፊያለሽ?
mt0: <pad> Why are you crying?</s>

en: I decided to blog in 2010.

mt0: <pad> I decided to blog in 2010.</s>

mt0: <pad> I always feel like I'm removing a load from my shoulders every time I write.</s>

mt0: <pad> I don't know.</s>

en: For me, it is the best therapy.
amh: ለኔ መፃፍ ፈውስ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> For me writing is a cure.</s>

en: GV: You write quite a bit about love, intimacy, and sex.
amh: GV: ፍቅር፣ የፍቅር እና ግብረ ስጋ ግንኝነት በተመለከተ ነው የምትፅፊው፡፡

en: How are these topics dealt with by Angolan society? Are they taboo?

mt0: <pad> How will these issues be seen by the Angole community?</s>

en: Is there erotic literature in Angola?
amh: ነውር አይደሉም?
mt0: <pad> They're not bad?</s>

en: Angolan society is quite conservative in what relates to these themes.
amh: በአንጎላ ልቅ ወሲብን የተመለከቱ ስነፅሁፎችስ አሉ?
mt0: <pad> Do you know any literature about the Great Angolan War?</s>

en: (This explains why, after Spain, Angola is the country that least visits my blog.) There are many taboos in Angola.
amh: የአንጎላ ማህበረሰብ እኔ ስለማነሳቸው ሃሳቦች የሚይዙት አቋም ወግ አጥባቂ የሚባል አይነት ነው(ከስፔን በመቀጠል አንጎላ የኔን ጦማር በጥቂቱ ከሚመለከቱ አገሮች ተርታ መመደቧ ይህንን እውነት ያረጋግጣል) በአንጎላ ብዙ ነውር ነገሮች አሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Angolan community is conservative (which is proven by the fact that Angola is the second country to have little interest in my blog after Spain) There are many unacceptable things in Angola.</s>

en: In the old days, we could say that it was a question of conservatism.
amh: ጊዜው ጥንት ቢሆን ኖሮ የወግ አጥባቂነት ጥያቄ ነው እንል ነበር፣ ነገር ግን በማህበረሰባችን ውሰጥ በርካታ ለውጦች በሚካሄዱበት በአሁኑ ወቅት ነውር ለሚባለው ነገር ምንም ቦታ የለኝም፡፡
mt0: <pad> If it were a question of conservatism, I would say it's a question of tradition, but in this time of many changes in our society, I don't have any place for what is considered wrong.</s>

en: Now with all of the transformations ongoing in our society, I see no reason for taboos.
amh: በአንጎላ ልቅ ወሲብን በተመለከተ የተፃፉ ስነፅሑፎችን አላውቅም(የተፃፉእና ለንባብ የበቁ) ለዚህ ሃሳብ ቅርብ የሆነ ያነበብኩት Paula Tavares ‘Ritos de Passagem’ (Rites of Passage) የተሰኛ ስራ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> I don't know of any literature written about the great idea in Angola (written and readable) the only work I have read that is close to this idea is Paula Tavares's "Ritos de Passagem" (Rites of Passage).</s>

en: I don't know of any erotic literature in Angola (at least published and distributed).
amh: ሰዎች የአንጎላ ማህበረሰብ ለእንደኔ አይነት ፅሁፎች ዝግጁ አይደልም ሲሉ በተደጋጋሚ እሰማለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I often hear people say that the Angole community is not prepared for my writings.</s>

en: The closest to this that I've read was the work of the poet Paula Tavares 'Ritos de Passagem' (Rites of Passage).
amh: እውነት ነው አንጎላዊያን ለእንደኔ አይነት ፅሑፎ ዝግጁ አይደሉም፣ ነገሮች በሚሄዱበት የአካሄድ ፍጥነት ከሆነ ደግሞ መቼም ዝግጁ አይሆኑም.
mt0: <pad> The truth is that the Angoles are not prepared for my writing, and at the rate things are going to move, they will never be prepared.</s>

en: I am used to hearing people say that Angolan society is not prepared for this kind of topic.
amh: GV: ወጣትሴት ሆኖ በሉዋንዳ መኖር እንዴት እንደሆነ ትነግሪናለሽ?
mt0: <pad> GV: Can you tell me how it is to be a young woman in Rwanda?</s>

en: That's true, it is not.
amh: ቀላል ሆኖ አያውቅም፡፡
mt0: <pad> You don't know</s>

en: And at the rate things are going, it will never be...
amh: እዚህ ከፍ ያለ ማግለል እና ለሴት ልጅ ክብር አለመስጠት አለ፡፡
mt0: <pad> There is a lot of discrimination and disrespect for girls.</s>

en: GV: Can you tell us what it is like to be a young woman in Luanda?
amh: በመርህ ደረጃ ነፃ የወጣን ግን ማህበረሰቡ በዘልምድ ያስቀመጠልንን ሃለፊነት እንድንፈፅም የሚጠበቅብን ነፃ ያልወጣን ሴቶች ነን፡፡ GV: ስለልጅነት ትዝታሽ አጫውቺን?
mt0: <pad> We are theoretically free women, but we are still not free women.</s>

en: It hasn't been easy, here there is much discrimination and disrespect for women.
amh: በአራት አመት እድሜዬ አባቴ ሚሰጠኝን የተረት መፅሐፎች ማንበብ በጣም እፈልግ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> I loved reading the picture books my father gave me when I was four years old.</s>

en: At four years old, I really wanted to read a storybook that my dad gave me, so he took me to a tutor who helped me read and write before I went to primary school.
amh: አባቴ የቤት ውስጥ አስተማሪጋር ወስዶኝ ገና መጀመሪያ ደረጃ ትምህርት ቤት ከመግባቴ በፊት ማንበብና መፃፍ ቻልኩ፡፡ በጀርባዬ የደብተር ቦረርሳ ተሸክሜ ሁሌም አስተማሪዬ ጋር እመላለስ ነበር፣ እስካሁንም ድረስ እነዚህ የልጅነት ጣፍጭ የምንግዜም ትዝታዎቼ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> My father took me to a home tutor before I could read and write. I always carried a notebook bag with my teacher, these childhood sketches are still my lasting memories.</s>

en: I would go there every day, with my backpack on my back.
amh: GV: በአንጎላ ያሉ የአንቺ ዘመን ትውልዶችን እንዴት ትገልጪያቸዋለሽ?
mt0: <pad> GV: How do you describe your generation in Angola?</s>

en: Even up until now, they were the most beautiful moments I've lived.
amh: የኔ ዘመነኞች በታላቅ ለውጥ ውስጥ የሚኖሩ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> My contemporaries are living in a great change.</s>

en: GV: How would you describe your generation in Angola?
amh: የሚችል ትውልድ ነው፣ህልም እና እምቅ ችሎታ ያላቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> It's a generation that can dream and have infinite potential.</s>

en: My generation is living through great changes.
amh: መጥፎው ነገር እምቅ ችሎታ እንዳላቸው የተረዱት ጥቂቶች ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The bad thing is that few people realize that they have infinite potential.</s>

en: It is a very able generation, full of dreamers and people with a lot of potential.
amh: በሌላ በኩል የኔ ትውልድ እርስ በእርሱ ተወዳዳሪ ነው ፡፡
mt0: <pad> My generation is competitive among themselves.</s>

en: Too bad few really know their own .
amh: ግን በዙሪያችን ያሉ ስዎች በአንድ አላማ ስር ሲሰባሰቡ አናይም፡፡
mt0: <pad> But we don't see people around us gathering around a common goal.</s>

en: On the other hand, we're very competitive, we cannot see those around us and come together for the same cause.
amh: ጥቂቶች ብቻ ናቸው ‘ህብረት’ እና ‘በአንድ አላማ መትጋት’ የሚሉትን ቃላት ፍቺ የሚያውቁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Only a few know the meaning of the words "unity" and "working together for a common goal."</s>

en: Few know the meaning of the words union and solidarity.
amh: ለመረጃ ቅርቦች ሆነን ሳለ ድርጊቶቻችን ግን በድንጋይ ዘመን እንደሚኖር ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> While we are close to information, our behaviors are like living in the stone age.</s>

en: We have more access to information, and even so we act as though we live in the stone age.
amh: በአንጎላ የተለመደ አባባል አለ ወጣት ሆኖ በጭፈራ ቤት የማይጨፍር ወጣት አይደለም” የሚል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In Angola, there is a popular saying that "A young man who doesn't dance in a disco is not a young man."</s>

en: In Angola, there's the phrase a young person who does not party is not a young person. Youth today only wants to party. Without generalizing, because of course there are exceptions.
amh: ወጣቶች ዛሬ ዛሬ መጨፈር ብቻ ነው የሚሹት ፣እርግጥ ነው ሁሉንም ወጣቶች በደፈናው በአንድ ማጠቃለሌ አይደለም፡፡
mt0: <pad> The young people today just want to party, of course I'm not generalizing all the young people in general.</s>

en: GV: Do you fit into a larger blogging scene in Angola?
amh: GV: በአንጎላ ባሉ የጦማሪያን ምድብ ስር ራስሽን ትመድቢያለሽ?
mt0: <pad> GV: Do you want to categorize yourself under the category of bloggers in Angola?</s>

en: I think so.
amh: የበይነመረብ ጓደኞች አሉኝ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I have online friends.</s>

en: I have online peers, the Angolan blogosphere grows by the day.
amh: ገፁን እርስ በእርሳችን ለመደጋገፍ እንዲሁም ስራዎቻችንን ለበለጠ አንባቢያን ለማዳረስ እንጠቀምበታለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We will use the page to support each other and to make our work more accessible to our audience.</s>

en: It is where we converse, trade ideas, and experiences.
amh: ሃሳቦችን ልምዶችን የምንገበያይበት አይነተኛ መንገድ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> It's a unique way to share ideas and experiences.</s>

en: And not just there, I have peers in other countries around the world.
amh: ከአንጎላ ብቻም ሳይሆን ተጨማሪ በተለያዩ አገሮች በመላው አለም በይነ መረብ ጓደኞችአሉኝ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I have internet friends not only from Angola but also from other countries around the world.</s>

en: What should I call him?- Call him love.
amh: - አስተናጋጅ እባክህን ቢራ? - ምንን የለንም፡፡
mt0: <pad> - Sir, can you bring me a beer? - We don't have anything.</s>

en: GV: Tell us about your writing process.
amh: GV: ስለአፃፃፍ ሂደትሽ ንገሪን?
mt0: <pad> GV: Can you tell me about your writing process?</s>

en: What are your greatest challenges?
amh: ስትፅፊ የሚያጋጥምሽ ችግሮችም ምንድን ናቸው?
mt0: <pad> What are the problems you face when writing?</s>

en: Generally, I pick up my mobile and I begin to write and in less than two hours, I finish. Sometimes I spend two weeks developing a text, and it even really frustrates me.
amh: በአጠቃላይ የሞባይል ስልኬን አውጥቼ መፃፍ እጀምራለሁ፣ ከሁለት ስዓት በሚያንስ ጊዜ ውስጥ እጨርሳለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I usually take my phone out and start writing, I'll finish in less than two hours.</s>

en: One of my great challenges, if not the only, is to make the reader find himself/herself in what I write, and I can say that I have achieved that based on the feedback I receive.
amh: አንዳንድ ጊዜ ደግሞ እንድ ፅሑፍ ለማቀናበር ሁለት ሳምንት የፈጅብኛል፣ ያኔ ትክት ነው የሚያደርገኝ፡፡ ብቸኛው ባይሆንም አንዱና ዋንኛው ችግሬ አንባቢዎቼ በፁሑፌ ውስጥ ራሳቸውን እንዲያገኙ ማድረጉ ላይ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Some times I take two weeks to edit a single article, which is exhausting. One of my biggest problems is getting my readers to see themselves in my writing.</s>

en: GV: Who are your readers, do you know?
amh: GV: አንባቢዎችሽ ማን ማን እንደሆኑ ታውቂያለሽ?
mt0: <pad> GV: Do you know who your readers are?</s>

en: How do people react to what you write?
amh: ስለፅሑፎችስ ሰዎች ምን ይላሉ?
mt0: <pad> What do people say about the writings?</s>

en: I can say that many people read it.
amh: ብዙ ሰዎች ፅሑፌን ያነባሉ ማለት እችላለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I can say that many people read my writing.</s>

en: With that I mean: all ages groups, in the most diverse group of countries.
amh: ይህንንም ስል በተለያዩ የአለማችን ክፍሎች በተለያዩ የእድሜ ክልል ውስጥ ያሉ ስዎችን ማለቴ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> I mean people from different parts of the world and ages.</s>

en: It is strange, but according to the statistics, the country that most visits my blog is the US.
amh: እንግዳ ነገር ነው በአለማችን ከሚገኙ ሰዎች በስታትስቲክሱ መሰረት በርካታ አንባቢዎቼ የሚገኙት በአሜሪካን ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> It's interesting that the most of my readers are Americans, according to the statistics.</s>

en: There are those who have told me they read via Google Translator.
amh: በጉግል ትርጉም አማካኝነት በመጠቀም ፅሁፌን እንዳነበቡ የገለፁልኝም አሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> They also told me that they read my post through Google Translate.</s>

en: The majority congratulates me, gives me suggestions, and encourages me to carry on.
amh: አብዛኞቹ አንባቢዎቼ በርትቼ እንድቀጥልና እንድጠነክር ማበረታቻ ሃሳብ ይሰጡኛል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Most of my readers give me encouragement to keep up and strengthen.</s>

en: Obviously there are always those who do not like it or take it the wrong way, I've even been challenged by someone telling me that I should take care with what I write.
amh: በሌላ በኩል በፍፁም ፅሑፌን የማይወዱና በተሳሳተ መንገድ የሚተረጉሙትም አሉ፡፡ ስለምፅፈው ፅሑፋ ጥንቃቄ እንድወስድ ማስጠንቀቂያ የሰጠኝ አንባቢም አለ፡፡
mt0: <pad> On the other hand, there are those who don't like my writing and misinterpret it. There is also a reader who warns me to take care with my writing.</s>

en: GV: What are your aspirations for the future?
amh: GV: የወደፊት ትልሞችሽ ምን ምን ናቸው?
mt0: <pad> GV: What are your future dreams?</s>

en: I am a person full of dreams, and if I start to recount all of my aspirations here, I will not even finish today.
amh: ወደፊት ብዙ ህልሞች ያሉኝ ሰው ነኝ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I'm a person with many dreams for the future.</s>

en: But one of them, and really special, is to become a cronista in a newspaper or a magazine.
amh: ለወደፊት ማድረግ የምፈልጋቸው ትልሞቼን መዘርዘር ከጀመርኩ ዛሬ የምጨርስ አይመስለኝም ነገር ግን በጋዜጣ አሊያም በመፅሔት አምደኛ ሆኖ መፃፍ አንዱ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> I can't believe I'll ever finish listing my future dreams but writing for a newspaper or magazine is one of them.</s>

en: It would be fantastic.
amh: አሪፍ ይሆናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> It'll be awesome.</s>

en: A public service announcement promoting condom use to combat the spread of HIV and other diseases in Kenya was recently pulled from the airwaves after the TV spot caused an uproar among the country's religious leaders.
amh: በቅርቡ ለህዝብ አገልግሎት ይውል ዘንድ HIV እና ተዛማጅ በሽታዎችን ለመከላከል የተላለፈ የኮንዶም ማስታወቂያ የተለያዩ የሃይማኖት ተቋማትን ማስቆጣቱን ተከትሎ በመገናኛ ብዙሃን እንዳይተላለፍ ታገዷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The recently published advertisement for condoms to prevent HIV and related diseases has been banned from the media after it angered several religious institutions.</s>

en: The advert, which shows a woman advising her married friend to use a condoms while engaging in an extramarital affair, was sponsored by Kenya's health ministry and foreign assistance agencies USAid and UKAid.
amh: የኬኒያ የጤና ጥበቃ ሚኒስቴር ፒተር ቼሩቲች ለBBC ዜና አገልግሎት እንደገለፁት ማስታወቂያው የተሠራው ከባለ ትዳሮች መካከል 30 በመቶዎቹ ከትዳር ውጪ ሌሎች ተጨማሪ ግንኙነቶች ስላላቸው ነው ብለዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Peter Cherutich, the Kenyan minister of health, told the BBC that the ad was made because 30 percent of married couples have extramarital relationships.</s>

en: The United Nations estimates about 1.6 million people out of the country's population of 41.6 million are living with HIV.
amh: የተባበሩት መንግሥታት ድርጅት ግምት ከሆነ ደግሞ ኬኒያ ካላት 41. 6 ሚሌኒየን ሕዝብ መካከል 1.
mt0: <pad> According to the United Nations, Kenya has a population of 41. 6 million people.</s>

en: Christian and Muslim clergy condemned the advert as encouraging infidelity.
amh: 6 ሚሊየን ሕዝቦች HIV በደማቸው ውስጥ ይገኛል፡፡
mt0: <pad> 6 million people have HIV in their blood.</s>

en: Despite the advert being pulled from TV, it is still available on YouTube:
amh: የክርስቲያን እና የእስልምና ሃይማኖት መሪዎች ግን ማስታወቂያው ከትዳር ውጪ መወስለትን ያበረታታል ሲሉ አውግዘውታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Christian and Islamic leaders have condemned the advertisement as promoting same-sex marriage.</s>

en: The Squared Factor blogger called the public service announcement spot on in a post titled Sikio la kufa halisikii Condom .
amh: የኮንዶም ማስታወቂያው ከኬኒያ ቴሌቨዥን ማሰራጫ ጣቢያዎች ላይ መተላለፉ ቢቀርም በዩቲዩብ ግን አሁንም መመልከት ይቻላል፡
mt0: <pad> The Kondoom ad was removed from Kenyan television stations, but it can still be watched on YouTube.</s>

en: The title, which loosely translates to a dying ear does not respond to a condom, is a play on the proverb a dying ear does not respond to medication:
amh: Sikio la kufa halisikii Condom” በሚል ርዕስ ባቀረበው ጽሑፍ በጥሬ ትርጉሙ የሚሞት ጆሮ ለኮንዶም ምላሽ የለውም የሚል ሲሆን ተመሳሳይ ተርጉሙም የሚሞት ጆሮ መዳኃኒት ቢሰጠውም መሞቱ አይቀርም ” በማለት ማስታወቂያው እንዲመለስ ጠይቋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The advertisement was called "Sikio la kufa halisikii Condom" in the original translation, meaning "The dead ear has no response to condoms, and in a similar sense, the dead ear will die even if given medicine."</s>

en: I will not beat around this bush.
amh: ዙሪያ ጥምጥም አልሽከረከርም፡፡
mt0: <pad> I don't know.</s>

en: And I frown at those clamoring for the recent TV ad titled weka condom mpangoni , to be withdrawn from the airwaves.
amh: መታቀብ አሊያም በአንድ መወሰን ካልተቻለ ለሚወዱት ሲሉ” ኮንዶም በአግባቡ መጠቀም ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> If you can't avoid or decide on one, it's "for the love of the one you love" to use condoms properly.</s>

en: The message of this particular ad has unexpectedly tugged at the hem of society’s skirt: if you can’t abstain or commit to one partner, then use a condom if you care about your loved ones.
amh: ለሚወዱት ሲሉ” የሚለው አባባል በዚህ አገባቡ ካልተፈለገ እርግዝና ከአባላዘር በሽታና እንዲሁም HIV እና HIVን ተከትለው ከሚመጡ ማኅበራዊ ችግሮች ቤተሰብን እና አጠቃላይ ማኅበረሰብን ማዳን የሚለውን ሐሳብ ይይዛል፡፡
mt0: <pad> For the Sake of those You Love" is a term used in this context to protect family and the general community from unwanted pregnancies, sexually transmitted diseases, and HIV and the social problems that follow HIV.</s>

en: Caring in this context alluding to avoiding pre marital pregnancies, and contracting STI’s- among them HIV and the related adverse effects it has on the family and society at large.
amh: ይህንን የቴሌቭዥን የኮንዶም ማስታወቂያ በተመለከተ #CondomMpangoni የሚል ሃሽ ታግ በመፍጠር ኬኒያውያን ማስታወቂያውን በመደገፍ እና በመቃወም ውይይታቸውን ወደ ቲውተር ይዘው መጥተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Kenyans have taken the conversation on Twitter about this television condom ad by creating a hashtag #CondomMpangoni, which means "condom mpango."</s>

en: Kenyans took to Twitter to discuss the TV spot under the #CondomMpangoni hashtag, with many coming out on both sides of the argument.
amh: ቪክቶር-MUFC” (‏@victorbmc) ማስታወቂያውን እንደዳልወደደው ጽፏል፡
mt0: <pad> Victor-MUFC (@victorbmc) wrote that he didn't like the announcement.</s>

en: victor-MUFC (‏@victorbmc) wrote that he didn't like the advert:
amh: ‏ቪክቶር-MUFC” (‏@victorbmc) ያ ማስታወቂያ የማይረባ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Victor-MUFC” ( @victorbmc) That advertisement is useless.</s>

en: ‏@victorbmc: That ad is nasty RT @MacOtani: Wow so now that the #CondomMpangoni advert has been removed from our screens we are safe huh?! #SwalaNyeti
amh: RT @MacOtani: ዋው አሁን የ#CondomMpangoni (ኮንዶም) ማስታወቂያው ከቴሌቭዥናችን ስክሪን ስለጠፋ እኛ ደህና ነን ማለት ነው፤ አዪ?
mt0: <pad> RT @MacOtani: Okay, now that the #CondomMpangoni (condom) ad has disappeared from our TV screen, we're safe; right?</s>

en: Mathias Ndeta (‏@MNdeta) told Kenyans who are against the spot to face up to the truth:
amh: ማቲያስ ናዴታ (‏@MNdeta) ደግሞ ማስታወቂያውን የተቃወሙ ኬኒያዎች እውነታውን እንደዲጋፈጡ ይናገራል፡
mt0: <pad> Matthew Ndeta (@MNdeta) says Kenyans who opposed the ad have covered up the truth.</s>

en: ‏@MNdeta: In my opinion the #CondomMpangoni ad should stay put, those against it are just pretenders, let's face the reality.
amh: - ‏(@MNdeta) በኔ አስተሳሰብ የኮንዶም ማስታወቂያው #CondomMpangoni በቴሌቭዥን መተላለፉ መቀጠል አለበት፡፡ የሚቃወሙት አስመሳዮች ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> In my opinion, the #CondomMpangoni should continue to be advertised on television. Those who oppose it are hypocrites.</s>

en: z' Ghost Buster (‏@TheMumBi) warned:
amh: ዘ ጎስት ቡስተር” (‏@TheMumBi) ደግሞ አስጠንቋል፡
mt0: <pad> The Great Booster (@TheMumBi) also warned.</s>

en: ‏@TheMumBi: We stick our heads in the sand too much.
amh: (‏@TheMumBi) አንገታችንን አሽዋ ውስጥ በጣም እንቀብራለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We're going to dig our head into the ashes.</s>

en: Amen to the #CondomMpangoni ad ..got us talking about stuff we avoid talking about.

mt0: <pad> Please don't know about the #CondomMpangoni</s>

mt0: <pad> Paul (@M45Paul) argues that the ban on the ad has made it more recognizable.</s>

en: ‏@M45Paul: Banning #CondomMpangoni ad is getting it more airtime that it'd have got in normal runs.
amh: ‏(@M45Paul) የኮንዶም ማስታወቂያውን #CondomMpangoni ማገድ በራሱ ማስታወቂያው በተለመደው የቴሌቭዥን ስርጭት ያገኝ ከነበረው ዕይታ ተጨማሪ ተመልካች እንዲያገኝ ረድቶታ፡፡
mt0: <pad> @M45Paul) The ban on the #CondomMpangoni advertisements itself helped the advertisement to get more viewers than it had in its regular television broadcasts.</s>

en: Pastor Wa (‏@Pastor_Wa) advised:
amh: ፓስተር ዋ ” (‏@Pastor_Wa) ምክር ሰጥተዋል፡
mt0: <pad> Pastor Wa ( @Pastor_Wa) gave advice.</s>

en: ‏@Pastor_Wa: And for everyone that watches that ad, your heart must be provoked enough to say, 'I'm better than this' #CondomMpangoni
amh: ‏(‏@Pastor_Wa) ማንኛውም ማስታወቂያውን የተመለከተ ሰው በልቡ እኔ ከዚህ ማስታወቂያ እሻላለሁ” እንዲል ተገዷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> @Pastor_Wa) Anybody who saw the advertisement has been forced to say in his heart, "I want this advertisement."</s>
