amh: ኬዚ ኬ*” (‏@boobykizzy) ጠይቋል:-
mt0: <pad> boobykizzy ( @boobykizzy) asked:</s>

en: ‏@boobykizzy: #condommpangoni =>what happend to dignity, morals and the likes? should media be blamed? should we address this issue?
amh: ‏‏@boobykizzy: ክብር፣ ሞራል፣ ስብዕና የሚባል ነገር የለም? መገናኛ ብዙኃን ማስታወቂያውን #condommpangoni በማስነገራቸው መወቀስ አለባቸው?
mt0: <pad> @boobykizzy: Is there no dignity, morals, and worth? The media should be blamed for broadcasting the ad #condommpangoni?</s>

en: Finally, AverageKenyan (‏@AverageKenyan) noted:
amh: በመጨረሻ አቬሬጅ ኬኒያ (‏@AverageKenyan) ያሰቀመጠው፡
mt0: <pad> Finally, Average Kenya ( @AverageKenyan) posted it.</s>

en: ‏@AverageKenyan: #Condommpangoni, we are not in denial, the complex African matrix doesn't support public declaration of infidelity however much it's a reality
amh: ‏‏@AverageKenyan: #Condommpangoni,እውነታውን አለመቀበል አይደለም፡፡ ውስብስብ የሆነው የአፍሪካ የባሕል ስብጥር ምንም እንኳን ነገሩ እውነት ቢሆንም በትዳር ላይ መወስለትን በተመለከተ በአደባባይ ድጋፍ አይሰጥም፡፡
mt0: <pad> @AverageKenyan: #Condommpangoni, not a denial of reality. The complex African culture mix does not publicly support gay marriage even though it is true.</s>

en: Several opposition leaders were arrested in Djibouti, a small, but strategically important country in the Horn of Africa, after demonstrations which followed the February 22, 2013 general elections.
amh: ትንሽ አገር ነገር ግን በአፍሪካ ቀንድ እጅግ በጣም ስትራቴጂክ አገር በሆነችው ጅቡቲ የየካቲት 15፣ 2005 አገር አቀፋዊ ምርጫን ተከትሎ በተደረገ የተቃውሞ ሰልፍ የተቃዋሚ ፓርቲ መሪዎች ታሰሩ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Guinea-Bissau is a small country but one of the most strategic countries in the Middle East.</s>

en: The elections saw yet another victory for the party in power, the People's Rally for Progress.
amh: በምርጫው ‹የሕዝቦች አንድነት ለዕድገት› (People's Rally for Progress) የተሰኛው ፓርቲ በድጋሚ ድልን ተቀዳጅቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The People's Rally for Progress party won the election again.</s>

en: President Ismail Omar Guelleh, who has ruled since 1999, received 80% of votes cast, leading to allegations of fraud on a massive scale.
amh: አ ከ1999 ጀምሮ የመሩ ሲሆን በምርጫውም የ80 በመቶ መራጮች ድምፅ ቢያገኙም በከፍተኛ ሁኔታ በማጭበርበር ተጠርጥረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> He has been leading since 1999 and won 80% of the vote in the election, but was heavily accused of fraud.</s>

en: The arrests followed the demonstrations about allegations of massive fraud .
amh: እስሩ የመጣውም በዚሁ ማጭበርበር ጉዳይ ላይ ዜጎች ሰልፍ በመውጣታቸው ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The arrest followed citizens' protests over the same border issue.</s>

en: According to the Djiboutian League of Human Rights organisation and the International Federation of Human Rights, 90 people were retained in the famously tough Gabode Central Prison.
amh: እንደየጅቡቲ ሰብኣዊ መብት ሊግ እና የዓለምአቀፍ ሰብኣዊ መብት ፌደሬሽን ከሆነ 90 ሰዎች በአሰቃቂነቱ በሚታወቀው ጋቦዴ ማዕከላዊ እስር ቤት ታጉረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> According to the Jebuite Human Rights League and the International Human Rights Federation, 90 people are held in the notoriously cruel Gabonde Central Prison.</s>

en: Arrests were still continuing at the time of writing, April 2013.
amh: እስሩ ይህ ጽሑፍ እስከተጻፈበት ሚያዚያ 20005 ድረስ ቀጥሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The prison continued until April 2005, the date of this article.</s>

en: Spokesperson for opposition party Union for National Salvation, Daher Ahmed Farah, was sentenced to two months in the same closed prison for calling for rebellion after the election results were announced.
amh: ተቃዋሚ ፓርቲ የሆነው ‹የብሔራዊ ድኅነት ኅብረት› (Union for National Salvation) ቃል አቀባይ ዳሃር አሕመድ ፋራህ የምርጫው ውጤት ከተነገረ በኋላ አመፅ አነሳስተዋል በሚል ምክንያት ለሁለት ወራት ያክል በተመሳሳይ ዝግ እስር ቤት ውስጥ እንዲቆዩ ተፈርዶባቸው ነበር ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The spokesman of the opposition party, Union for National Salvation, Dahr Ahmed Farah, was sentenced to two months in the same closed jail for inciting riots after the election result was announced.</s>

en: The following video shows fighting in the streets between opposition demonstrators and the police (via Dillipress):
amh: ቀጣዩ ቪዲዮ በፖሊስ እና በተቃዋሚ ሰልፈኞች መካመል የተነሳ ብጥብጥ ያሳያል፡፡ (via Dillipress):-
mt0: <pad> The following video shows the clashes between police and protesters.</s>

en: Elections in Djibouti have still not resulted in a real political alternative for power.
amh: ምርጫ እስካሁንም ድረስ በጅቡቲ እውነተኛ የፖለቲካ አማራጭ ወደ ስልጣን የሚመጡበት አልሆነም፡፡
mt0: <pad> The election has not yet brought true political alternatives to power in Zimbabwe.</s>

en: Ismaïl Omar Gelleh has been president of the republic since April 9, 1999, and his ideologically conservative party, the People's Rally for Progress, has been in power since the country gained independence.
amh: አ ከሚያዚያ 9 ቀን 1999 ጀምሮ ስልጣን ላይ የተቀመጠ ሲሆን ሃገሪቷ ነጻነቷን ከተቀናጀች ጀምሮ የፕሬዝዳንቱ ፓርቲ የሆነው ‹የሕዝቦች አንድነት ለዕድገት› ስልጣኑን ይዟል፡፡
mt0: <pad> He has been in power since April 9, 1999. The People's Unity for Development party has been in power since the country gained its independence.</s>

en: James Schneider from Think Africa Press has always believed that the elections only gave the appearance of democracy:
amh: የቲንክ አፍሪካ ፕሬስ ጸሐፊው ጀምስ ሽናይደር ሁሌም የምርጫው መኖር የዴሞክራሲ ማስመሰያ እንደሆነ ያምናል፡ - የፕሬዝዳንቱ የቅርብ ጊዜ ዳግም ምርጫ እ.
mt0: <pad> James Schneider, a former editor of the Think Africa press, has always believed that the existence of the election is a sham of democracy: - The recent presidential re-election was a sham of democracy.</s>

en: His most recent re-election, in 2011, came after he changed the constitution to be allowed to run for a third time; the vote took place without election observers and Guelleh won practically unopposed after the opposition withdrew citing harassment and the unfair nature of the poll Guelleh’s illusion will have worked, at least in the short term: he will still have power but now with the veneer of a parliamentary opposition.
amh: በ2011፣ ሕገ መንግሥቱ ለሦስተኛ ጊዜ አንድ ፕሬዝዳንት ዳግም እንዲመረጥ ፈቅዶ ከተቀየረ በኋላ የተደረገ ነው፡፡ ምርጫው የምርጫ ታዛቢዎች ባልተገኙበት ተደረገ እናም ጉሌህ ተቃዋሚ ፓርቲዎች እንግልት ደርሶብናል፣ ኢ-ፍትኃዊ ተግባራት ተፈፅመውብናል ብለው አቋርጠው በወጡበት ሁኔታ አሸነፈ፡፡
mt0: <pad> It was after the constitution was changed in 2011 to allow a president to be re-elected for the third time. The election was held without election observers and Guleah won in a contest that the opposition parties had abandoned, claiming that they had been tortured and unjustly treated.</s>

en: Indeed, many people have much to gain from the electoral illusion.
amh: የጉሌህ ማታለል ለአጭር ጊዜም ቢሆንም ተሳክቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Your trick worked for a short time.</s>

en: But sadly, this group is unlikely to include most ordinary Djiboutians.
amh: እርግጥ ነው በርካታ ሰዎች ከምርጫው ማታለል ተጠቃሚ ይሆናሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Very many people will be using the election fraud to enrich themselves.</s>

en: After all, you cannot improve freedom, development and wellbeing with illusions alone.
amh: ነገር ግን እነዚህ ተጠቃሚዎች ተራውን የጅቡቲ ሕዝብ የሚያካትቱ አይደሉም፡፡
mt0: <pad> But these users do not include the general population of Zimbabwe.</s>

en: The party in power is contesting these allegations of fraud.
amh: በሥልጣን ላይ ያለው ፓርቲ የተመሠረተበትን ምርጫ የማጭበርበር ክስ እያጥላላ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The ruling party is covering up allegations of election fraud that have been raised since its formation.</s>

en: Abdi Ismail Hersi, head of the independent National Electoral Commission, has stated that the elections took place in a transparent manner.
amh: ገለልተኛው ብሔራዊ ምርጫ ኮሚሽን ዋና ኃላፊ አብዲ እስማኤል ሄርሲ ምርጫው ግልጽ በሆነ መንገድ ነው የተካሄደው ብለዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The head of the independent National Electoral Commission, Abdi Ismayel Hersi, said the election was held in a transparent way.</s>

en: The citizens of Djibouti were able to carry out their civic duties in total transparency.
amh: የጅቡቲ ዜጎች የዜግነት ግዴታቸውን ግልፅ በሆነ መንገድ ተወጥተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Citizens of Zimbabwe have fulfilled their citizenship duty in a transparent way.</s>

en: On its facebook page , the opposition party reported that arrests of opposition members were still continuing in the city of Arhiba:
amh: በፌስቡክ ገጹ የተቃዋሚው ፓርቲ አሁንም አባላቶቹ አርሂባ በተሰኘ ከተማ ለእስር እየተዳረጉ መሆናቸውን ዘግቧል፡
mt0: <pad> The opposition party on Facebook reported that its members were still being held in the city of Arhiba.</s>

en: Djibouti may be a country few in the West know about, yet Western foreign policymakers have placed disproportionate emphasis upon the tiny nation as a strategic base for their operations in the Horn of Africa – particularly in combating piracy and the militant Islamists al-Shabaab in Somalia.
amh: ጅቡቲ ምናልባት ጥቂቶች የሚያውቋት አገር ልትሆን ትችላለች፣ የምዕራቢያውያኑ የውጪ ፖሊሲ አውጪዎች ግን ከአገሪቷ እውቅናና የቆዳ ስፋት የተጋነነ ትኩረት በአፍሪካ ቀንድ የአክራሪ የእስልምና ጦር የሆነውን አልሻባብን እና የባሕር ላይ ወንበዴዎችን ለመዋጋ ዋንኛ ትኩረታቸው ናት፡፡
mt0: <pad> Although few people know about Zimbabwe, it is the main focus of Western foreign policy makers in the fight against al-Qaida and sea robbery in the Middle East.</s>

en: Perhaps understandably, considering the higher profile crises on its doorstep, the West has treated Djibouti as little more than a tool in its arsenal – as a military base, launch pad for drone strikes, or venue for regional diplomacy – rather than a situation worth addressing in its own right.
amh: ምናልባትም በሚያግባባ መልኩ ጅቡቲ የራሷን የውስጥ ችግር ከመፍታቷ ይልቅ የምዕራቡ ዓለም ጥቅም ማስጠበቂያ መሳሪያ እና የአካባቢው ወታደራዊ ማዕከልነትና ዲፕሎማሲያዊ ጥቅም ማስጠበቂያ ብቻ ናት፡፡
mt0: <pad> Maybe in a confusing way, Zimbabwe is more of an instrument of Western world interest protection than a domestic problem-solving tool and a regional military center and diplomatically-safe haven.</s>

en: A man dressed in a red dress with a veil on his head was paraded by security forces through the streets of Marivan in the Kurdistan province of Iran on Monday, April 15, 2013.
amh: ቀይ ቀሚስ ሻርፕ እና ዓይነ እርግብ ያደረገ አንድ ሰው በማሪቫን ከተማ መንገዶች ኩርዲስታን ግዛት ኢራን ውስጥ በፀጥታ አካላት እየታጀበ እንዲጓዝ ተደረገ፡፡
mt0: <pad> A man wearing a red trousers, scarf and glasses is being escorted down the streets of Marivan in Kurdistan province of Iran by security forces.</s>

en: A local court decided this would be the punishment for three men, reportedly found guilty in domestic disputes.
amh: በቤት ውስጥ ፀብ ምክንያት ጥፋተኛ የተባሉ ሦስት ሰዎች በከተማው መሐል የሴት ቀሚስ አድርገው እንዲጓዙ የግዛቲቱ ፍርድ ቤት ፈርዶባቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Three men convicted of domestic violence have been sentenced to walk in the middle of the city wearing women's skirts.</s>

en: The exact circumstances are unclear, but the mere idea of this punishment has angered many.
amh: የቅጣቱ ዓይነት ለብዙዎች ግልጽ ባይሆንም በርካቶች ግን በቅጣቱ እንዲቆጡ አነሳስቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Although the punishment is not clear to many, it has inspired many to be upset with the punishment.</s>

en: Women in Marivan held a protest against the sentence on Tuesday, saying it is more humiliating to women than it is to the convicted men.
amh: እንደ ሰብኣዊ መብት ተሟጋቾች የፀጥታ አካላት ለተቃውሞ ሰላማዊ ሰልፍ የወጡ ሰዎች ላይ አካላዊ ጉዳት እንዳደረሱባቸው ገልጸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Human rights activists say security forces have caused physical injuries to protesters who went on a peaceful protest.</s>

en: According to one human rights activist, security forces physically attacked protesters .
amh: Shared on the Facebook page 'Kurd Men For Equality'
mt0: <pad> Shared on the Facebook page 'Kurd Men For Equality'</s>

en: A video shows women marching through the streets. Shared on the Facebook page 'Kurd Men For Equality'
amh: በፌስቡክ በተደረገ የተቃውሞ ዘመቻ ኩርድያዊ ወንዶች ቀሚስ ለብሰው ራሳቸውን ፎቶ በማንሳት በፌስቡክ ገጾቻቸው ለጥፈዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In a Facebook protest campaign, Kurdish men dressed in their shemaghs took pictures of themselves and posted them on their Facebook pages.</s>

en: Online, several Kurdish men have photographed themselves dressed as women as part of a Facebook campaign to say, Being a woman is not an instrument to punish or humiliate anybody.
amh: ‘ሴት መሆን ለቅጣት መሳሪያ መሆንና እና ለማዋረጃ ማስተማሪያ አይደለም’ ከላይ የሚታየው ፎቶ የኩርድ ወንዶች ለዕኩልነት የተሰኘ የፌስቡክ ገጽ ላይ የተቀመጠ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> 'Being a woman is not to be used as a tool for punishment and humiliation.'</s>

en: The photos appear on a Facebook page named Kurd Men for Equality.
amh: ሴቶች በታሪክ በርካታ ችግሮች እና እንግልቶች በወንዶች አማካኝነት እንዲጋፈጡ ሆነዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Women have historically been forced to face many problems and difficulties by men.</s>

en: To show my solidarity and support to the womanhood and their suffers and torments during the history mostly have done by men . as we have faced recently a stupid judges order to punish a person by putting on him the feminine customs, so it is one of the times that we should gather around each other and condemn this stupidity, brutality and inhumanity against the womanhood; the half of society as well as at least half of the human being on the earth.
amh: በቅርቡ እንደተጋፈጥነው እውነታ ደደብ ዳኛ የሴቶችን ልብስ መልበስ እንደ ቅጣት አድርጎ ውሳኔ ሰጥቷል፤ ስለዚህ ይህ ወቅት ሁላችንም በአንድነት በመቆም ይህንን የደደቦች ኢሰብኣዊና ግማሽ የኅብረተሰብ አካላትና በመሬት ላይ የሚኖሩ ግማሽ ድርሻ ያላቸውን ሴቶች የሚያንቋሽሽ ተግባር የመቃወሚያ ወቅት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> As we have recently been confronted with a fact, a stupid judge has ruled that wearing women's clothing is a sin; so this is the time for us all to stand together and protest this unhuman and degrading act of the stupid judges against half the community and half the women who live on earth.</s>

en: I am supporting womanhood by the at least I can do for them.
amh: እኔ ማድረግ በምችለው ትንሹን ሴትነትን በመደገፍ እፈጽማለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I do what I can to support the little girl.</s>

en: The Facebook page of the Women's Association of Marivan also condemned the act and wrote :
amh: የማሪቫን ሴቶች ማህበር በበኩሉ በፌስቡክ ገፁ ድርጊቱን አውግዞ ጽፏል፡
mt0: <pad> The Marivan Women's Association on its Facebook page condemned the act.</s>

en: Security forces dragged a convicted Marvani’s man in the city.
amh: የፀጥታ አካላት የማሪቫን ከተማ ፍርደኛ ግለሰብን ክብር አዋርደዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Security officials honored the city of Marivan prisoner.</s>

en: They dressed him as a woman and wished by this act to humiliate him.
amh: እንደሴት አልብሰው በድርጊቱ ክብሩን እንዲያጣ ተመኝተዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> He dressed as a woman and wished he lost his dignity by his act.</s>

en: The Women's Association of Marivan condemn this action and consider it an insult to women.
amh: የማሪቫን ሴቶች ማኅበር ይህንን ድርጊት ይቃወማል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Marivan Women's Society condemns this act.</s>

en: Kurdish women protested against this act .
amh: የኩርድሽ ሴቶች ተቃውመውታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Kurdish women have protested.</s>

en: Mohmmad Mostafai, an Iranian lawyer and human rights defender says
amh: ኢራናዊው ጠበቃ እና የሰብኣዊ መብት ተሟጋች መሐመድ ሙስጠፋ እንዲህ ብሏል፡
mt0: <pad> Muhammad Moustapha, an Iranian lawyer and human rights activist, said:</s>

en: Iran’s judiciary has no right to order such punishment which goes against human dignity.
amh: የኢራን ሕግ አስፈፃሚ ይህንን የሰው ክብር የሚያዋርድ ድርጊት እንዲፈፅም የሚያስችል የሕግ ከለላ የለውም፡፡
mt0: <pad> The executive branch of Iran does not have the legal authority to perform this degrading act.</s>

en: Dressing convicts like women is not something you can find in the laws of the Islamic Republic.
amh: እንደሴት መልበስን ቅጣት የሚያደርግ የኢስላሚክ ሪፖብሊክ ሕግ የለም፡
mt0: <pad> No law in the Islamic Republic of Iran prohibits wearing women's clothing.</s>

en: History repeats itself
amh: ታሪክ ራሱን ደገመ
mt0: <pad> History repeats itself.</s>

en: More than three years ago, Iranian authorities attempted to use the same method of humiliation against a student activist, but failed.
amh: ከሦስት ዓመታት በፊት የኢራን ባለሥልጣናት በተማሪ አራማጆች ላይ ተመሳሳይ የማዋረድ ሥራ ሊሠሩ ሞክረው ነበር፤ አልተሳካላቸውም እንጂ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Three years ago, Iranian authorities tried to humiliate the student protesters, but failed.</s>

en: Back then, Iranian authorities claimed that Majid Tavakoli dressed as a woman to escape after delivering a speech in Tehran on Student Day.
amh: ያን ጊዜ የኢራን ባለሥልጣናት የጠየቁት ማጅድ ሳቫሊን ቴህራን ላይ ንግግር ካደረገ በኋላ በተማሪዎች ቀን እንደሴት እንዲለብስ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> The officials of Iran then asked Majid Savaline to dress like a woman on the day of the students after his speech in Tehran.</s>

en: However, human rights activists in Iran published a report from an eyewitness saying: All the pictures published by the state media are false and a clear use of immoral means against student and civil activists in Iran.”
amh: ‹‹በመንግሥት መገናኛ ብዙኃን የሚወጡ ማንኛውም ፎቶግራፎች ውሸት እና በተማሪዎች እና በኢራን የሚሠሩ በማኅበረሰብ አራማጆች ላይ የሚወጡ የተዛቡ የሞራል እሴት የሌላቸው ናቸው›› ብሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> "Any photos published on state media are lies and distorted moral standards against students and social activists in Iran," he said.</s>

en: At the time, hundreds of Iranian men photographed themselves dressed as women in hijab to support Tavakoli.
amh: በጊዜው በመቶ የሚቆጠሩ ኢራናውያን ወንዶች ቀሚስ ለብሰው ራሳቸውን ፎቶግራፍ በማንሳት ታቫኮሊን በመደገፍ ከጎኑ ቆመዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> At the time, hundreds of Iranian men dressed in a shemagh took pictures of themselves supporting Tavanooli.</s>

en: Today, October 26, was the day Saudi activists chose to protest against the driving ban on women in the Kingdom.
amh: ዛሬ፣ ጥቅምት 16፣ 2006 ለሳኡዲ አራማጆች በኪንግደሙ ሴቶች መኪና እንዳይነዱ የተጣለባቸው ማዕቀብ ላይ ለማመጽ የመረጡት ቀን ነበር።
mt0: <pad> Today, October 16, 2006 was the day that Saudi feminists chose to protest in the King's Hall against the ban on women driving.</s>

en: As social networks were buzzing under increasing number of reports of women driving across the country, a brilliant a capella remake of Bob Marley's No Woman, No Cry spread at the speed of light, in a sound support of brave women challenging conservative sexist legislation and pseudo-scientific justification of them being prohibited to enjoy freedom of movement:
amh: የማኅበራዊ አውታር ተጠቃሚዎች በአገሪቷ ውስጥ መኪና እየነዱ ስለታዩት ሴቶች ቁጥር መጨመር በስፋት እያወሩ ሳሉ፣ ተወዳጁ፣ የቦብ ማርሌይ ኖ ዉማን፣ ኖ ክራይ የተሰኘ ዜማ ሴቶችን በነጻነት የመንቀሳቀስ መብታቸውን ለመንፈግ የወጣ የወግ አጥባቂ ስርዓተ ፆታ ሕግን እና ሐሰተኛ የሳይንሳዊ ማብራሪያውን በሞገቱ ቆራጥ ሴቶች ድምፅ ድጋፍ ተቀይሮ በብርሃን ፍጥነት ሲሰራጭ ነበር፤
mt0: <pad> While social media users were widely discussing the increase in the number of women driving across the country, the popular Bob Marley song No Woman, No Cry was being spread at light speed by brave women's voice supporting the conservative gender law and the false scientific explanation that denied women the right to free movement.</s>

en: Commander Keith Alexander on the bridge Cartoon shared by DonkeyHotey (CC BY-SA 2.0)
amh: ኮማንድር ኬት አሌክሳንደር ድልድዩ ላይ ካርቱን በዶንኪይ ሆቴይ (CC BY-SA 2.
mt0: <pad> Captain Kate Alexander on the bridge. (CC BY-SA 2.</s>

en: The Web We Want invites cartoonists, creatives and artists to join The Day We Fight Back on February 11, 2014 by creating an original cartoon about online surveillance and the right to privacy.
amh: አ. በፌብሩዋሪ 11፣ 2014 የበይነመረብ ስለላን እና የግለሰብ ደኅንነት መብትን በተመለከተ ወጥ የካርቱኖች ውድድር ውስጥ እንዲሳተፉ እየጋበዘ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> A. invites people to participate in a regular cartoon contest on the internet surveillance and privacy rights on February 11, 2014.</s>

en: The cartoons should help increase awareness about the NSA and demand accountability for mass digital surveillance in a way that makes people want to click and share.
amh: ካርቱኖቹ በNSA (የአሜሪካው ብሔራዊ ደኅንነት ኤጀንሴ) ዙሪያ መረጃ ማስጨበጥ የሚችሉ እና በጥቅሉ ለሚደረጉ የበይነመረብ ስለላዎች ተጠያቂነትን የሚፈልጉ ሆነው ሰዎች ክሊክ አድርገው ለወዳጆቻቸው ሊያጋሯቸው የሚፈልጉት ዓይነት መሆን ይኖርባቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The cartoons should be the kind that people want to click and share with their friends, which would be a good way to get information about the NSA (United States National Security Agency) and generally the internet surveillance.</s>

en: Deadline for submissions is February 8.
amh: ካርቱኖቹን የማስረከቢያ ቀን ከ የካቲት 1 በፊት መሆን ይኖርበታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The deadline for the delivery of the cartoons must be before February 1.</s>

en: Prizes:
amh: ሽልማቶች:-
mt0: <pad> Awards:</s>

en: 1st place: USD $1000
amh: 1ኛ ተሸላሚ:- 1000 የአሜሪካን ዶላር
mt0: <pad> 1st prize:- 1000 US dollars</s>

en: 2nd place: USD $500
amh: 2ኛ ተሸላሚ:- 500 የአሜሪካን ዶላር
mt0: <pad> Second prize:- 500 US dollars</s>

en: 3rd Place: USD $250
amh: 3ኛ ተሸላሚ:- 250 የአሜሪካን ዶላር
mt0: <pad> 3rd prize: 250 US dollars</s>

en: Rules:
mt0: <pad> You don't know.</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: Anyone can participate.
amh: ሁሉም ሰው መሳተፍ ይችላል፤
mt0: <pad> Everyone can participate.</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: There is no limit of submissions per author.
amh: አንድ ሰው የሚልከው ሥራ ብዛት ገደብ የለውም፤
mt0: <pad> The amount of work that a person can send is unlimited.</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: The Author will provide a name or pseudonym to the submission.
amh: ተወዳዳሪዎች ለሚልኩልን ሥራዎቻቸው ስም (ወይም የውሸት መለያ ስም) ይሰጣሉ፤ አሸናፊዎች ተጨማሪ የግል መረጃዎችን እንዲሰጡ ይጠየቃሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Applicants provide their name (or fake name) for the work they sent to us; winners are asked to provide additional personal information.</s>

en: Further personal details will be requested for the winners – but their real name will remain private upon request of the author.
amh: ነገር ግን ደራሲዎቹ እውነተኛ ስማቸው እንዲጠበቅ ከጠየቁ ይፋ አይደረግም፤
mt0: <pad> But if the authors ask for their real name to be kept secret, it will not be published.</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: The winners will be announced on February 11, 2014.
amh: አሸናፊዎቹ የካቲት 4፣ 2006 ይገለጻሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> The winners will be announced on February 4, 2006.</s>

en: The winner will be picked by members of the Web We Want Executive Committee.
amh: አሸናፊዎቹ የሚመረጡት በ‹ዌብ ዊ ወንት› የበላይ ኮሚቴ አባላት ነው፤
mt0: <pad> The winners are selected by the members of the Webweaver's Executive Committee.</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: The award will be transferred to the winners within 30 days after the announcement.
amh: ሽልማቱ ለአሸናፊዎቹ ውጤቱ በታወቀ በ30 ቀናት ውስጥ እንዲተላለፉ ይደረጋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The prize will be awarded to the winners 30 days after the result is announced.</s>

amh: ውድድሩን ለመላክ:-
mt0: <pad> To send the contest:</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

amh: ኢሜይል:- ከፍተኛ ጥራት ያለውና በሚከተሉት የፋይል ዓይነቶች የተዘጋጁትን ካርቱኖች፣ ማትም በ.
mt0: <pad> Email:- High quality and ready to print cartoons in the following file types, also in the following formats.</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: By Twitter: Tweet your uploaded image to @webwewant with the hashtag #webwewant
amh: - ሥራዎቹን በትዊተር ለመላክ @webwewant ታግ በማድረግና #webwewant ሀሽታግ አብሮ በማኖር ትዊት ማድረግ ይቻላል፤
mt0: <pad> You can tweet your work to @webwewant and #webwewant hashtags, or you can just say you don't know.</s>
<pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: Adding your nationality and country of origin is optional but highly encouraged.
amh: የተወዳዳሪዎች ዜግነት እና አገር አለመላክ ይቻላል ነገር ግን ቢላክ ይበረታታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Applicants may not send their nationality and country of citizenship but it is encouraged to do so.</s>

en: Blogging Ghana's proposed Social Media Hub.
amh: ጋናን ጡመራ (Blogging Ghana) ለተሰኘው የታሰበ የማኅበራዊ አውታር ቋት/ሰፈራ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ghana's Blogging (Blogging Ghana) is a planned social network site/community for the proposed Ghana blog.</s>

en: Photo used with permission.
amh: (ፎቶው በባለቤቱ ፈቃድ ነው የተለጠፈው)
mt0: <pad> (The photo was posted with the permission of the owner.)</s>

en: Internet penetration in Ghana is about 14 percent and has been on the up and up for the last decade as more Ghanaians, especially young people, have hooked up to the web.
amh: በጋና፣ የበይነመረብ ተዳራሽነት መጠን 14 በመቶ ገደማ ነው፤ በተጨማሪም ባለፉት ዐሥር ዓመታት በተለይም ወጣት ጋናውያን ከመረጃ መረብ ጋር መተዋወቃቸውን ተከትሎ እያደገ፣ እያደገ መጥቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> In Ghana, the internet access rate is around 14 percent; and has grown and grown over the past 10 years, particularly as young Ghanaians have become familiar with the Internet.</s>

en: As a result, the number of Ghanaians on various social media platforms is also increasing rapidly, and some now see a need for a physical social media hub to facilitate the activities of the many people who use social media or want to learn about it.
amh: በዚህም፣ ማኅበራዊ አውታር የሚጠቀሙ ሰዎች ቁጥር እየጨመረ በመምጣቱ አንዳንዶች የማኅበራዊ አውታር ተጠቃሚዎችና ስለምንነቱ መማር ለሚፈልጉትም ጭምር መሰባሰቢያ ስፍራ እንደሚያስፈልግ ታይቷቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This is because the number of people who use social media has increased, and some people have felt that a place for social media users and those who want to learn about it is needed.</s>

en: Enter Blogging Ghana, the country's largest organization of bloggers and social media enthusiasts with more than 100 members.
amh: ጋናን ጡመራ (Blogging Ghana)ን ይመልከቱ፣ 100 አባላት ያክል ያሉት የአገሪቱ ጦማሪዎችና ማኅበራዊ አውታር ተጠቃሚዎች ትልቅ ስብስብ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Check out Blogging Ghana, a large group of bloggers and social media users in the country with about 100 members.</s>

en: The group launched a campaign on January 20, 2014 to establish Ghana's first ever social media hub, explaining on their website:
amh: ቡድኑ ጥር 12/2006 የጋናን የመጀመሪያውን የማኅበራዊ አውታር መሰባሰቢያ ቋት ለመመሥረት የሚያስችለውን ዘመቻ ድረገጹ ላይ በተደረገ ማብራሪያ ጀምሯል፡
mt0: <pad> The team launched a campaign on the website on 12th of January 2006 to create the first social network community site in Ghana.</s>

en: A physical meeting place, a hub, will go a long way to provide a platform for the experienced bloggers in the organisation to train students and professionals on how to use blogging for creating #MoreStories and use social media to advance their agenda as citizens in Ghana.
amh: በአካል መገናኛ ስፍራ፣ ቋት፣ ስብስቡ ውስጥ ያሉ ብዙ ልምድ ያላቸው ጦማሪዎች ተማሪዎችን እና ባለሙያዎችን ጡመራን ብዙ ትረካዎችን (#morestories) ለመፍጠር እንዴት መጠቀም እንደሚችሉ እና ማኅበራዊ አውታሮችን በመጠቀም እንደ ጋና ዜግነታቸው ተሳትፏቸውን ማበርከት እንዲችሉ ያስተምሯቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The physical media center, the library, and the community of experienced bloggers teach students and professionals how to use the blog to create more stories (#morestories) and how to use social media to make their contribution as Ghanaian citizens.</s>

en: Africa on the Blog, a multi-author blog by people of African heritage, which is supported by Babs Saul and Sarah Arrow, explained the history of blogging in Ghana:
amh: አፍሪካ በጦማር የተሰኘ ብዙ ደራሲዎችን የአቀፈ በባብስ ሳዉል እና ሳራ አሮው የሚደገፍ የአፍሪካ ቅርስ ሰዎች የጡመራን ታሪክ በጋና አብራርተዋል፡
mt0: <pad> African Heritage, a multi-authored blog supported by Babs Sawala and Sarah Aroua, has chronicled the history of blogging in Ghana.</s>

en: The blogging and social media scene in Ghana has improved in the last five years.
amh: ጡመራ እና ማኅበራዊ አውታር ተጠቃሚነት ባለፉት አምስት ዓመታት በጋና ዕድገት አሳይቷል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The use of blogs and social media has grown exponentially in Ghana over the past five years.</s>

en: The West African country has seen the number of bloggers in the country grow from just a handful in 2005 to several hundreds this year.
amh: በ2005 ከነበሯት በጣት የሚቆጠሩ ጦማሪዎች ዛሬ ላይ በርካታ መቶዎች የሚሆኑ ጦማሪዎችን ለማየት በቅታለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> From a handful of bloggers in 2005 to hundreds of bloggers today, she has managed to see herself grow from a handful to hundreds.</s>

en: This trend was facilitated by a bold step taken by a Swedish blogger who had moved to Ghana some five years ago.
amh: ይህ ዕድገት አንድ ወደጋና የዛሬ አምስት ዓመት ገደማ የመጣ ስዊድናዊ በወሰደው ትልቅ ርምጃ ሊሳካ ችሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This development was made possible by a Swedish man who came to Ghana about five years ago.</s>

en: Kajsa Hallberg Adu who is now the Chair of Ghana’s biggest association of bloggers brought all the bloggers who were active online under one roof to discuss their passion.
amh: ካጅሳ ሆልበርግ አዱ፣ በአሁኑ ሰዓት የጋና ትልቁ የጦማሪዎች ማኅበር ሊቀመንበር ሲሆን በወቅቱ በይነመረብ ላይ በንቃት ይሳተፉ የነበሩትን ጦማሪዎች ሰብስቦ በአንድ ጣሪያ ስር ስለሥራዎቻቸው እንዲወያዩ አስችሏቸዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Currently the president of the Ghana's biggest bloggers association, Kanyisa Holbart Adu, gathered the most active online bloggers in the country under one roof to discuss their work under one roof.</s>

en: With time, this small group of internet users decided to introduce blogging and the use of social media tools to many other people who may be interested but just didn’t know how.
amh: በጊዜ ሒደት፣ ይህ ትንሽ ቡድን ጡመራንና ማኅበራዊ አውታርን ባለማወቅ ዝም ያሉ ነገር ግን ቢያውቁ ኖሮ እነሱ እንደሚጠቀሙበት ሊጠቀሙበት የሚችሉ ሰዎችን ከማኅበራዊ አውታሮች ጋር ለማስተዋወቅ ወሰነ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Over time, this small group decided to introduce people to social media who don't know about blogs and social networks but could use them if they knew.</s>

en: This selfish desire to spread such knowledge lead to what has today become the nation’s biggest blogging and social media event.
amh: ይህ ዕውቀትን የማሰራጨት የግል ፍላጎት ዛሬ አገሪቱ በጡመራ እና ማኅበራዊ አውታር አጠቃቀም ለደረሰችበት ደረጃ አድርሷታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> This personal desire to share knowledge has brought the country to the level of use of blogs and social media today.</s>

en: Edward Amartey-Tagoe, the director of corporate services at Blogging Ghana, also recounted how things were half a decade ago:
amh: ኤድዋርድ አማርቴ-ታጎ፣ በጋናን ጡመራ ውስጥ የኮርፖሬት አገልግሎቶች ዳይሬክተር - የዛሬ አምስት ዓመት ነገሮች እንዴት እንደነበሩ አስታውሰዋል፡
mt0: <pad> Edward Amarate-Togo, director of corporate services at Tuvalu Corporation - recalled how things were five years ago.</s>

en: Some five years ago, there were only a handful of bloggers in Ghana, since then, bloggers and Internet enthusiasts have been organised under one umbrella body to build capacity, learn and share ideas from one another.
amh: የዛሬ አምስት ዓመት ገደማ በጣት የሚቆጠሩ ጦማሪዎች ብቻ ነበሩ፤ ከዚያ ወዲህ ግን ጦማሪዎች እና የኢንተርኔት ወዳጆች በአንድ ጥላ ሥር ተደራጅተው አቅማቸውን ለመገንባት እና አንዱ ከሌላው ለመማርና ሐሳቦችን ለመለዋወጥ ችለዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> For five years there were only a handful of bloggers; since then, bloggers and Internet friends have been organized under one roof to build their skills and learn from one another and share ideas.</s>

en: Today, we are an influential organisation with a yearly event and awards ceremony who produce local content online on blogs and on various social media channels.
amh: ዛሬ፣ ተፅዕኖ ፈጣሪ ስብስብ ከመሆናችንም ባሻገር በየዓመቱ ጥሩ አገራዊ ይዘት ያላቸውን ጦማሮች የሚጽፉትን የምንሸልምበት ደረጃ ላይ ደርሰናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Today, we're a well-known influential group that has grown to the point where we're able to reward bloggers who write good national content every year.</s>

en: We want to share our skills and create #morestories!
amh: ክኅሎታችንን በማጋራት ብዙ ትረካዎች እንዲፈጠሩ እንፈልጋለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We want to create many stories by sharing our skills.</s>

en: ENews Ghana published the campaign on their website:
amh: ኢኒውስ ጋና ስለዘመቻው በድረገጻቸው ላይ የሚከተለውን ጻፉ፡
mt0: <pad> Inaeus Ganna wrote on their website about the campaign:</s>

en: Bloggers in Ghana are creating Ghana’s first Social Media hub for bloggers and social media enthusiasts to meet, interact and share more local content from and we think it will make a great feature on GOOD.
amh: የጋና ጦማሪዎች እና የማኅበራዊ አውታር ወዳጆች የሚገናኙበት የመጀመሪያውን ቋት በመመሥረት ሊገናኙ እና ሐሳቦቻቸውን ሊለዋወጡ ነው፤ ይህ ለዘለቄታዊ መልካም ዕድል ነው ብለን እናምናለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ghanaian bloggers and social media fans are to meet and exchange ideas by creating the first platform to connect and share their ideas; we believe this is a long-term good opportunity.</s>

en: Social Media is growing in Ghana and we (Blogging Ghana) has over the past 5 years been a leader in Ghana.
amh: የማኅበራዊ አውታር በጋና እያደገ ነው፡፡ እና እኛ (ጋናን ጡመራ) ላለፉት አምስት ዓመታት በጋና የጡመራ መሪዎች ሆነናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Social network is growing in Ghana. And we (Ghanaian Blogging) have been the leading bloggers in Ghana for the past five years.</s>

en: In 2012, with funding from USAID, UKAID, EU & DANIDA, we used social media to cover Ghana’s elections; raising awareness of the issues and empowering politicians and citizens.
amh: ከUSAID፣ UKAID፣ EU እና DANIDA በተገኘ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ ማኅበራዊ አውታርን የጋናን ምርጫ ሽፋን ለመስጠት ተጠቅመንበታል፤ በተለያዩ ጉዳዮች ላይ ግንዛቤዎችን በማስጨበጥ እና ፖለቲከኞችን እና ዜጎችን በማጎልበትም ጭምር፡፡
mt0: <pad> USAID, UKAID, EU and DANIDA funding has been used to provide social media coverage of the Ghanaian election; raising awareness of various issues and empowering politicians and citizens.</s>

en: We also in 2013 organised Ghana’s first social media awards which was huge success.
amh: አ. 2013 የጋናን የመጀመሪያውን የጋናን የጦማሪዎች ሽልማትንም በማዘጋጀት ትልቅ ስኬት ተቀናጅተናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> We also successfully co-organised the 2013 Ghana Journalists Awards, which was the first of its kind in Ghana.</s>

en: We want to do more and get more Ghanaians to use social media to tell their stories.
amh: ብዙ መሥራት እና ብዙ ጋናውያን ወደማኅበራዊ አውታር በመውጣት ታሪካቸውን እንዲናገሩ እንፈልጋለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We want to do a lot of work and we want many Ghanaians to come out on social media and tell their story.</s>

en: We want to overcome the internet and power challenges bloggers face.
amh: ጦማሪዎች የሚገጥሟቸውን የበይነመረብ እና የኃይል ችግር መቅረፍ እንፈልጋለን፡፡
mt0: <pad> We want to solve the problems of internet and power that journalists face.</s>

en: We have therefore launched a crowdfunding campaign to create a haven/hub with a co-blogging space to and create the much needed local content.
amh: ለዚህም ከዜጎች ገንዘብ በመሰብሰብ የመገናኛ ስፍራ መመሥረት ለጋራ ጡመራ እና የአገር ውስጥ መረጃዎችን ለመጻፍ የሚያስችለንን ዘመቻ ጀምረናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> For this, we have started a campaign to collect money from the people to set up a media center, for public bloging and writing national information.</s>

en: It makes sense for a social media organization to use our online network and do crowd-sourcing to fulfill our dreams.
amh: የጋራ ጽሑፎችን በመጻፍ ሕልሞቻችንን እውን ለማድረግ ማኅበራዊ አውታር ተጠቃሚዎች መደራጀት ሲሆን ትርጉም ይሰጣል፡፡
mt0: <pad> It's a group of social network users who write shared posts to make our dreams come true.</s>

en: We think Ghana in ready for a meeting place for social media enthusiasts and we cannot wait to create #morestories about Ghana for the world to read!
amh: ጋና የማኅበራዊ አውታር ወዳጆች ሊሰባሰቡ ዝግጁ ናቸው ብለን እናምናለን፤ ብዙ ታሪኮችን ለመፍጠርና መላው ዓለም ስለጋና ለመንገርም ቸኩለናል!
mt0: <pad> We believe that the Ghanaian social media friends are ready to get together; we're also excited to create many stories and tell the world about Ghana!</s>

en: Award-winning blogger Macjordan (@Macjordan) expressed his support for the social media hub on his blog:
amh: ሽልማት-አሸናፊው ጦማሪ ማክጆርዳን (@Macjordan) በጦማሩ ለማኅበራዊ አውታሩ ቋት ያለውን ድጋፍም ገልጧል:-
mt0: <pad> The award-winning blogger Macjordan (@Macjordan) also expressed his support for the network on his blog:</s>

en: BloggingGhana is pleased to launch an Indiegogo campaign towards the creation of a Social Media Hub in Ghana for bloggers and citizen journalists to be trained in Social Media and increase local content creation.
amh: ጋናን ጡመራ የኢንዲዬጎጎ ዘመቻውን የማኅበራዊ አውታር ቋት ለጋና ጦማሪዎች እና የዜግነት ጋዜጠኞች በመፍጠር ዜጎች ማኅበራዊ አውታር አጠቃቀምን በመማር የአገራዊ መረጃዎችን በጡመራ የሚያበረክቱበትን መንገድ ለማመቻቸት መጀመሩን ስንገልጽ በደስታ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ghana is pleased to announce that the Indegogogo campaign has begun creating a social network platform for Ghanaian bloggers and citizen journalists to facilitate the use of social network tools by citizens to learn how to use social network tools and share national information through the blogosphere.</s>

en: BloggingGhana – Ghana’s largest community/network of bloggers, citizen journalists and social media enthusiasts is reaching out to all and sundry to chip-in and support this worthy cause.
amh: ጋናን ጡመራ – የጋና የመጀመሪያውና ትልቁ የጦማሪዎች፣ የዜግነት ጋዜጠኞች እና የማኅበራዊ አውታር ወዳጆች ስብስብ ሲሆን ሁሉም ሰዎች ጋር ለመድረስ እየጣረ እና ለዚህ መልካም ሥራ ድጋፍ እየሻተ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ghana Blogging - the first and biggest group of bloggers, citizen journalists and social network friends in Ghana that is trying to reach everyone and needs support for this good work.</s>

en: I’m very pleased and honored to be a part of this organization and would appreciate your support in any way.
amh: የዚህ ስብስብ አካል በመሆኔ ክብርም፣ ደስታም ይሰማኛል፤ እናም ድጋፋችሁን በማንኛውም መንገድ አበረታታለሁ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I feel proud and happy to be part of this group; and I will encourage your support in any way.</s>

en: Are languages free?
amh: ቋንቋዎች ነጻ ናቸው?
mt0: <pad> Is it free to speak a language?</s>

en: Today is the International Mother Language Day, an annual event in UNESCO member states to promote linguistic and cultural diversity and multilingualism.
amh: ዛሬ የዓለምአቀፍ የአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋ ቀን ነው፡፡ ቀኑ በUNESCO አባል አገራት የቋንቋ እና ባሕል ልዩነቶችን እና ብዝኃቋንቋዊነትን ለማበረታታት ይከበራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Today is World Mother Language Day. The day is celebrated by UNESCO members to promote language and cultural differences and multiculturalism.</s>

en: This is mostly the international recognition of the Language Movement Day called ‘Ekushey February', which is commemorated in Bangladesh since 1952.
amh: ከ1952 ጀምሮ ‹ኤኩሼ የካቲት› በመባል የሚታወቀው የቋንቋዎች ንቅናቄ ቀንን ዕውቅና ለመስጠት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> It is to recognize the day of language movement, known as Ekushey February, which has been called "Ekushey February" since 1952.</s>

en: The date of 21st February was chosen in homage to a number of 'language martyrs' from Bangladesh (then East Pakistan) who were shot on 21st February 1952 in Dhaka, during public protest.
amh: በ1952 በዳካ አመፅ ላይ ሳሉ በጥይት ለተገደሉ ‹የቋንቋ ሰማዕታት› መታሰቢ እንዲሆን በማለት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> It was written to commemorate the "language martyrs" who were shot during the 1952 Daka rebellion.</s>

en: They were demonstrating to establish their mother language Bangla as a national language along with Urdu, which was chosen as the sole official language in the then newly created Pakistan.
amh: ሰማዕታቱ ሰልፍ የወጡት በወቅቱ ለተመሰረተችው አዲሷ ፓኪስታን የሥራ ቋንቋ ከሆነው ኡርዱ ጎን ለጎን ብሔራዊ ቋንቋ ሆኖ የአፍ ቋንቋ መፍቻቸው እንዲመረጥ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> The martyrs were protesting for the Urdu language to be chosen as the national language of the newly-formed Pakistani state, along with the URDU language that was the official language at the time.</s>

en: Photo: Shaheed Minar, a solemn and symbolic sculpture erected in the place of the massacre.
amh: ፎቶ:- ሻሒድ ሚናር፣ ጭፍጨፋው በተፈፀመበት ቦታ ላይ የቆመ መታሰቢያ ኀውልት፡፡
mt0: <pad> Photo: Shahid Minar, a memorial statue at the site of the massacre</s>

en: The monument is the symbol of Bangladesh Nationalism.
amh: ኀውልቱ የባንግላዴሽ ብሔርተኝነት ትዕምርት ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The statue is a symbol of Bangladeshi nationalism.</s>

en: How important is the mother language?
amh: የአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋ ምን ያህል አስፈላጊ ነው?
mt0: <pad> you don't know how important your native language is</s>

en: Our mother tongue is more than a language, a soul inside us.
amh: አፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋችን ከቋንቋም በላይ ነፍስያችን ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Our mother tongue is more than just a language.</s>

en: It is an armory of the human mind; an archive of the history.
amh: የሰው ልጅ የአዕምሮ አፎት ማለት ነው፤ የታሪክ ማኅደር፡፡
mt0: <pad> The human race is the repository of memory; the archive of history.</s>

en: We invent the world through language.
amh: ዓለምን የፈጠርነው በቋንቋ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> We created the world in language.</s>

en: Mrunalini feats her mother tongue Telugu:
amh: ምሩናሊኒ የራሷን አፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋ ተሉጉ አጣቅሳ:-
mt0: <pad> Marunalini quoted her native language:</s>

en: How sweet our languages are, how proud they make us.
amh: ቋንቋዎቻችን ምን ያህ ጣፋጭ እና የሚያኮሩ ናቸው!
mt0: <pad> Our languages are so sweet and glorious!</s>

en: How much we miss talking in our mother tongue.
amh: በአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋዎቻችን መናገርስ ምን ያህል ነው የሚናፍቀን!
mt0: <pad> You don't know how much we miss speaking our native language.</s>

en: Especially, when we are away from it.”
amh: በተለይ ትንሽ ራቅ ያልን ጊዜ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Especially when we're a little far away.</s>

en: Ripon Kumar Biswas in Bangladesh watchdog says:
amh: ሪፖን ኩማር ቢሰዋስ ባንግላዴሽ ዋችዶግ ላይ እንዲህ አለ
mt0: <pad> Myanmar, Burmese, Bangladeshi</s>

en: Mother tongue is the language of nature, which is intimately related to the individual because it is structured and upheld by local laws of nature, which structure the physiology of the individual.”
amh: አፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋ የተፈጥሮ ቋንቋ ነው፤ ከተናጋሪው ጋር በጥልቅ ይዋሃዳል ምክንያቱም በአካባቢያዊ ተፈጥሯዊ ሕግጋት የሚማሩት እና የተቀረፀ የግለሰቦች ስብእና የሚገነባበት በመሆኑ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> A native language is a natural language; it is deeply embedded in the speaker because they learn the environmental natural laws and form their individuality.</s>

en: But it is even more than that.
amh: ነገር ግን ከዚያም በላይ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> But it's more than that.</s>

en: One does not inhabit a country; one inhabits a language.
amh: አንድ ሰው በአገሩ አይሆኖርም፤ በቋንቋው ግን ይኖራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> A man cannot live in his country, but he lives in his language.</s>

en: That is why some times we see nationalism sparking in the world based on languages and language matters!
amh: ለዚያም ነው ብሔርተኝነት በዓለም ዙሪያ በቋንቋ ላይ መሠረት አድርጎ ሲቀጣጠል የምንመለከተው!
mt0: <pad> That's why we see nationalism spreading around the world on the basis of language.</s>

en: The freedom of languages in the world:
amh: የቋንቋዎች ነጻነት በዓለም ዙሪያ:-
mt0: <pad> Languages of the World: Freedom of Language</s>

en: Thousands of local languages used as the daily means of expression are absent from education systems, the media, publishing and the public domain in general because of state policies.
amh: ብዙ ሺሕ የአካባቢ መግባቢያ ቋንቋዎች የትምህርት ስርዓት፣ ብዙኃን መገናኛ፣ ሕትመት እና በጥቅሉ ለሕዝባዊ ግልጋሎቶች የሚውሉበት መንገድ ውስጥ ባብዛኛው በአገረ-መንግሥታት ፖሊሲ ድክመት ሊካተቱ አልቻሉም፡፡
mt0: <pad> Many thousands of regional communication languages have been failed to be included in the education system, media, publishing and general public services by national government policy failures.</s>

en: We learn better in our mother tongue when it is taught in school (Mother tongue Dilemma –UNESCO News letter).
amh: በአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋችን መማር ስንችል የተሻለ ዕውቀት እንቀስማለን (የአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋ አጣብቂኝ - የዜና ወረቀት)፡፡
mt0: <pad> When we can learn in our own language, we will gain more knowledge (Language barriers - News paper).</s>

en: But this is not the case of all minority languages.
amh: ነገር ግን ይህ የብዙዎቹ አናሳ ቋንቋዎች እውነታ አይደለም፡፡
mt0: <pad> But this is not the case for many smaller languages.</s>

en: 476 million of world’s illiterate people speak minority languages and live in countries where children are mostly not taught in their mother language.
amh: 476 ሚሊዮን የሚሆኑ ትምህርት ያልቀሰሙ ሕዝቦች አናሳ ቋንቋዎችን የሚናገሩ እና ልጆች በአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋቸው መማር የማይችሉባቸው አገራት ውስጥ የሚገኙ ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The remaining 476 million uneducated people live in countries that speak many languages and where children cannot learn in their mother tongue.</s>

en: From Southern Azerbaijan under Iranian rule BayBak, Voice of a Nation says:
amh: በኢራናዊያን አገዛዝ ከደቡባዊ አዘርባጃን ቤይባክ፣ ለቮይስ ኦቭ ኔሽን ይህን ብሏል:-
mt0: <pad> Azerbaijani exiles from the south of Azerbaijan, Baybak, to the Voice of the Nation said:</s>

en: It is more than 80 years that Iranian Fars authority has banned other nationalities language, such as Turks (majority in Iran), Arabs, Baluchs, Turkmens and Kurds.
amh: የኢራን ፋርስ ባለሥልጣናት እንደ ቱርክ (የኢራን ብዙኃን)፣ አረብ፣ ባሉች፣ ተርክሜን እና ኩርድ ያሉ የሌሎች ብሔረሰቦችን ቋንቋዎች ካገዱ 80 ዓመታት አልፈዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> 80 years have passed since the Persian-Iranian authorities banned other minority languages such as Turkish (the majority of Iran), Arab, Berber, Balui, Turkmen and Kurd.</s>

en: Every year in 21st of February all nationalities celebrate the International Mother Language Day named by UNESCO.
amh: በያመቱ ፌብሩዋሪ 21 በዩኔስኮ የተሰየመውን ሁሉም ብሔረሰቦች የዓለምአቀፍ አፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋ ቀን ያከብራሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Every year on February 21, all nations celebrate the UNESCO-designated International Day of Mother Language.</s>

en: But as before, of the day of celebration Iranian police will ride on the crowd and will arrest many.
amh: ነገር ግን እንደተለመደው፣ የኢራን ፖሊስ የተሰበሰቡትን ሰዎች ይበትንና ብዙዎችን ያስራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> But as usual, the Iranian police dispersed the crowd and arrested many of them.</s>

en: Regarding news from Southern Azerbaijan, preparations for the 21st of February are continuing widely compare to last year.
amh: ከአምናው ሲነፃፀር ሰፋ ያለ ዝግጅት የዘንድሮውን ፌብሩዋሪ 21 ለማክበር እየተደረገ እንደሆነ ከደቡባዊ አዘርባጃን የመጡ ዜናዎች ያስረዳሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Reports from south-western Azerbaijan show that this year's February 21 is being celebrated with bigger preparations than last year.</s>

en: Also thousands of flyers been spread in Azerbaijan’s major cities.
amh: በተጨማሪም በሺዎች የሚቆጠሩ በራሪ ወረቀቶች በአዘርባጃን ዋና ዋና ከተሞች እየተሰራጩ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Also, thousands of pamphlets are being distributed in the major cities of Azerbaijan.</s>

en: Capital Tebriz has been well prepared and the time for demonstration been set.”
amh: በካፒታል ተብሪዝ ዝግጅቱ ተጠናቆ ለሰልፍ ሰዓት ተመርጧል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The demonstrations were completed at the capital and the time of the rally was selected.</s>

en: The Unesco Courier:
amh: የዩኔስኮው መልዕክተኛ:-
mt0: <pad> UNESCO: I don't know.</s>

en: Several thousand years old, the Ainu language spoken in northern Japan was dying out due to political pressure from the central government.
amh: ከብዙ ዓመታት በፊት፣ በሰሜናዊ ጃፓን የሚነገር የኤኑ ቋንቋ በማዕከላዊው መንግሥት ግፊት ሊጠፋ ተቃርቦ ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> For many years, the Enu language, spoken in northern Japan, was at risk of being extinct under pressure from the central government.</s>

en: At the end of the 20th century, this trend was reversed.
amh: በ20ኛው ክፍለዘመን መገባደጃ፣ ይህ ሒደት ተቀለበሰ፡፡
mt0: <pad> In the late 20th century, this process was reversed.</s>

en: While Ainu’s future is still not guaranteed because it isn’t taught in schools, the resurgence of interest is undeniable.
amh: ምንም እንኳን የኤኑ ቋንቋ ቀጣይነት ዋስትና ባይኖረውም መነቃቃቱ ግን የማይካድ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> Although the future of the Iranian language is not assured, its revival is undeniable.</s>

en: Sid writes in Picked Politics:
amh: ሲድ በጽሑፉ ፖለቲካ ላይ አነጣጥሯል፡
mt0: <pad> Cid focused on politics in his book.</s>

en: International Mother Language Day deserves celebration in Zambia.
amh: የዓለምአቀፍ የአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋ ቀን በዛምቢያ መከበር አለበት፡፡
mt0: <pad> International Day of the Mother Language should be celebrated in Zambia.</s>

en: The country has worked hard to establish and maintain political unity over the years.
amh: አገሪቱ ፖለቲካዊ ውሕደት ለማምጣት እና ለማስቀጠል ብዙ ዓመት ሠርታለች፡፡
mt0: <pad> The country has worked for many years to bring and maintain political integration.</s>

en: But as other societies are learning too late, it would be a tragedy if this hard-fought unity should be maintained at the expense of the variety of languages and dialects that have long called these lands home.”
amh: ነገር ግን ሌሎች ማኅበረሰቦች የሚማሩበት ፍጥነት ከሌሎች ስለዘገየ - ይህ ብዙ የተከፈለለት ውሕደት አገሪቷን ቤቴ በሚሉ በሌሎች ቋንቋዎ ተናጋሪዎች መስዋዕትነት ከሆነ እጅግ ያሳዝናል፡፡
mt0: <pad> But because other communities learned at a different pace - it's very sad if this much paid integration is the sacrifice of other language speakers who call the country home.</s>

en: Is your mother tongue facing extinction?
amh: የአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋችሁ እየጠፋ ነው?
mt0: <pad> Is your mother tongue dying?</s>

en: About 27 percent of the world's languages (about 6000) are threatened to be extinct.
amh: የዓለማችን 27 በመቶ ያክል ቋንቋዎች (6000 ስድስት ሺሕ ያህል) ይጠፋሉ የሚል ስጋት አለ፡፡
mt0: <pad> There is a fear that around 27 percent of the world's languages (6000 to six thousand) will be extinct.</s>

en: The Foundation for Endangered Languages says 83 percent of the world's languages are restricted to single countries, making them more vulnerable to the policies of a single government.
amh: አደጋ ላይ ያሉ ቋንቋዎች ፋውንዴሽን 83 በመቶ የሚሆኑት ቋንቋዎች አሀዳዊ በሆኑ አገራት ውስጥ በአሃዳዊ መንግሥታት ፖሊሲዎች ተቆልፎባቸው አደጋ ውስጥ ናቸው ብሏል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The Endangered Languages Foundation said 83 percent of languages were endangered in monolingual countries by monolingual governments' policies.</s>

en: Abhinaba Basu at Geek Gyan says:
amh: አብሂናባ ባሱ ከጂክ ጂያን እንዲህ ብሏል፡
mt0: <pad> Abhinaba says that he is a man of God.</s>

en: A lot of people speaking English natively forget the importance of mother language due to its predominance.
amh: በእንግሊዝኛ ቋንቋ አፋቸውን የሚፈቱ ሰዎች በቋንቋው የበላይነት ምክንያት የአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋን ዋጋ ይዘነጉታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> People who speak English often neglect the value of their mother tongue because of its dominance.</s>

en: They take their language for granted.
amh: ቋንቋቸውን እንደመተማመኛ ይይዙታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> They hold their language as a guarantee.</s>

en: However, each year a bunch of languages become extinct, the latest being Eyak, which got extinct exactly a month ago with the death of Marie Smith Jones the last native Eyak speaking person.
amh: ሆኖም በየዓመቱ ብዙ ቋንቋዎች ይጠፋሉ፤ የቅርብ ጊዜው የዛሬ አንድ ወር ገደማ የመጨረሻ ተወላጅ ተናጋሪው በነበረችው ማሪ ስሚዝ ጆንስ ሞት ምክንያት የጠፋው እያክ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> But a lot of languages die every year; the most recent is the Ahkakki, which has been extinct since about a month ago because of the death of the last native speaker, Mary Smythe Jones.</s>

en: I believe that if we don't actively try to preserve our mother language they will slowly become extinct.
amh: እንደሚመስለኝ ሁላችንም የአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋችንን ለማኖር ካልጣልን ቀስበቀስ ይጠፋሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> I think if we don't try to keep our native language, it will gradually disappear.</s>

en: One of the most important things to preserve a language is to ensure that they are better covered by technology.”
amh: ቋንቋዎች እንዳይጠፉ አንደኛው በጣም ጠቃሚ መንገድ ቋንቋዎች ከቴክኖሎጂጋ እንዲዋሃዱ ማድረግ ነው፡፡ ”
mt0: <pad> One of the most important ways to prevent languages from dying is to make them linked to technology.</s>

en: Using ICT in Mother Language advocacy:
amh: ቴክኖሎጂን ለአፍ መፍቻ ቋንቋ አራማጅነት፡
mt0: <pad> using technology to support the development of the mother tongue</s>

en: Citizen media is a great tool to promote own languages.
amh: የዜጎች ብዙኃን መገናኛ ቋንቋዎችን ለማሳደግ በጣም ጠቃሚ ነው፡፡
mt0: <pad> It is very important to develop the language of the media in the people.</s>

en: According to Technorati there are more than 100 million blogs out there.
amh: እንደ ቴክኖራቲ ከ100 ሚሊዮን በላይ ጦማሮች አሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> According to Technorati, there are over 100 million blogs.</s>

en: A previous year’s report show that about 37% blogs are in Japanese followed by English (36%), Chinese (8%), Spanish(3%), Italian (3%), Portuguese (2%), French(2%) among others.
amh: አንድ ያለፈው ዓመት ሪፖርት እንደሚያሳየው 37 በመቶ የሚሆኑት ብሎጎች በጃፓኒኛ፣ ቀጥሎ በእንግሊዝኛ (36 በመቶ)፣ ቻይንኛ (8 በመቶ)፣ ስፓኒሽ (3 በመቶ)፣ ጣሊያንኛ (3 በመቶ)፣ ፖርቹጊዝ (2 በመቶ)፣ ፈረንሳይኛ (2 በመቶ) እና ሌሎችም ናቸው፡፡
mt0: <pad> A last year's report showed that 37 percent of blogs were in Japanese, followed by English (36 percent), Chinese (8 percent), Spanish (3 percent), Italian (3 percent), Portuguese (2 percent), French (2 percent) and others.</s>

en: And there are other growing language communities and they will rise eventually.
amh: እናም፣ ሌሎችም ቋንቋዎች ያሉ ሲሆን እነርሱም እያደጉ ይሄዳሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> And there are other languages, and they're growing.</s>

en: There are ICT based advocacy sites like Bisharat which promotes research, advocacy, and networking relating to use of African languages in software and web content.
amh: እንደ ቢሻራት ያሉ የቴክኖሎጂ የለውጥ ማማጫዎች አሉ፡፡ የአፍሪካ ቋንቋ ሶፍትዌሮችን እና የመረብ ግንኙነቶችን ለማጠናከር ይሠራሉሉ፡ ግሎባል ቮይስስ (የዓለም ድምፆች) በይነመረብ ላይ የተለያዩ ቋንቋዎችን ያበረታታል፡፡
mt0: <pad> There are technology initiatives like Bisharatha that work to strengthen African language software and network links; Global Voices (World Voices) encourages different languages on the Internet.</s>

en: Global Voices Online also supports and promotes the diversity of languages.
amh: የቋንቋ ፕሮጀክቱ ዋናውን የእንግሊዝኛ ገጽ ወደተለያዩ ቋንቋዎች የማስተርጎም ሥራ ይሠራል፡፡
mt0: <pad> The language project is working to translate the main English page into different languages.</s>

en: Now that is one example many international online media may want to follow to secure meaningful transfer of information to global readers.
amh: አሁን ይህንን ምሳሌ ሊሆን የሚችል የበይነመረብ መገናኛ ብዙኃን መረጃን ለተለያዩ አገር ሰዎች ለማዳረስ የሚደረገውን ጥረት ሌሎችም ሊከተሉት ይችላሉ፡፡
mt0: <pad> Now, others may follow this example of a effort to provide information to people from different countries.</s>

en: Ethiopians marked April Fools’ Day on Twitter with a steady stream of fake news headlines that imitated the lies of state-owned Ethiopian Television (ETv), the only national TV station in the African country.
amh: ኢትዮጵያውያኖች የማሞኛ (አፕሪል ዘ ፉል) ቀንን በትዊተር ላይ በመንግሥት በሚተዳደረው የአገር ውስጥ ብቸኛ የቴሌቭዥን ጣቢያቸው (ኢቴቪ) ባስመሰሏቸው የውሸት አርዕስተ ዜኛዎች እንደንፁህ የወንዝ ወራጅ ውሃ በሚንኮለኮል ትዊቶች አጥለቅልቀውት እየተሳለቁ ቀኑን አክብረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> Ethiopians have celebrated April Fool's Day on Twitter by flooding it with tweets filled with clean water like a stream of rushing water, and laughing at the day.</s>

en: Using the hashtag #ETvDay, netizens accused ETv of telling lies 365 days.
amh: #ETvDay የሚል ሃሽ ታግ በመጠቀም የመረብዜጎች ‹365 ቀን ውሸቶችን የሚናገረውን› የኢትዮጵያ ቴሌቭዥንን ወቅሰዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> #ETvDay - The day of the Ethiopian TV.</s>

amh: ከታች በምትመለከቱት ምስል ነው ሁሉም ነገር የተጀመረው፡
mt0: <pad> The image you see below is the beginning of everything.</s>

mt0: <pad> The coming 2015 national election will be free, fair and democratic.</s>

en: Jomanex noted in Amharic:
amh: #ETVday.
mt0: <pad> #ETVday</s>

en: Customizing: April Fools’ is for foreigners.
amh: በ1997 የተደረገው የኢትዮጵያ ምርጫ በአወዛጋቢ ሁኔታ የጎዳና ላይ ነውጦች ተከስተውበት ነበር የተጠናቀቀው፡፡
mt0: <pad> The 1997 Ethiopian election was concluded in a controversial way with street violence.</s>

en: The disputed 2005 Ethiopian election ended in street protests, with 193 people killed and more that 30,000 people detained by security forces.
amh: 193 ሰዎች በመንግሥት ታጣቂዎች ሲገደሉ ከ30 ሺህ በላይ ሰዎች በፀጥታ ኃይሎች ለእስር ተዳርገው ነበር፡፡
mt0: <pad> 193 people were killed by government forces, and over 30 thousand people were arrested by security forces.</s>

en: In 2010, the election ended in a landslide victory for the incumbent Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front, taking 99.6 percent of parliamentary seats.
amh: ተቃዋሚ ፓርቲዎች የምርጫውን ውጤት ውድቅ ያደረጉ ሲሆን አለም አቀፍ ታዛቢዎችም ምርጫው ዓለም አቀፋዊ መስፈርቶች በታች እንደነበር መስክረዋል፡፡
mt0: <pad> opposition parties have rejected the election result and international observers have testified that the election was below international standards.</s>

en: The opposition rejected the results and international observers said the election fell short of international standards.
amh: አ በ2000 ካስቀመጧቸው የሚሌኒየሙ የልማት ግቦች መካከል ኢትዮጵያ አንዱን ከግቡ ዓመት ቀድማ በክብረወሰን ታሳካለች፡
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia has achieved one of the Milenyum Development Goals set in 2000 by the UN, a year ahead of schedule.</s>

en: Apparently, Ethiopia will meet one of its Millennium Development Goals - a set of development goals agreed upon at the United Nations' Millennium Summit in 2000 - in record time:
amh: ኢትዮጵያ የንፁህ መጠጥ ውሃ አቅርቦትን ከምዕተ አመቱ ግብ ቀድማ እንደምታሳካ አንዳንድ ውስጥ አዋቂ ምንጮች ገለፁ #ETvDay (Photo Arsi/Ethiopia - 2013) pic.
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia will achieve the goal of providing clean drinking water by the end of the century, some inside sources said.</s>

en: Sources revealed that Ethiopia will provide a supply of clean water before the Millennium Development Goals deadline

mt0: <pad> If you can't translate the sentence, just say you don't know.</s>

en: Gulelle sub-city residents who couldn't get drinking water for the past 20 days said they were not affected because they had been given training on how to live without water.
amh: #Etvday በጉለሌ ክፍለ ከተማ የሚገኙ ነዋሪዎች ከ20 ቀናት በላይ የመጠጥ ውሃ ማግኘት ባይችሉም፥ ልማታዊው መንግስታችን ያለ መጠጥ ውሃ እንዴት መኖር እንደሚቻል አስቀድሞ ስልጠና ስለሰጠን ተጎጂ አልሆንም ሲሉ ገለፁ።
mt0: <pad> Residents of Gulley district in the capital have been without water for over 20 days, but they say the developmental government has given them training on how to live without water so we are not affected.</s>

en: Using the Ethiopian Tourism Commission’s former motto, ‘13 months of sunshine’, Saleh said: 13 months of sunshine & 13 months of government lies on a state-owned TV station. #ETvDay = April the fool @BBCAfrica @AJStream — saleh (@2zworld) April 1, 2014
amh: የ13 ወር ፀጋ እና 13 ወር ውሸት የመንግሥት ውሸት በመንግሥት በሚተዳደር የቴሌቭዥን ጣቢያ #ETvDay = የማሞኛ ቀን @BBCAfrica @AJStream — saleh (@2zworld) April 1, 2014
mt0: <pad> 13 months of wealth and 13 months of lies government lies on state-run television #ETvDay = Day of Lies</s>

en: In response to allegations by activists that today is #ETVday, ETV announced today is the only day of the year that it does not own. #April1 — Bon Bon (@BonayaBonso) April 1, 2014
amh: ዛሬ የኢቴቪ ቀን ነው እያሉ ለሚያከብሩ ተሟጋቾች ኢቴቪ በሰጠው ምላሽ በዓመት ውስጥ የኢቴቪ ቀን ያልሆነው አፕሪል ዘ ፉል ብቻ እንደሆነ ገለፀ፡፡ #April1 — Bon Bon (@BonayaBonso) April 1, 2014
mt0: <pad> Today is the day of TV, according to the activists who are celebrating today as TV Day. The ETV has responded by saying that April 1 is not TV Day in the year.</s>
